name: Preferred Care at Home of North Austin and Williamson County
address: 715 Discovery Blvd Suite 120, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Preferred Care at Home of North Austin and Williamson County is a home health care service in Cedar Park, TX, offering home health care service services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 21 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Preferred Care at Home of North Austin and Williamson County provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Cedar Park, TX.

reviews_list.author: Yoli Campos Smith
reviews_list.text: Love Argie Martinez RN, Donna Hohm LVN and thier team!  Having a personal touch and hands on customer services makes the difference!  Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Cynthia Moon
reviews_list.text: I can’t thank Preferred Care at Home staff enough for the wonderful care of my mother.  It was such a comfort to know she was in good hands.

reviews_list.author: Becky Robbins-Penniman
reviews_list.text: We needed care for my elderly father, who lived with us, only when we went out of town. Preferred care was wonderful about working with our erratic schedule. They made sure Dad had a good supper and that he took his meds, and they also kept things tidy. If we had a problem, all we had to do was call and they would get right on it.  Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: bearstuffer
reviews_list.text: Argie and the nurses are wonderful. They have been a huge help with my uncle and his care. The nurse took exceptional care and he is happier when I visit him.

reviews_list.author: Jamie Burgess
reviews_list.text: I'm so happy for all those that got wonderful service. Our experience wasn't that great at all. Where to begin. The caregiver they sent wasn't all there and had no experience at all with what mom needed. I was told at the start when the nurse came that the reason she comes is to ensure its a good match. I was very clear with the level of care mom needed and what it took. The caregiver did what she wanted to do. I asked her to do a bath. I come back in 45 mins and she hadn't fed my mom or anything, she was still trying to put the brief on...45 min. I'm like why didn't you come get me and why didn't you give her a bath? The caregiver says, I figured you could have hospice do it. 45 mins, no food or anything and I had to put the brief on. She left dirty wipes on moms table, left 2 packs of wipes open that dried out. The caregiver nails were super long and scratched my mom up. When I notified the company, the response was, she just got back from vacation. Not sorry, is she okay, nothing. Are agreement was 7 days a week. On Friday, I was like I'll see you tomorrow. She said, nope, I don't do weekends. I had to cancel my plans. I told them I didn't want her back. The caregiver comes twice without my permission. You used the code when we weren't home to let herself in! Anyway, we go without care of course. I give them another chance, some other girl shows up, and says to a friend of mine, are you the girl I'm training, I sent her right home. She didn't even see or touch mom? like what?? None of this was told to me at all. That two girls were coming, they were training or anything. I give them a 3rd chance saying mom will be home Monday, we can pick up then, she goes let me know.  I'm confused because I literally said Monday. I just let you know. Here's the kicker, are agreement was 1 hour visits. They knew the caregiver knew. When it got close to an hour I reminded the caregiver. She would sit there and argue with me about leaving. Then she tells me, she clocks out at an hour and just stays, she does it all the time. I few times, I couldn't get this girl to leave. She's like I don't want to leave without finishing and I'm like your time is up and you've completed your hour. She even tired to get back up by asking another person in my home am I always like this? I told her there's one queen of this home and that's me! It was horrible. The bill I got was insane. I tried talking to them and nothing. To add, I made them aware, before they started that we have cameras that record, movement, audio and visual and yet, I'm dealing with craziness. And if they respond that any of this is a lie, I will post the text messages!

reviews_list.author: Frank Maddin
reviews_list.text: My mother was returning home from a rehab hospital, and we really appreciated the flexibility of Preferred Care at Home with their hours.  Most companies want 4 hours at a minimum and that was just too much for our situation. They strive to fit you with what you need, and Argie was very helpful.  I would recommend this company.

reviews_list.author: Jennifer Wilks
reviews_list.text: Love Preferred Care!! Argie is so very kind & helpful. Her workers are the same! We are so grateful we heard about them. It was so nice for me & my husband to get a date night every Friday & not worry about my mom!! Thank you SO MUCH for all you did for us!! We will be forever grateful!!

reviews_list.author: pamela conley
reviews_list.text: Erica Williams and the team at Preferred Care at Home have been a godsend for our family. My mother is living in a facility that has had a COVID outbreak, and we could not find an agency willing to find someone who could sit with her during this time, but Erica came through for us. We are so grateful for the care they have provided my Mom during this critical time.

reviews_list.author: Angelica Malanchuk
reviews_list.text: The people at Preferred Care have made a very trying time into a wonderful and positive experience. I have already recommended them to others.

reviews_list.author: Barbara Strand
reviews_list.text: We are so happy with the care my mom receives from Virginia at preferred care. I highly recommend using Preferred Care. Barb

name: A Place At Home - North Austin
address: 2251 Double Creek Dr STE 201, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: A Place At Home - North Austin is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service, home help, home help service agency services. With a 5-star rating from 22 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated in-home care & home health providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: A Place At Home - North Austin provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sharon Kubicek
reviews_list.text: I contacted multiple companies on a Friday afternoon when I was desperate for some relief in caring for my father. This was the only company who could help me on short notice and eased my burden. We had a multitude of caregivers since we were working to provide 24 hour a day coverage over a long weekend, but every single one I worked with -- and I worked with them all -- were compasionate and cared not only for my ailing father, but for my emotional well being as well. Haydee spend multiple days with in and not only cared for my dad with dignity, she did everything she could to make our lives better. Ana come on shift as the hospice nurse was there trying to make dad more confortable and she jumped in. I honestly believed she cared about dad and she certainly watched over him. I can not say enough good things about the company. Every time we had a new caregiver, they were introduced by the owner and she explained what needed to happen and gave clear expectations for dad's care. I honestly don't know what I would have done without this team of people.

reviews_list.author: Sharon Green
reviews_list.text: We are so glad to be working with A Place At Home.  Stacey, the owner really takes the time to get to know your family and the needs you have. Raegan is our caregiver and she is awesome - Happy and communicative so we always know what's going on, even when we are not there.  So appreciative for the burden that has been lifted through these amazing folks!

reviews_list.author: John Erickson
reviews_list.text: Stacy made my mother in law feel very comfortable during a discussion about getting help at home.  She also provided ideas about senior living communities nearby and ways my MIL could test out via rental before making any decisions.  Make sure to give her a call!

reviews_list.author: Steve Greinert
reviews_list.text:
Stacey and her staff were exceptional!
From the moment I contacted A Place At Home, I felt they were the right choice to care for my mom for two weeks while she recovered from a fall. My family is very grateful for their compassion and kindheartedness.

reviews_list.author: Matt L
reviews_list.text: If you ever need care for a family member, especially an elderly parent(s), I cannot more highly recommend A Place at Home.  Stacey and her staff go above and beyond what they are hired to do.  I have used A Place at Home for my parents over the past several months.  Not only did they ensure my parents ate, bathed, and were given the proper medication, they also shopped for them, cleaned, made sure they made all their doctor's appointment and took care of them even when hospitalization was required.  But above and beyond all of this, they truly cared and loved for my parents.  A Place at Home treated them like family and vice versa.  I cannot say enough about the exceptional staff and work that this amazing organization provides.  The greatest feeling was knowing that my parents were safe and in great hands.  Thank you A Place at Home!!!

reviews_list.author: Margo Hunt
reviews_list.text: A Place At Home has been a blessing to our family. My parents want to continue living independently, but it can be a struggle as their needs increase. Stacey has lead us through the process of hiring an in-home caregiver who was handpicked for us. She treats her clients like family and instills confidence that my mom will get a much needed break from being dad’s primary caregiver. I know my parents are in great care and that they are safe, happy, and respected by Stacey and her staff. My only regret is not hiring her and her team sooner.

reviews_list.author: bridget bolden
reviews_list.text:
First of all, this is an amazing company very professional, very friendly very understanding for what you’re needing as far as care for an individual.
Second, I must say that as a full-time employee, a full-time mom and a full-time wife who takes care of my mother-in-law who is 80 years old, with the beginning stages of dementia it’s very hard to balance out everything but A Place at Home has already made life easier.
I came home yesterday and my mother-in-law’s caretaker Deneen had lifted a heavy burden off me she cleaned off all of my mother-in-law’s gifts from her birthday celebration off my dining room table, cleaned up her room nicely. My mother-in-law was excited about her room and I was as well thank you again Deneen for going over and beyond.

reviews_list.author: Brad Napp
reviews_list.text: Thoughtful, caring, empathetic, intuitive…the people at A Place At Home are exactly what an individual needs when they consider placing their parents into care.

reviews_list.author: Kimberly Aspire
reviews_list.text: We have the most wonderful caregiver, China!  She is kind and gentle and takes the most incredible care of my Dad.  I love her sense of humor and how quickly she picked up on my senior's "tricks."  I cannot recommend A Place At Home North Austin more.  Stacy did an amazing job at matching the perfect caregiver to our family.

reviews_list.author: Gloria Doll
reviews_list.text: Stacy did a fantastic job with helping us with my husband who was in a memory are facility. She was always there to help us or suggest what we should do in several situations. She went beyond the call of duty in every way. I cannot praise her enough for all that she did for us!! She is very savvy in helping family's needs!!

name: Blue Water Homecare and Hospice
address: 660 S Bagdad Rd Suite 210, Leander, TX 78641
description: Blue Water Homecare and Hospice is a home health care service in Leander, TX, offering home health care service, hospice services. With a 4.7-star rating from 64 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated in-home care & home health providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Blue Water Homecare and Hospice provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Leander, TX.

reviews_list.author: Carter Waggoner
reviews_list.text:
Blue Water Hospice is Mariella of Teravista 's preferred hospice provider for residents who need compassionate, consistent, and professional care. Their shower aides and nurses are exceptional. Their leadership team is supportive, compassionate, and highly professional.
Jennifer Passons and Mary Jarrett are outstanding professionals with the experience and knowledge to guide families through one of the most vulnerable times of life.
Mariella of Teravista highly recommends Blue Water Hospice without reservation. We value their partnership.

reviews_list.author: J
reviews_list.text: Blue Waters Hospice provides exceptional care with compassion, professionalism, and genuine heart. Their team goes above and beyond to ensure patients and families feel supported every step of the way. A special shoutout to Sherrie, their marketer, whose kindness, knowledge, and dedication truly makes a difference. I met her as Executive Director in memory care. She’s approachable, always willing to help, and clearly passionate about the work she does. If you're looking for a hospice team that treats you like family, this is the place.

reviews_list.author: Westley Swihart
reviews_list.text:
5 Stars
What a fantastic team! I truly can't say enough about the care, dedication, and compassion they show every day. As a healthcare professional who has been in the field for quite some time, I can confidently say this is one of the most outstanding teams I’ve had the pleasure of working with. Their commitment to their patients and families is unmatched. This is a team I will always recommend.

reviews_list.author: Deborah DeLario
reviews_list.text: My name is Deborah & I’ve been a caregiver for years all around the hill country of Texas. I’ve worked with a lot of hospice companies & I have found Blue Water is the best. Nurse Jennifer is terrific, caring, loving and knows her nursing skills with Parkinson patients. The young lady who gives bed baths was also loving and really knows her job. I was impressed, the social worker for this area was wonderful with my client’s husband, who was grieving in his own way. Sherrie Lynn McBurney who is the Account Executive was very caring, supportive with my client’s husband  who suffered with Parkinson’s end of life. I thank God they came in to help at this time. Thank you to everyone at Blue Water & look forward to working with you in the future. Compassion is the name of the game in business like ours. I give them 5 stars.

reviews_list.author: Parker Mayland
reviews_list.text:
Sherrie Lynn & Jennifer Prescott are such amazing professionals to the central Texas region. Blue Water Homecare and Hospice is a great resource for families, and are true difference makers! I have no doubt this is the next and upcoming hospice provider in the Austin area. Thank you for supporting our Senior Living communities, we appreciate your partnership and dedication!!
-Parker Mayland
Volante of Sage Spring Senior Living

reviews_list.author: Lori Hapenny
reviews_list.text: I have been in the hospice industry for over twenty years.  Blue Water Hospice is by far one of the BEST.  The care, consideration, and support you will receive from their team is will go beyond your expectations.  The owner Jennifer is the so compassionate and caring you will think she is family.  Simply the best!!!!

reviews_list.author: Torie Vela
reviews_list.text: Blue Water Homecare is great. Sherrie Lynn McBurney has helped many sweet people needing hospice and care. She has the kindest heart and has a way with the elderly that makes them feel at ease. They are so lucky to have Sherrie to work with the sweet elderly community. Thank you Blue Water!

reviews_list.author: Stephanie Turek
reviews_list.text: From the moment my family made contact with Blue Water Hospice to assist with my Aunt, we were at peace.  BWH handled my family with such compassion, knowledge and  professionalism.  Not to mention gentleness and patience towards my Aunt. As we are continuing to navigate her life with Alzheimer’s, we are comforted that she is being taken care of by BWH.  The biggest of thank you to the entire BWH team.

reviews_list.author: Yvonne Smith
reviews_list.text:
We initially met with Blue Water Homecare in preparation for extra help after my dad was scheduled to have heart surgery.  Tragically my dad had two strokes following the surgery, and we ended up needing hospice care services.

We interviewed a couple of other Hospice companies along with Blue Water, and the other companies made us feel like they were giving us a sales pitch.  Jennifer with Blue Water Hospice made us feel like she really cared to get to know us as we "interviewed" her.

We have zero regrets with going with Blue Water.  When we panicked after getting home and realizing we needed more home health than we anticipated, within hours Denise was out to get 24/7 home health set up.  Denise and the aides were all loving and caring of my dad, as well as the rest of the family.

Jennifer, the owner of Blue Water, also provided hospice nursing care for my dad, and she was AMAZING.  She is most definitely doing what God put her on Earth to do, and we are so thankful for the service she provides to our community, and the love both she and her company showed to our family in this very stressful and sad time of our lives.

All the hospice nurses, the staff at the office, the social worker and minister were all so wonderful.  We felt loved and my dad was very cared for until the very end.

No one every wants to go through something like this, but if you need extra help after a surgery or to help an elderly family member, or if you sadly, need hospice, I cannot recommend Blue Water enough.  I would give more than 5 stars if I could!

Thank you Jennifer and Company!  We are grateful for you!

reviews_list.author: Nate Presley
reviews_list.text: I have worked with many home care and hospice companies over the years. Bluewater has a team that cares about the individual and  they consistently go to any length to ensure that their patients and their families have everything that they need.

name: Abundance Home Care
description: Abundance Home Care is a home health care service in Georgetown, TX, offering home health care service, career guidance service, transportation escort service services. Rated 5 stars based on 6 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Abundance Home Care provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Liz Pereyra
reviews_list.text: Abundance Home Care is truly amazing! They go above and beyond with events that host for their clients-always fun, engaging and filled with hands-on activities. You can really tell they care about creating meaningful experiences. I very highly recommend Abundance Home Care to anyone looking for compassion and involving care. They’re simply the best!

reviews_list.author: Neelam N
reviews_list.text: We used Abundance Home Care back in October 2023. Stephanie W, the owner, came over to our house and took the time to get to know us and our loved one that needed care. I have to say, Stephanie and her team are very courteous, kind, compassionate, professional, and really care about their client as if it were their own loved one. We needed a couple of shifts for our loved one, and the team worked with us to find the best caregiver for him, and were able to accommodate our weird shift schedule. I have recommended Stephanie's team to several people that I have met who have inquired about searching for caregivers, and I will continue to refer/recommend Abundance Home Care to anyone who is needing a caregiver. I was very impressed with their mission statement, and the type of care provided aligns across the board with their mission and values. Our loved one was very happy with the caregivers that were assigned by Abundance Home Care, and we were always in the loop about the care because there was a daily log that was kept of the routine and everything that went on with the care. I would highly recommend setting an appointment with them and getting to know Stephanie and how she can help you provide the best care for your loved one.

reviews_list.author: milton van dusen
reviews_list.text: Abundance Home Care was incredible. They went over and beyond to help my mother and our family. Stephanie and her staff were a godsend for us during this difficult time. Highly recommend this company.

reviews_list.author: Yolanda Toms
reviews_list.text:
Stephanie and her crew took very good care of my dad. He looked forward to their visits. Stephanie would bring her dog Bella to visit my dad and he really enjoyed time with Bella.

The caregivers would make sure my dad's apartment was clean, wash his clothes. It really made me feel good to know that I could relax when he was in their care.

I can't say enough about her staff.

reviews_list.author: Jennifer Williams
reviews_list.text: We love these caregivers so much!! They took such great care of our parents and truly love what they do. You will not be disappointed if you use Abundance!! They really care!!

reviews_list.author: Peter Klein
reviews_list.text: Stephanie will listen to you and provide you with a top notch  caregiver.

name: Home Instead
address: 2261 Gattis School Rd Suite 145, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Home Instead is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service, home help, home help service agency services. Rated 4.3 stars based on 19 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Home Instead provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Diane Cooke
reviews_list.text:
Home Instead lets my dear friend, Eileen, stay at home instead of moving into a facility.
All of her Carepros take excellent care of her and keep her motivated and healthy.  Juliet goes over & beyond her duties.  With my input, she makes doctor appointments, takes her to the doctor, buys groceries, etc.  She is a godsend!

reviews_list.author: Cathy C
reviews_list.text:
We currently have Home Instead Round Rock taking care of my Mother in our home.  My Mother is unable to get out of bed, so she needs care 24/7.  I work full-time so it is imperative that we have care we can depend on.

The caregivers are wonderful with her and are always on time.  Home Instead has been flexible in the past when Mom was in and out of the hospital.  We could not be happier with the service we are receiving and are so thankful to have them!

reviews_list.author: ANGIE M
reviews_list.text:
We employed Home Instead during a time when my father was under Hospice care. My mother needed some assistance, since she is visually challenged. Home Instead quickly understood our needs and accommodated us immediately. Our lives were changing daily as my father began his transition and the Home Instead scheduler was able to flawlessly flow with those changes.
Now that my father has passed, and my mother will be living with me, she is still wanting the security of having her caregiver with her while my husband and I work during the day. Thank you so much to everyone at Home Instead for all your support to my family during this VERY difficult and sometimes stressful time.

reviews_list.author: Timothy Nibert
reviews_list.text:
Very positive,great caregivers for my mom an dad.
Home Instead has made it possible for mom an dad to
have the help they need and remain in their home.
Mom and dad both want to remain in their  house but
need some help with shopping and food prep and well as
some reminders for meds. They are minimal assistance with
most everything for their care. I think they like the interaction
of the care givers as well.
Overall Home Instead is just wonderful!

reviews_list.author: Glenn Pieper
reviews_list.text:
We couldn’t be more pleased!
True to their word, home indeed It’s completely focused on helping my parent stay in their home.
Plain and simple, this is what everybody wants… It’s certainly what I want for myself and my family.
Home indeed provided a caregiver that matched my parent exactly. I’ve seen almost immediate improvement in cognitive expression.
If you’re looking for a partner to help you keep your parent in their home, You’ve  found it!

reviews_list.author: Barbara Castille
reviews_list.text: Caregivers are matched up very well with the client's needs, very caring company & caregivers.  Best decision I ever made in order to keep my Mother at home.

reviews_list.author: Betty Wafford
reviews_list.text: My experience with Home Instead has been since 2016 and a most successful and beneficial service.  I recommend it to all who need assistance.

reviews_list.author: Patricia Sharp
reviews_list.text: Very happy with caregiver Tim and particularly Vicki's ability to cut through red tape and solve problems.  We are quite pleased to be using Home Instead.

reviews_list.author: Amy Villafuerte
reviews_list.text: This family franchise is absolutely terrible, they are very rude and disrespectful to both their clients and their employees. i would not suggest this company to help care for your elderly loved one. They care more about the money they make off of their families, rather than the care of their clients. They also do not like to pay their employees whom are the ones putting all their effort in caring for the elderly. They do not care about the concerns for the clients, they just want whats best for their company to make money.

reviews_list.author: Maria Betts
reviews_list.text: Olga is the reason I love Home Instead. She's the best thing that every happened to me and my mom!

name: Right at Home
address: 2681 Gattis School Rd #250, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Right at Home is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service, home help, home help service agency services. Rated 4.9 stars based on 13 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Right at Home provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Maria Carter
reviews_list.text: I am so grateful that I was referred to Right At Home by our Palliative Care team. I am a caregiver for my 91 year old father who had been sick the same week I had my procedure at 5:30AM and thought I was going to have to cancel my procedure. Luckily, Right At Home found a nurse who offered to be at my home at 5AM. I don't know what I would have done w/out them. I highly recommend Right at Home for support for caregivers.

reviews_list.author: Debbie Miller Matthys
reviews_list.text:
My parents have had caregivers from Right At Home, Round Rock, since April 2020.   One of their caregivers has been with us  for three years and definitely feels like a part of our family!
Both of my parents  have Alzheimer's and I appreciate the care and concern from all of the Right at Home caregivers they have had.
The office staff and case managers are great, too!
When my mother broke her leg and needed someone with her all day, they were able to staff 8 a.m-9 p.m. shifts within one day of our request for assistance.

reviews_list.author: Janet Barlow
reviews_list.text: The service Right at Home provides is top-notch.  Their office staff and the caregivers are always professional, caring and on time as scheduled.  The company is flexible so that we can provide just what we need, and only what we need for my mom at a price that is affordable.  I recommend Right at Home to anyone in need of home care services.

reviews_list.author: Cynthia Gillilan
reviews_list.text: I cannot say enough good things about these people!  After trying other agencies I found Right at Home through another highly recommended agency that was short on staff due to Covid.  That is a the highest compliment when another company is comfortable referring potential clients to you.  Thank goodness they were short handed because it was Kismet that we found Right at Home.  First let me say, if you feel the people you are using fall short of your expectations you are probably right and you should call Onika with Right at Home.  I felt guilty about firing other companies but turns out I was right in thinking they weren't what we should be getting for our money.  Right at Home will find the perfect fit for you and make sure that things are professional, respectful and enjoyable!  They also came through in a pinch when my husbands job pushed into the same time I was scheduled to fly home and close out moms house.  We could not leave her a alone nor could I take her back with me.  They found staff to fill in every minute we needed someone here to care for mom.  That gave me such peace of mind in an already tumultuous situation.  Thank you to these amazing people!!

reviews_list.author: Janine Gibson
reviews_list.text: Without any time to research, plan or have family discussions, we found ourselves with my husband being released from the hospital earlier than expected to go into hospice care in our home.  Sydney Greenwalt with Right at Home stepped up to the plate and guided us through the process with patience, knowledge, efficiency and most of all compassion for all we were going through.  We kept changing our needs and she delivered.  I would highly recommend Right at Home to anyone needing the services they can provide.

reviews_list.author: Chris Caffey
reviews_list.text: Right at Home Round Rock provided great care for my mom for about 5 years, from the time she moved in with me through her final days in a nursing home. Over the years, I had a long list of ever-changing requests (i.e., I was high-maintenance), and the whole team was always so accommodating, caring, and helpful.

reviews_list.author: Doug Casey
reviews_list.text: The helper, Cristina who has been comming to my house to help care fore is a wonderful help. She is punctual, she takes the initiative to do things on her own. She is always upbeat and can be depended upon. The organization is very pleasent to work with. I will misss these people when I no longer have them.

reviews_list.author: Wayne Rankin
reviews_list.text: Their service was prompt and professional.  The provider stayed with me during my procedure.  I used them three times and two months.  If needed I will use them again.

reviews_list.author: sam tejada
reviews_list.text: Absolutely wonderful staff. So easy to work with and very professional. They are very attentive and make sure they are doing everything to make your loved one comfortable.

reviews_list.author: Frank Marichalar
reviews_list.text: First time used and no complaints. Shari is the best caregiver. Recommended this Company to anyone.

name: ComForCare Home Care (North Austin)
address: 400 W Main St Suite 222, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: ComForCare Home Care (North Austin) is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service services. With a 4.9-star rating from 39 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated in-home care & home health providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: ComForCare Home Care (North Austin) provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: katrina Patterson
reviews_list.text: This Home Health Care is the best place for your loved ones that are in need…I love working for them management rocks. We are a great team. They will take care of your needs for your loved ones and they take care of their employees as well. I’m very happy to work for the company.. We will take care any needs And we will work with you and make feel at home.Thanks Comfort care.

reviews_list.author: Mehul
reviews_list.text:
When my Uncle came home after a long hospital stay, we were overwhelmed trying to manage his care. ComForCare truly came to our rescue. The caregivers they provided were not only compassionate but incredibly well-trained — they knew exactly how to handle his medication schedule and mobility exercises.

Ash has been a longtime advocate for seniors, always going above and beyond to provide support. I would highly recommend her services to anyone seeking thoughtful, dedicated care

The office staff was also wonderful to work with. They were always responsive, kind, and made scheduling so easy. Thanks to ComForCare, my Uncle is now much more comfortable at home and improving every day.

reviews_list.author: Tanvi Patil
reviews_list.text: This is the absolute best service for people who need home care. They are professional, knowledgeable and detail oriented. They are warm and compassionate. Dr Bist is a life saver. She truly cares for her patients makes sure they are comfortable and well cared for. They are prompt and know what they are doing. If you are looking for home care services for elderly or sick individuals, don’t think twice. Comforcare is the only ones you should want.

reviews_list.author: Mary Myrick
reviews_list.text: I’ve been with ComForCare for about three months, and it has been a truly positive experience. The company shows real compassion and professionalism in everything they do, and the staffing team is warm, respectful, and always supportive. They communicate well, treat employees with kindness, and make sure we feel valued in the work we do. I’m grateful to be part of a team that genuinely cares about both clients and caregivers."

reviews_list.author: Andrea Davis
reviews_list.text: In the short time that I have been employed PRN with ComForCare I have really enjoy going to check on the few clients that I have a few days a week. I have become very familiar with them and their routines. I try to make them feel seen and heard addressing any concerns they may have, plus they also look forward to me coming, if I'm early they pay attention to the small details and will be like you are early today lol or the questions of will you be coming back tomorrow. What I most enjoy is being able to help them and talk with them asking them how they day has been, sharing my time with them really warms my heart and I look forward to being able to do this for many more day, months, even years to come.

reviews_list.author: Nicole Valley
reviews_list.text: Dr.A was a life saver! My elderly father was located in Round Rock and I live in Arizona and was not able to fly out right away to help take care of him when he needed assistance. I was referred to ComforCare and was a little nervous at first, but from the first phone call they made me feel comfortable and safe to help provide care for my father. They reassured me they were able to provide the services he needed and were very thorough with providing me the information I needed to stay calm in this hard time. I was not aware of how bad his condition was since he kept telling me he was fine. Dr.A and her team came in our lives at the perfect time to help until I arrived in Texas. They provided 24 hour care before he went to the rehab center to get his strength back before moving him to Arizona. My father said they were lovely and didn’t want to stop the services because he enjoyed everyone who took care of him. Which he doesn’t say about people who help him since he doesn’t feel like he needs help. If I was not moving him to Arizona we would still be using their services! I am truly blessed for Dr.A stepping in and informing me he needed more care than I thought he did. She did not do it in a way where she was trying to make more money for the company, she did it in a caring way saying this is what I would want my loved one to have in this situation. She treated him like he was a loved one and helped guide me to make the decisions I needed to make and calm my nerves as well. She also referred him to a nurse to get all of his medications together. They assessed he was not properly taking his medications so she had the nurse there first thing. I was able to call Dr.A and ask any questions and her right hand woman Nicole was amazing and so kind as well! This company truly made me feel safe, informed and cared for when I was in another state very nervous. Thank you Dr.A for being the angel you are and taking part of saving my dads life.

reviews_list.author: devang desai
reviews_list.text: ComForCare North Austin has been a reliable and compassionate support for my family. Their caregivers are professional, kind, and truly attentive to individual needs. The team communicates clearly and handles changes smoothly. Overall, a trustworthy and caring service.

reviews_list.author: Harsh Oza
reviews_list.text: We’re incredibly grateful to Dr. Bist and the ComForCare team for their support and expert home safety guidance. Their professionalism and kindness make all the difference. I highly recommend Dr. Bist and ComForCare to anyone seeking dependable, compassionate care.

reviews_list.author: Jan Gregg
reviews_list.text: We have been very pleased with ComForCare and the care that they have provided for our Mom. Nicole, Mahogany and Brittany have been very instrumental in making sure our respite needs are met. We appreciate the quality care and attention to detail in providing care for our Mom. Thanks

reviews_list.author: Ankit Patel
reviews_list.text: ComForCare goes beyond basic sitter services. Dr. A brings so much knowledge and compassion to the care plan, and it really shows. Thankyou for all the help ComForcare!

name: Amada Senior Care
address: 1104 S Mays St #117, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Amada Senior Care is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service, aged care services. With a 4.9-star rating from 137 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated in-home care & home health providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Amada Senior Care provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Susan Priddy
reviews_list.text: We recently started working with Amada to help care for my mom, and we have been very happy with their support. Our needs have fluctuated—sometimes on a daily basis—and Ama has been an absolute pro at adjusting the schedule. She is delightful to work with. Highly recommend Amada!

reviews_list.author: Kim Miller
reviews_list.text: I just started working with Amada. My sister is needing care, so I have been looking at several different companies. We are in a situation where we don’t know what we need or when we will need it. The owner Patrick came to our house and explained everything and was great. We have been working with Ama to schedule and we have had to make several changes because our situation changes daily since my sister is in the hospital. We don’t know when she will get out or what she will need. Amada has been great to just give us time to figure things out and be there when we need help. Ama alway returns my calls and I look forward to working with them to get great care for my sister.

reviews_list.author: Mamie
reviews_list.text: Wonderful Experience! From the first contact, actually with a person, not just any person The Owner!  Ms. Magnolia assisted me throughout the process of helping get my best friend situated.  She was very friendly,  knowledgeable and most important she really CARED! They offered every service imaginable which is imperative when you have a loved one in need, just having competent AND compassionate professionals throughout is amazing. Even after the "sale" they still care and the Business Manager came in and literally took care of all the financial issues and supported very detail.

reviews_list.author: Bella Apodaca
reviews_list.text:
I rarely write reviews, but what AMADA did for my family deserves to be shouted from the rooftops.

After months of fighting an uphill battle trying to get my brother the care he desperately needed, we were exhausted, defeated, and honestly losing hope. From the hospital to skilled nursing and rehab facilities, we kept being promised improvement — yet every single time, he declined. Twice, he came within hours of losing his life. We were terrified of placing him anywhere again, yet I didn’t think keeping him home was even possible.

And then we found AMADA.

From the very first moment, the difference was undeniable. Within minutes of submitting an online inquiry, the owner himself, Patrick, reached out. That same day, Patrick and Magnolia showed up at our home — compassionate, knowledgeable, and determined to help us find a real solution. Their office manager, Ama, handled everything with lightning speed and genuine care. She even helped us get approved for a program that covered several visits at no cost.

Because of AMADA’s efficiency, compassion, and true dedication to families like ours, we were able to start services the very next morning.

For the first time in months, we felt hope.

AMADA didn’t just provide caregivers — they gave my brother back his dignity, safety, and comfort. He is now able to stay at home, where he is happiest and belongs… and that peace of mind is priceless.

If you are overwhelmed, scared, or unsure where to turn for a loved one’s care, please learn from our experience: AMADA is the company you want on your side. Their team is extraordinary, and their level of compassion and responsiveness is something I’ve never seen in this industry.

I will recommend AMADA to absolutely everyone. They changed our lives — and I am forever grateful.

reviews_list.author: Marlene Garcia
reviews_list.text: Thank you Patrick Murphy and the staff of Amada Senior Care for being so amazing with everything you do for our mother and our family. You all are so professional and caring not just for mom but you make sure we are all doing well. Your company is the best we have ever had. GOD bless you all.

reviews_list.author: James Martin
reviews_list.text: Absolutely an amazing company! The staff was kind and understanding of my family’s situation. The caregivers were patient and amazingly trained. I couldn’t have had a better home care agency for my loved one. Thank you!

reviews_list.author: Dawn Orand
reviews_list.text: I am very happy with the care Amada provides for my husband who has dementia.  I love Evone, who takes him for walks and stimulates him all day.  I also appreciate Deborah and Lillian who care for him with humor and patience.  They are professional and well trained to care for him as he declines.

reviews_list.author: Jon Edwards
reviews_list.text: I have had a incredible experience with Amada!  I had another agency and they would not come on time if they showed up at all.  Mariah has been fantastic. She helps me 5 days a week for about 8 hours or so. I highly recommend Amada Senior Care.

reviews_list.author: Richard Packard
reviews_list.text: My mother has recently relocated to a new facility in the Austin area.  She needed a little help with here medications.  She was having trouble remembering to take them at certain times of the day.  Amada was the perfect answer.  They have been wonderful and very professional.  I would recommend them to anyone who needs help with medication reminders, shower assistance or any other care needs.

reviews_list.author: Christina Parker
reviews_list.text: Amada has been helping us for a few months now and I am so  impressed with their care, and consistency and communications .  I can breathe easier knowing that my grandparents are in good hands.

name: Home Compassion Companionship Private Caregivers, LLC
address: 15608 Spring Hill Ln Ste 109, Pflugerville, TX 78660
description: Home Compassion Companionship Private Caregivers, LLC is a home health care service in Pflugerville, TX, offering home health care service services. Rated 4.5 stars based on 8 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Home Compassion Companionship Private Caregivers, LLC provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Pflugerville, TX.

reviews_list.author: Joanna H. Cleveland
reviews_list.text: My recent interactions with Home Compassion have really left a mark, showcasing their unwavering commitment to providing exceptional care. Even through the phone, the dedication of their team shone through, reaffirming my trust in their care. I wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone seeking not only assistance but genuine companionship and support for their loved ones in their golden years.

reviews_list.author: Susan Hatley
reviews_list.text: If I were to find myself in need of any kind of help to get through my day, I would want someone to come who will lift my spirit and leave a peaceful, happy atmosphere behind as they go. I would want people who I could trust with myself and my things. I would want people of integrity who mean what they say and follow through on commitments. I was actually in this situation and was  fortunate to have  two of the people involved with this organization care for me after abdominal surgery this year. They were the kind of angels I just described, so I can wholeheartedly recommend Home Compassion Companionship Private Caregivers.

reviews_list.author: Kim Wood
reviews_list.text: If you're needing dependable help with your loved one, I suggest to look elsewhere. I took a day off work to meet Lucy to evaluate my Mom. She cancelled. Visit was rescheduled with no time specified. When she called we weren't home. I was told to text when we were and she'd come so we cooks get my Mom taken care of. I sent a text as soon as we were back. No response. I then get a text saying visit was cancelled and asked me to take another day off work. Which I'm sure would be a no show as well. Very unprofessional and definitely not invested in caring for your loved one.

reviews_list.author: Leslie Myers
reviews_list.text: I had been searching for a company to fill in for a private caregiver I was using and I got so much more! This is the Best! Compassionate and well trained and are wonderful with my husband who has Parkinson’s! I’ve even added more hours I love them so much. They encourage my husband to get up and out of his chair and exercise - he wouldn’t do it for me!

reviews_list.author: Kari Ingle
reviews_list.text: The staff at Home Compassion are some of the most kind, caring people I know. Highly recommend their service!

reviews_list.author: evelyn orumwense
reviews_list.text: The company has been really doing a great job. I have been with this company for some time now and I am very impressed with the way they take care of their residents.

reviews_list.author: BHR Ministries
reviews_list.text: Hard-working people very honest people loving and kindness joyful people clients are always first and right because it is the work of the heart excellent employe Home compassion it is the best ever

reviews_list.author: Daniel mulwal
reviews_list.text: The have excellent caregivers great help to my parents 🙏

name: Excellent Home Health & Hospice
address: 1 Chisholm Trail Rd 450 Room 409, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Excellent Home Health & Hospice is a home health care service in Round Rock, TX, offering home health care service, adult day care center, assisted living facility services. Rated 5 stars based on 19 reviews, they provide quality in-home care & home health for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Excellent Home Health & Hospice provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jeri Smith
reviews_list.text: Excellent Home Health has been the most reliable service we have used. They always have someone there when scheduled and have even been there when additional needs have come about last minute. The caregivers are very sweet and kind and work hard to connect with the patient and family. It’s been a pleasure working with them and they provide a lot of peace of mind.

reviews_list.author: molly Nefkens
reviews_list.text: We have used these health aid services for a few months now and found them to reliable and responsible. The owner is easily reachable by text and has been responsive whenever we had questions. The 2 aids for my mom (she has dementia) are very sweet and gentle with my mom. I feel comfortable recommending this agency.

reviews_list.author: Me Karefree
reviews_list.text: Excellent Home Health & Hospice by far exceeded any healthcare company we have used for my mother. Over the 6 years that mom required healthcare we used a total of 4 companies in the Austin area. Excellent Home Health shined above the rest. Their employees always showed up on time, never canceled at the last minute (a problem with previous healthcare companies), were caring and professional. If an employee wasn't the right fit Brisley, owner, was quick to find someone else. When we trust others to care for our loved ones Excellent Home Health should be your first go too. Thank you for soaring above the other healthcare companies in the area.

reviews_list.author: Holley B
reviews_list.text: We were very pleased with Excellent Home Health. The caregiver assigned to my mom was knowledgeable about caring for a memory care patient. She was very kind  and attentive to my mom and very respectful to our family. I also appreciated how they communicated any concerns they had with the director of the facility as well. I will definitely use Excellent Home Health& Hospice again

reviews_list.author: Keith Kregel
reviews_list.text: This company provided an excellent level of service with a quality caregiver for my aging mother. They are fast, efficient, empathetic and caring. I called on a Sunday evening and had care provided the following Monday. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Austin Frosty
reviews_list.text:
Excellent Home Health and Hospice was recommended to us by a good friend and we are very appreciative and grateful to have found them. My dad had reached a point where he required 24/7 care and amazingly and thankfully, Brisley was able to fill all the needed spots in our caregiving schedule on a very short notice. He was very personable and good with reliable, responsive, communicating which is essential for maintaining a 24/7 caregiving schedule. He personally went above and beyond to ensure a quality caregiving experience. The caregivers I met were nice, upbeat and truly caring. Anyone who has been in a situation requiring 24/7 care of a loved one knows how challenging it can be and having Brisley and his team of caregivers to help meet that challenge was a true blessing.
Thank you very much Brisley and all the caregivers who helped with my dad’s care.

reviews_list.author: Patti Howes
reviews_list.text: I had a very unique request and Brisley got it worked out for us.  Isela is our aid worker.  She is fabulous, so sweet and caring to my mother. She really knows how to work with someone who has late stage dementia.

reviews_list.author: Bobby Scruggs
reviews_list.text: Brisley and his team at Excellent Home Health & Hospice have been great to work with over the past 3 years. They support our team at FirstLight with backup staffing support and home health services when we need them.

reviews_list.author: Dayna Bolger
reviews_list.text: Excellent Home Healthcare is truly a blessing. I made a call and instantly connected with a confidant humble servant. This is a difficult time caring for my dad and Excellent Home Healthcare provided me direction guidance and peace through this process. The attendant who was assigned to care for my dad was also an amazing and kind servant. I have never experienced such professionalism from another Home Healthcare company. Excellent Home Healthcare is truly a company that wants to provide excellent service but through genuine compassion for the love of Christ. I am truly blown away to have found such an amazing company to provide my dad the loving care that he deserves. They are AMAZING

reviews_list.author: Cassandra Failure and
reviews_list.text: Excellent Home Health & Hospice provides exceptional care and services!  The caregivers are courteous, knowledgeable and timely. I highly recommend this group!

name: HomeWell Care Services
description: HomeWell Care Services is a home health care service in Cedar Park, TX, offering home health care service, disability services and support organization, home help services. With a 5-star rating from 32 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated in-home care & home health providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: HomeWell Care Services provides quality in-home care & home health for seniors in Cedar Park, TX.

name: Grand Living At Georgetown
description: Grand Living At Georgetown is a retirement community in Georgetown, TX, offering retirement community, assisted living facility services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 43 reviews, they provide quality senior living communities for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Grand Living At Georgetown provides quality senior living communities for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Barbara Sadnavitch
reviews_list.text: Grand Living at Georgetown is a beautiful, vibrant senior living community. I have been a guest there for many holiday and special functions. Each time I was greeted warmly and treated very kindly. The holiday buffets have always been enjoyable and the food delicious. I’ve also attended a few social hours and enjoyed the live entertainment and hors d’ oeuvres. The Elvis impersonator was a hoot! If you’re looking for a luxury senior living community for a loved one, Grand Living at Georgetown should be at the top of your list!

reviews_list.author: Kylee Whitlock
reviews_list.text: Grand Living is the BEST community! I recommend this place to everyone. The staff and residents are always so welcoming. I bring my kids in to visit every once in awhile (4 & 2) and it’s like we become celebrities! All of the residents adore my children like they are their own. Kate, the director, always takes her time to talk with anyone & everyone, no matter how busy she may be! She genuinely cares for every single person in that building, from residents to staff, and even guests, as if they were family. She is a one of a kind director! This place will always get 1000 stars from me!

reviews_list.author: Scott
reviews_list.text:
My wife and I recently visited Grand Living at Georgetown to spend time with our dear friends who recently moved into this community, and we were absolutely blown away by the experience. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with such genuine warmth by staff. It’s clear that the staff here truly care about the residents and their families.

Abi truly stood out and left an incredible impression on both of us. From the very first moment we met her, it was clear she is someone special. She radiates warmth and passion for what she does. We had the pleasure of being invited to watch a fitness activity, and she went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed.

Before the class, Abi noticed a subtle shift in a resident’s mood and quietly checked in with  the resident privately. It was a small, thoughtful moment that reflects how staff pay attention to individual needs and personalize each resident’s daily experience, even when no one is watching.

Throughout the class, that same personal connection continued to shine through. Abi’s ability to motivate through kindness was remarkable; always leading with positive reinforcement before offering gentle corrections, ensuring everyone felt supported and capable every step of the way.

It brought such warmth to our hearts knowing that our friends have found a community like Grand Living, one that not only provides exceptional care but fosters belonging, purpose, and connection. Abi, along with the rest of the Grand Living team, exemplifies everything you would hope to find in a community like this.

To Abi and the rest of the Grand Living team, thank you for what you do!

reviews_list.author: Bob Gober
reviews_list.text:
I recently helped my dad move into an apartment at Grand Living Georgetown and it has been a wonderful experience.
Beautiful and functional facilities, great food, friendly and helpful staff, and a wide variety of activities have provided my dad an amazing and welcoming new home.
Our family is glad to have found such a place and many thanks to Lisa, Brittany, Cole, Abi, Sherry, Kate and the rest of the staff for taking good care of my dad!

reviews_list.author: Xolani Gardner
reviews_list.text: The grand living at georgetown is an amazing place for anyone of all ages, it is a retirement home for the elderly and at the same time so much more. The residents are highly favorable, respectful,  and very young at heart. The staff there are always so polite, helpful, and heart warming. It's a clean, well maintained,  stationary resort that i recommend you visit weather looking for a home, or a job.  Just the essence is awesome and life changing.

reviews_list.author: Kurt Juman
reviews_list.text:
Review of My Visit to Grand Living Assisted Living Facility

I recently had the opportunity to visit Grand Living, and I must say, I was deeply impressed by the overall environment and the level of care provided.

From the moment I walked through the doors, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The facility is beautifully maintained—clean, bright, and thoughtfully designed with the comfort and dignity of its residents in mind. The attention to detail in both the living spaces and common areas reflects a genuine respect for the elderly community they serve.

The staff stood out as the heart of Grand Living. Everyone I encountered was not only courteous but also compassionate, patient, and attentive. It was clear that they are committed to creating a safe, supportive, and enriching environment for the residents.

During my tour, I observed several residents engaged in activities—from music sessions to peaceful reading corners—which suggests a healthy focus on mental, emotional, and social wellness. The dining area was also impressive, offering a restaurant-style experience that promotes both nutrition and connection.

What truly made an impression was the sense of community. Grand Living doesn’t just provide care—it fosters a sense of home, purpose, and belonging.

Overall, I would highly recommend Grand Living to anyone seeking a high-quality assisted living facility. It’s a place where elders are treated with honor, kindness, and genuine care.

reviews_list.author: Evan
reviews_list.text: I been here for two years. The staff is very friendly. They keep their building looking neat and tidy. They also take residents ideas and make them a reality. They even have a bird sanctuary. Would recommend for someone looking for a retirement community to move in to.

reviews_list.author: Pat Wimberly
reviews_list.text: In February my father relocated from Georgia to Texas following a move from Tennessee two months prior.   As we searched for similar similar living solutions, which prioritized friendly staff,  great food, activities, amenities, value, and thoughtful solutions along an with aging pathway for any future care, we found one clear winner in every category.   Two months later I have no doubt Grand Living - Georgetown delivers the best experience, and separately value, available when compared any other option in the area.  From the initial meeting, to watching how the team very successfully handled a city-wide (Georgetown) power outage, a concerned resident trying to reach an external doctor, to regularly viewing the whole team's approach to all situations, I have been nothing short of impressed and grateful.   I'd add an extra bit thanks to Cole Taylor, who handles their building and facilities.   His professionalism in multiple areas and ability to handle everything from  emergencies to guest and resident services or adapt to any  request is simply next level.       People here seem to have a kind attitude overall while enjoying life and caring for seniors.  In 25-30 years, I can absolutely see my wife and I living happily in a place like this.  The regular live music is outstanding too.

reviews_list.author: Diane Taylor
reviews_list.text: We love living at Grand Living Georgetown. It’s like an all-inclusive resort.  Great food, caring staff, lots of activities, and no worries about maintenance or house cleaning.  Our family loves coming to visit and is happy we are happy here.

reviews_list.author: Anita C
reviews_list.text: Grand Living is a premier Senior Living community here in Georgetown but an outstanding feature of this community is their fitness program led by Fitness Director extraordinaire, Brittany Mariscal. Brittany is at the top of her game … strong, focused, compassionate and demonstrates a genuine interest in her clients. We have a family member with Parkinson’s. Grand Living of Georgetown offers  the “Rock Steady Boxing” program which provides a specialized workout routine for those diagnosed with PD. Brittany is certified in this program and has delivered exceptional training at each and every session. Grand Living of Georgetown’s amenities would not be complete without a first rate fitness program especially if your loved one has Parkinson’s or another movement disorder.

name: The Delaney at Georgetown Village
description: The Delaney at Georgetown Village is a retirement community in Georgetown, TX, offering retirement community services. With a 4.6-star rating from 147 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated senior living communities providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: The Delaney at Georgetown Village provides quality senior living communities for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Derek S
reviews_list.text:
I hope my review helps guide you in finding the very best memory care / senior living home for your loved one. After 2 long weeks of touring multiple memory care locations in the Georgetown and the surrounding area, we chose the Delaney and here’s why.

First, my high school classmate from 1987 actually worked for The Delaney for 8 years so I had some good inside information as to why it’s ranked as the best facility in the area. She ended up putting own her mom there so that in itself gave me even more confidence in what can be one of the hardest decisions you will make in your life.

Our parents raised us and took care of us the best they could so now it was my time to give back and find my mom the best place to now call home. It is a very clean place and homey environment atmosphere.

So the results are in; after 2 months and 14 days.  I absolutely made the right decision for my mom. Shannan the memory care director has a wonderful dedicated loving team who will be completely focused and care for your loved one in every way possible. Shannan is just one call away from allowing me to check on my mom when I’m out of town. She’s has even taken my calls on her day off. This is an example of the high level of service and response the Delaney gives their residents and the families.

They make her bed everyday, they help her shower, they help her in the bathroom and even the cleaning staff (Tiffany) who keeps the place extremely clean loves and cares for my mom. They have med techs whose sole purpose is to administer medications on time, every time. They have nurses on site 24 hours a day and I’m one text away from requesting anything my mom may need or want.
They are also a class B facility which is very important to know. Just so many care givers dedicated to your loved ones needs.

It’s always enjoyable to visit my mom and take her to lunch or dinner in the many dining rooms they have. The food is amazing and they have 2 executive chef’s preparing some really great dishes. I would also point out that I have met the director of maintenance which is responsible for keeping the place so clean and everything working and they do a fine job. They even have a wonderful activity director coordinating environment and fun for the residents.

Go visit the Delaney and ask to meet the directors and you will understand how they have earned my perfect review.

Remember, you are doing what you have to do in a tough situation and knowing your loved one is safe and cared for so well will bring you comfort and peace of mind. If your loved one can’t be home anymore, this is the next best place to call home.

Blessings on your journey.

Derek

reviews_list.author: Trish Burns
reviews_list.text: The Delaney at Georgetown Independent Living is amazing! Beautiful building and grounds, delicious food, great activities, and welcoming residents! We can’t say enough nice things about the team. Jen, Mary Faith, and Liz are so warm, kind, and beyond helpful. There’s simply not a better place for your parents.

reviews_list.author: Ken Gibson
reviews_list.text: Well, where do I start about the Delaney?  Mom didn't begin her independent living journey at the Delaney, but I sure wish she had.  She absolutely loves it there.  The activities are amazing and the staff is very welcoming and loving.  Mom says living at the Delaney is living being on a cruise but without the water.  If you have a loved one that needs more attention than they can get living at home, consider the Delaney.  Mom spent many years as an activities director, in management staff, and consultant for facilities like this.  She did her homework before we moved her to the Delaney.  If you are considering an independent or assisted living home for a loved one, please visit the Delaney.  While you are there, ask for Geri, she will tell you how things are there.  Thank you Brian and Jennifer for making mom feel so welcome. You are rockstars in my book.

reviews_list.author: Patricia Graham
reviews_list.text: My husband has been a resident at The Delaney at Georgetown Village, Georgetown Texas for two and a half years. When the time came to find an Assisted Living facility that would meet my husband’s every need; from the friendly concierge’s, the executive staff, the nursing care, the server’s in the dining room, the activity directors, to the caregivers, this is the place that provides all those needs. When you walk in the doors of this immaculately clean facility you feel the love and caring attitude from everyone, even the residents. They truly are the reflection of The Delaney. No wander my husband calls this facility ‘home’. That is the true word that describes The Delaney at Georgetown. I highly recommend The Delaney at Georgetown if anyone is looking for a place for their loved ones. It will be a decision you will not regret.

reviews_list.author: Susan Timourian
reviews_list.text: Our families experience with the staff at the Delaney in particular the Assist Living has been excellent. Everyone from our initial meeting and tour with Kelly to the operations manager helping my father in law replace batteries in his remote to the continued patience that Amanda head of nursing shows on a daily basis with the ups and downs of elderly care. Everyone is willing to pitch in and help where they are needed. And if an issue does arise between the staff and my in laws they all sit down together and respectfully find a solution. I highly recommend the Delaney to families looking for a new home for their family members

reviews_list.author: Kevin Karschnik
reviews_list.text: The Delaney at Georgetown is a beautiful, well-maintained facility with an exceptionally helpful staff. I want to especially recognize Jennifer Slayton, Director of Sales and Marketing, for her outstanding support. She took the time to walk my dad and me through all the available options and offered thoughtful guidance during a very important transition in his life. Her professionalism and compassion made a difficult process feel manageable and reassuring.

reviews_list.author: Brittany Blevins-Leishman
reviews_list.text: Had a wonderful experience at the Delaney's Memory Care Art Gala in June.  It was great to see all of the residents artwork and the ability to bid on, and even buy, some of the art was a great idea. The Delaney has some very talented residents!

reviews_list.author: Armon Bakhtiari
reviews_list.text: Incredibly grateful for our experience with the team at The Delaney! This was a new world for our family and the staff was so helpful in helping us set mom up for success and make sure her needs were always put first. From Kelly serving to make sure mom felt welcome as she joined the community to Mary Faith’s dedication and love towards her daily, every member has treated us like they were truly caring for their own family. I can’t begin to express in a review the lengths that they’ll go to for the betterment of their residents’ wellbeing. Highly recommend this caring community!

reviews_list.author: Stephen Kennedy
reviews_list.text: My elderly in-laws are more than well-cared-for at The Delaney. In their 90s, they recently moved here from Oklahoma, and could not have moved into a better place. Staff are super friendly, and other residents are accepting and welcoming. I've joined them for lunch--and the food and the wait-staff are superb, which is fantastic! Their 'apartment' is roomy, clean, and well-tended. The Delaney is a state-of-the-art facility!

reviews_list.author: Katherine Hullum
reviews_list.text: Our Father was in the Memory Care Unit for 2 1\2 years at the Delaney. The staff and nurses were very nice to him, and helped him if needed.  Our Father like to kid around a lot and the staff always enjoyed him. The staff and nurses were always quick to call and let us know if if our Father was sick or was in need of something. His room was cleaned  and the laundry was taken care of. From the Director to the cleaning crew of the Delaney, the time that our Father was there, we were at ease because we knew he was being taken care of. We want  to say thank You to all of the people that took care of our Father Edward Jensen

name: Touchmark at Georgetown
description: Touchmark at Georgetown is a retirement community in Georgetown, TX, offering retirement community, assisted living facility, retirement home services. With a 4.7-star rating from 133 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated senior living communities providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Touchmark at Georgetown provides quality senior living communities for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Robin Donahe
reviews_list.text: We had the pleasure of visiting Touchmark to provide horse-drawn carriage rides for their residents and found the grounds to be beautifully maintained and very welcoming. The front entrance and lobby felt like stepping into a high-end, exclusive resort. Every staff member and resident we encountered was friendly, cheerful, and a joy to interact with.

reviews_list.author: Tracy Tatom
reviews_list.text:
This place beats all others to shame! It is the very best of the best! So many different activities and fun events. I was shocked at their pricing? Very competitive? Most people think it’s out of their league because of how high end everything is but when you average everything in, they actually beat pricing in some areas? It is a phenomenal assisted living facility.
We attended a special event, their (mole and margarita) presentation. It was fabulous! Their head chef’s actually performed and served a full course along with dessert! Unbelievable! You have to go and see this place!
My sister and brother in law are moving in in a month and I am thrilled for them!

reviews_list.author: Megan Nance
reviews_list.text: The Hacienda is a beautiful place, and the staff are wonderful. We had an amazing experience with Katelyn coordinating an event for the residents, and we had so much fun. Several of the residents told us that it was the most fun they had in years. Beyond impressed with the campus and the staff who ensure everyone is made to feel welcome.

reviews_list.author: Ruth Gamble
reviews_list.text: The Watermark for Children fundraiser at Hacienda in Georgetown was a stellar success! With enthusiasm, Katlyn Dady facilitated the event with enthusiasm,  professionalism, and genuine care. Fine arts, clever crafts and unique arts from sculpture to stain glass creations are a testament to the enduring talents of the Senior members in our community.

reviews_list.author: Christopher Washington
reviews_list.text:
Last month, I was invited by one of the program coordinators, Katlyn Dady, to bring the Southwestern University Jazz Band there, along with Cheyenne. We performed for their nightcap lounge series, which was welcomed with warmth and open arms.  This facility is absolutely amazing, the residents are charming, and they loved the music! We were appreciative of the staff's hospitality and looking forward to a revisit sometime soon! Thank you.

All the best here at The Hacienda at Georgetown 😁!

reviews_list.author: Ken Green
reviews_list.text:
Touchmark at Georgetown has been exceptionally helpful to our family. Mom transitioned from assisted living to memory care over the last year, and I have been amazed how great the staff is here. I have witnessed caregivers going above and beyond expectations many times while visiting, as well as on security camera footage. They have shown genuine concern for my mom and treat her with a loving respect. I think most places will be respectful. The memory care staff at Touchmark go beyond that and comfort by mom, act as a sounding board for her, engage in lengthy conversations, and show patience and kindness toward my mom. They provide her with dignity and as much autonomy as is safe for her.

If you have a loved one who needs memory care, I cannot recommend Touchmark at Georgetown highly enough. Their prices may seem high at first, but they don't hit you with "other costs" - you know the total amount you are paying up front. And that cost includes full service. My mom has high needs, and we pay for additional services. It's so worth it. Before getting to Touchmark, my mom would sit alone in her apartment, sometimes staying in bed all day. Here she is greeted cheerily in the morning and invited to breakfast. Most days my mom - who used to sit in bed all day - doesn't return to her room until 2 or 3pm. She is kept busy, engaged in activities or a meal until well after lunch. Later, she will leave her room for dinner around 5pm and doesn't return until 7 or 8pm - again, because she is engaged and interacting with other people. This social interaction is essential for my mom's well-being.

Go talk to the memory care staff. Speak with the memory care director Randi Meachum about your loved one's needs. They don't try to "sell you" - they genuinely want to understand your family member's needs and are willing to work with the family to find the best solution. They are willing to address any issues or complaints without being defensive, and approach from a problem-solving perspective. I am convinced my mom could not get better service at any price. At least once a week, I remark to my wife or brother how grateful I am for the staff at Touchmark at Georgetown. Knowing my mom is in good hands and not only getting her needs met, but actually getting social interaction and thriving has provided a tremendous amount of relief for me and my family. Thank you Touchmark!!

(update) I forgot to add that the facility is beautiful! There is no "institution vibe" at all. The grounds are pretty and inviting, residents have a gorgeous landscaped patio outside, the furniture is new and well-maintained, even the carpet is nice.

reviews_list.author: Victoria Del Fonso Francisco
reviews_list.text: I have been to The Hacienda twice for their events. The facility itself is impressive! It's like living at a resort (I had to ask what age I had to be in order to move in haha). I strike up conversations with their residents and the ones I spoke to ALL say they love living there. I notice the staff are always pleasant and friendly when they pass the residents in the hallways. Katlyn is the Senior Community Life Coordinator, and she deserves to be singled out! She goes above and beyond to organize unique events for the residents, including trips outside of the community. She genuinely cares for the residents and it shows!

reviews_list.author: Patricia Wojtowecz
reviews_list.text: I was fortunate to have the opportunity to help merge some of the Williamson County Art Guild members with the Hacienda at Georgetown for their "Artistic Expressions Walkabout" on June 26. Katlyn Dady (Fitzgerald), the Senior Community Life Coordinator & Outreach liaison for the Hacienda was just incredible to work with. Not only was she very warm and inviting to us but also to every person I saw her come into contact with - visitors, artists, their staff and members. She and her team were also very organized in setting up this event and everyone seemed to be having a wonderful time. Overall it was a great experience and the guild is hoping to have more interactions with the folks at the Hacienda in the future!

reviews_list.author: Frank Edwards
reviews_list.text: Very nice high end retirement facility in Georgetown, Texas.  Mary Claire did an excellent job of showing us around The Hacienda and answered all our questions.  We were treated to a nice luncheon.  The food and service are excellent.

reviews_list.author: Leonard Gray
reviews_list.text: Mary Claire was great. She showed us several apartment options and answered our many questions.   She also provided additional info after our visit. It’s a difficult decision for us to make and we decided we are not ready to make the move at this time.

name: The Oaks Gracious Retirement Living
description: The Oaks Gracious Retirement Living is a retirement community in Georgetown, TX, offering retirement community services. With a 4.8-star rating from 65 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated senior living communities providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: The Oaks Gracious Retirement Living provides quality senior living communities for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Ebru Karaer
reviews_list.text: The Oaks Gracious Retirement Living is a wonderful community. The team is fantastic, and the building looks beautifully remodeled, clean, and truly homey. The atmosphere was full and buzzing when I visited, which speaks volumes about how engaged and active the residents are!! It was also really nice meeting Oksana — she was so kind and welcoming, and she clearly cares about the families she works with. If you’re looking for independent living for your loved one, The Oaks is a great choice.

reviews_list.author: Imani
reviews_list.text: I LOVE the Oaks. I have been in senior living communities all over Texas and this place is special. The residents are always doing something cool and fun. The staff are all smiles and I love working with Rachel, she is a pleasure.

reviews_list.author: Virginia Livesay
reviews_list.text:
I lived at the Oaks for 1 year and 5 months. I moved there because I was a caregiver for someone who had become difficult for me to care for. And while it is an independent living situation, the 3 meals a day took the burden of cooking off my shoulders. I met the loveliest people there. They were friendly and kind.  They emphasized Community and everyone there looked out for each other in a respectful and private way. The building itself was beautifully kept, decorated tastefully, clean, and comfortable with many places to sit and read, visit, and play games. The grounds were also well planned with safe places to walk and play with your dog.
