Pricing is super reasonable and I love that everything is indoors. I love Texas, but the heat is aggressive and I like being indoors for activities. The facility is very clean and everyone was very welcoming. Jared was really great. We look forward to returning soon and frequently!

reviews_list.author: Monica Smith
reviews_list.text: Pickleball Kingdom hosted our company's first annual pickleball tournament and it was awesome! The PK staff directed our event, explained the rules, and kept things running smoothly. The new PK facilities are beautiful, air conditioned, and outfitted with leather couches, bleachers, screens for music, and all the latest equipment. They made everything so fun and easy. You can take your own cooler of drinks or purchase there. We are looking forward to this being a new team tradition. Thanks PK!

name: Williamson County Parks & Rec
description: Williamson County Parks & Rec is a attractions in Leander, TX, offering park services. With a 4.7-star rating from 167 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated pickleball courts providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Williamson County Parks & Rec provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Leander, TX.

reviews_list.author: Egídio Leitão
reviews_list.text: Great bike trail. I took a couple of the side trails to add a more rugged track. It was great. If you do that, have a compass or GPS to know where you're going.

reviews_list.author: Kenny Simmel
reviews_list.text: Played Sunday morning.  Course has some long pars.  Pretty nice.  Was some dew on the grass.  Need to add a hand towel to my bag.  I dont have a great long game so this is not my best course, but I still had a great time.  First 9 seemed easier than back 9.

reviews_list.author: Phantom Snipe
reviews_list.text: Good amount of courts and fields. sometimes the park rangers are doing too much.

reviews_list.author: Andrew Waggoner
reviews_list.text:
amazing location, huge park, tons of soccer field, tennis courts, basketball court, a railroad for the kiddos as well as a splash pad, to top it off I frequently see the cutests families of deer just hanging out... I go here daily sometimes 2x. love it. hats off to the groundspeople on the golf carts. they keep the place tip top and gives a nice sense of security.

keep it up

reviews_list.author: C
reviews_list.text: One of the biggest and cleanest public parks I’ve encountered in my lifetime.  It’s never crowded and it’s honestly a gem in the cedar park area.  Several full sized basketball courts, several differing sized soccer pitches, a track, a few football field, trails, a splash pad, a nice disc golf course, and much more!

reviews_list.author: Ramla S
reviews_list.text: This is a great park with a variety of amenities. Great for workout and walking with trails.

reviews_list.author: Jay Green
reviews_list.text:
I love this park.
For running, riding a bike, riding the Onewheel.
Great trails, peaceful park.
"Central Park" of the Williamson county.

reviews_list.author: Opeyemi Sofolahan
reviews_list.text:
Great place
Spacious, loads of fun things to do. Clean rest rooms and kids friendly

reviews_list.author: Karen Rivera
reviews_list.text: We enjoy disc golfing here. The course is kept clean and cut when we do come and is dog friendly.

reviews_list.author: Tomas Maybach
reviews_list.text: Walking trails are peaceful and quiet. This place is a gem.....

name: Lake Forest HOA Tennis & Pickleball Court
address: 2774 Lake Forest Dr, Round Rock, TX 78665
description: Lake Forest HOA Tennis & Pickleball Court is a tennis court in Round Rock, TX, offering tennis court services. Rated 5 stars based on 12 reviews, they provide quality pickleball courts for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Lake Forest HOA Tennis & Pickleball Court provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Ms. Kym Boss*Lady
reviews_list.text: Less than 7 days ago it was 7° today it is 77° I am enjoying the sunshine on this neighborhood trail. Very well taken care of which is appreciated. It's obvious damage from the winter storm to the greenery but will be back in no time. The water looked nice from my view. I plan on returning to take in some more of the scenery. Enjoyed it very much 👍. See you again soon!

reviews_list.author: Nick Chan
reviews_list.text: Really well kept court. It’s 1 tennis court with 2 pickleball court lines on each side. There’s overhead lighting to play at night.

reviews_list.author: Brett Bunch
reviews_list.text: One court, fully fenced, in good shape. No wind screens, but trees block the wind from one side. Quiet neighborhood setting with a nice view of a small lake.

reviews_list.author: Vora Tirth
reviews_list.text: I am enjoying the sunshine on this neighborhood trail. Very well taken care of which is appreciated. It's obvious damage from the winter storm to the greenery but will be back in no time. The water looked nice from my view. I plan on returning to take in some more of the scenery. Enjoyed it very much 👍. See you again soon!

reviews_list.author: Richard White
reviews_list.text: Great private court and lights!!

name: Vets Park Pickleball Courts
address: W New Hope Dr, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Vets Park Pickleball Courts is a attractions in Cedar Park, TX, offering park services. With a 4.6-star rating from 47 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated pickleball courts providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Vets Park Pickleball Courts provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Cedar Park, TX.

reviews_list.author: Michael Dolan
reviews_list.text:
Great courts, they are really close together so if it’s busy there’s a lot of balls crossing into your court during game play. There’s also some gaps in the fence but there’s easy access around the court to retrieve balls.

Lighting is pretty good. Fencing is sturdy, there’s new concrete and benches but no shade yet. Looks like some is coming though.

There were a lot of people out for a Thursday evening. Lights go out right at 10pm.

reviews_list.author: armando jasso
reviews_list.text: love the seating improvements they've made adding concrete and shade.  Wish the courts were more spread apart but I do love playing here.  You can find games for all levels of play.

reviews_list.author: Big Dink Energy Podcast
reviews_list.text:
6 clean outdoor courts with great community vibes. Regulars were super welcoming and even offered tips and coaching. Free parking, covered seating, and fun park amenities nearby.
See our full review on our sister company Dink and Dash on Instagram 👉 @dink_and_dash

reviews_list.author: Jose Arguelles
reviews_list.text: Great courts, you can start playing at 6 am. You just have to turn the lights on, and you can play till 10 pm. Open play beginner level up to 4+

reviews_list.author: V.
reviews_list.text: Good pickleball here however wait times can get a little extreme at sundown. Courts are new. No challenge court as of June 2024. They are adding bleachers so they're investing more here. Rotations are decently quick with 8 courts total. Water and bathrooms a short walk away. Lighting is good. Place shuts down at 10pm.

reviews_list.author: Brianna Neider
reviews_list.text: I wish there were more courts, but we got a fair amount of playing time so I can't complain too much. The turn based honor system is way cool though. Back home (Vegas) people can use the public courts as long as they want with no requirement to give others a turn and you might wait for hours before you get an empty court. The courts at Vet's were way easier to rotate around. Don't bring a lot of stuff since you'll have to carry it on and off court every time you switch around. Way fun and chill atmosphere though. Nicely lit and courts are in good condition.

reviews_list.author: Kersten Hallander
reviews_list.text:
Bestest funnest spot in Cedar Park every night!
For pickleball lessons DM me on Facebook

reviews_list.author: Lee Deskins
reviews_list.text: The courts were busy but not too busy. Everyone was friendly. There are 4 dedicated pickleball courts with permanent nets and 4 more somewhat dedicated courts with portable Selkirk nets (they do have other lines on the courts). There are no nets or fences between each of the 4 courts so there is a lot of interruption of play.

reviews_list.author: Andy Anderson
reviews_list.text: Very nice pickleball courts. Friendly people

reviews_list.author: Javier Guzman
reviews_list.text: Great courts love paddle up system. If you are uber good you may need to bring a group. The people are awesome and inviting and the play was fun!

name: Taylor Pickleball Courts
description: Taylor Pickleball Courts is a attractions in Taylor, TX, offering park services. Rated 4.1 stars based on 7 reviews, they provide quality pickleball courts for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Taylor Pickleball Courts provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Taylor, TX.

reviews_list.author: Kaitlyn Simon
reviews_list.text: 6 pickleball courts repainted with new nets. Lights were on till at least 10pm. 5 stars all the way.

reviews_list.author: John Kitsmiller
reviews_list.text: So glad to have such nice pickleball courts in Taylor. Next... bathrooms really need help.

reviews_list.author: Nicky St Clair
reviews_list.text: There's no nets to play pickleball.

reviews_list.author: JR C.
reviews_list.text: Shhh my hidden Williamson Co secret 😎🫠🥱🤭

reviews_list.author: Jose Gaspar
reviews_list.text: I don't know this place really probably pass by

reviews_list.author: kaleb williams
reviews_list.text: It’s pickleball!

name: Southwest Williamson County Regional Park
description: Southwest Williamson County Regional Park is a attractions in Leander, TX, offering park, tourist attraction services. With a 4.7-star rating from 1431 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated pickleball courts providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Southwest Williamson County Regional Park provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Leander, TX.

reviews_list.author: Egídio Leitão
reviews_list.text: This is a very good trail. I was going around the park's perimeter, but I took a couple of side trails. It was more rugged and didn't have any signage. Be sure to have GPS or compass to know your way around.

reviews_list.author: Jazzy Jazz
reviews_list.text: $2 per person. You can reserve a table but there are tables so you don’t have to pay to sit down. Nice trees for shade. There is a sandbox so bring plenty of buckets. Bathrooms are pretty clean. Nice parking. No vending machines. Overall good place to take the kiddies to get out the house on a hot day.

reviews_list.author: Joshua Davis
reviews_list.text: This is a great park with lots to do but the Cedar Rock Railroad and Quarry Spalsh pad are definitely the highlights. Both have their own fees but it's worth it for a day at the park.

reviews_list.author: Monica V
reviews_list.text: Very nice, clean, fun place to enjoy with the entire family! 😁 There are no food/drinks for sale, so make sure you come prepared with drinks to hydrate.🧃🥤 Take a seat at one of the picnic tables (there are plenty) or bring a picnic blanket to eat a snack/meal.🍓🥪 The cost is $2/person which is reasonable. We will be back!💫

reviews_list.author: Madi
reviews_list.text: lots of amenities really great for adults and kids into sports! Although the playground doesn’t really have much shade and not very baby friendly. Otherwise, everything else is great.

reviews_list.author: Shama Ram
reviews_list.text: Great place for the kids to enjoy the splash pad. Ample parking spots. There are several other fields to play various sports.

reviews_list.author: Chris Ahn
reviews_list.text: One of the best park in Austin area!   The size is big and it has soccer, field hockey, cricket, basketball and many more places like that.  Also people are doing fishing in a small pond in west and there is small train you could ride on to make a big circle.  It has a playground for kids and a long trail for walking or biking too!

reviews_list.author: Luisa Hernandez
reviews_list.text: Great open park with lots of amenities. Very open green spaces and a lake! You can even take a train ride ($4)

reviews_list.author: Lindsey Robinson
reviews_list.text: Awesome disc golf course. Great holes, people, and they have bathrooms located at the entrance. Saw the eclipse while I was there and someone let us use their glasses to see it. Memorable day.

reviews_list.author: Natalie Hubert
reviews_list.text: Love this place. Great running trails and fields for all kinds of sports. Our happy place during soccer season.

name: Clay Madsen Recreation Center
address: 1600 Gattis School Rd, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Clay Madsen Recreation Center is a recreation center in Round Rock, TX, offering recreation center services. With a 4.5-star rating from 727 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated pickleball courts providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Clay Madsen Recreation Center provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Mario and Granddaughters
reviews_list.text: Great water aerobics classes at 8:30 & 9:30 am Mon thru Fri am. Heather & Terri are great instructors! They just added a 3 pm afternoon water aerobics class on Tuesday & Thursday. Joining the recreation center is way affordable & costs much less than joining a gym

reviews_list.author: Azilee
reviews_list.text: What a crap shoot.  We have been to a few volleyball camps here and participated in the track team here as well, years ago.  I have never seen the disorganization that we have witnessed!  The girls don't have a coach, they don't give refunds and even though we have 6 more games... there are NO more practices!! Makes no common sense.

reviews_list.author: Robby Sanchez
reviews_list.text: Good gym. Just wish they had spin bikes. The only ones they have are only used for the classes. And when the classes aren't going they still don't allow people to use them.

reviews_list.author: pr k
reviews_list.text:
Front staff is always very helpful and nice!
I go for a regular weight workout in the new outdoor workout area and use the pool when I can.
It is a nice gym w/ great variety and awesome rates. We have been a part of their youth outdoor groups, classes and bootcamps since moving here in 2016.
A few parts of the facilities are a bit limited, like the indoor gym equipment. They do have a decent selection of weight machines but, I ended up going to another gym because I wanted a bigger collection.
I still come here, though, for a paid workout class and we patronize the facility when possible.

reviews_list.author: Connie Rackel
reviews_list.text: That had their annual bizarre today they had a lot of really cool stuff. I love crafts. Amazing the things people make.

reviews_list.author: Unscriptedmomlife
reviews_list.text: The facility has so much to offer from volleyball to racquetball. The safe is very friendly and answer any questions we had. They are also very good at returning phone calls. They offer a variety of activities. You do have to pay to join.

reviews_list.author: Arul vijayan
reviews_list.text: Front office employees are great and goos service. fitting room, pool, basketball court, ratchet ball court, outdoor roller exercise field. Practical community recreation center. Very nice place for family , kids and friends

reviews_list.author: Cathleen Ash
reviews_list.text: Just joined again for a year... hopefully will use it more faithfully! Great deal for over 50 getting a clay madsen and baca center membership combined $110 for both places.  Summer schedule looks great because i want to try out yoga!

reviews_list.author: Maria Del Valle
reviews_list.text: Big fan!! Great instructor Angela,  La tisha and Jay are my favs.

reviews_list.author: Héctor Quartino
reviews_list.text:
They need to do a better job in processing cancellations, tried to cancel an activity and they did not respond to website contact nor return voicemails, and when they finally answered the phone I was given a run-around around with the activity coordinator.

UPDATE: Was able to get the cancellation processed.

name: Coach Tim Pickleball Training LLC
address: 77 Twin Ridge Pkwy, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Coach Tim Pickleball Training LLC is a pickleball court in Round Rock, TX, offering pickleball court services. With a 5-star rating from 24 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated pickleball courts providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Coach Tim Pickleball Training LLC provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Swetha Chauah
reviews_list.text: Tim is an outstanding pickleball coach! As someone who has never played a sport in my life, I was quite nervous to start pickleball. However, Tim’s incredible patience and kindness made me feel comfortable from day one. He is a true professional who is always on time and clearly has a deep love for the game. He has a great eye for recognizing weak areas and provides clear, actionable guidance to help you improve. If you’re looking for a coach who is both expert and encouraging, Tim is the best!

reviews_list.author: Laura
reviews_list.text: I've been taking clinics with Tim since the summer of 2024. He taught me to play pickleball! He is a great coach who uses engaging games and drills to enhance his students' pickleball skills. I highly recommend him for beginner, intermediate, and advanced clinics. He can offer something for any point in one's pickleball journey!

reviews_list.author: Susan Yarbrough
reviews_list.text: Tim has been perfect for me with my general lack of knowledge of the game and teaching me the strategies to take my game to a higher level. I am not an aggressive player, and he has worked with me on the level that i want to play the game. He is always quick to respond to text message and very flexible. I would recommend Tim to anyone who wants to learn more about the game and develop their skills.

reviews_list.author: FULYA KICIKOGLU
reviews_list.text: Our 6-year-old worked with Coach Tim for a few months and absolutely loved it. Tim is wonderful with kids—patient, upbeat, and so encouraging. My son looked forward to every lesson, and his confidence and coordination improved a ton. Highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: sharon
reviews_list.text: Coach Tom is the best! My sister and I have been taking lessons from him since January. We don’t come from a sports background. He is helpful, encouraging and teaches how to play real pickleball. We take private lessons and do open play. Couldn’t ask for a better coach!

reviews_list.author: Kim Boyenga
reviews_list.text: Coach Tim is great! Super patient, welcoming and easy to learn from. Provides tips to improve technique along with direction around game strategy. Highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Gina Calderwood
reviews_list.text:
I’ve been taking lessons with Coach Tim for the past few months, and I couldn’t be more impressed with his teaching style and expertise. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, Coach Tim is able to tailor lessons to meet your individual needs, providing both constructive feedback and encouragement.

What really sets Tim apart is his ability to break down complex skills into manageable steps. He is able to focus on improving my technique, footwork, and strategy, but also make sure that I’m having fun while learning. I’ve seen noticeable improvement in my game, and I’m now more confident on the court than ever before.

Coach also creates a positive, supportive environment, which is crucial in a sport like pickleball where learning and improving can sometimes feel overwhelming. Whether you’re looking to improve your serve, develop better court awareness, or simply enjoy the game more, I highly recommend Coach Tim!

reviews_list.author: Robin Reich
reviews_list.text: I was fortunate enough to find Tim when I started my pickleball journey. He is a fantastic coach for all levels of players. He explains the fundamentals, why they are important, and then builds your confidence and skills up from there. Tim has taught me so much and I will continue to book lessons and clinics with him to expand on what I’ve learned and try to further improve my play. He is patient, very approachable, makes the lessons fun, and everyone that I know that has taken a lesson with him has improved. Highly recommend to all!!

reviews_list.author: Valinda Dudley
reviews_list.text: Coach Tim is a wonderful instructor.  I live in Florida and book lessons with him everytime I am in the area. His unique approach to the game and teaching style is top notch. I highly recommend Coach Tim if you are a beginner or an advanced player. He does not offer cookie cutter lessons, but tailored lessons for each client.  He truly is a professional!!!!

reviews_list.author: Debbie Hays
reviews_list.text: I love Pickle Ball and Coach Tim!  I have no previous sports experience at all. Coach Tim is very kind and  patient. Working with me he explained  how the sport works and made it fun to learn.  He always encourages me and roots for me and is excited as I have progressed. He’s just the best!

name: SW Williamson County Park Basketball Courts
description: SW Williamson County Park Basketball Courts is a basketball court in Round Rock, TX, offering basketball court services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 14 reviews, they provide quality pickleball courts for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: SW Williamson County Park Basketball Courts provides quality pickleball courts for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Mr. Bravo
reviews_list.text: The backboards are way too small and most of the rims did not have nets. I wish these courts where better so we could run some full court games

reviews_list.author: Tom Ford
reviews_list.text: I come here for Pickleball they have 6 brand new courts. Open play and a bunch of beginners.

reviews_list.author: Maribel Allan
reviews_list.text: Lots of people playing pickleball but the line was moving fast.

reviews_list.author: Tensae Laki
reviews_list.text: Rims are both broken, both at height that’s possible to dunk and it’s impossible to put them back up

reviews_list.author: Michael Peck
reviews_list.text:
Love the new Pickleball courts!

They have installed wind block mesh.

Love it.

reviews_list.author: Mike lim
reviews_list.text:
Poor court light management, turns other fields that are not occupied and leaves basketball court light completely off. Not conserving power base on usage.

Tax payer waste on great park

reviews_list.author: Saucedef
reviews_list.text: Many many hoops for you to always have somewhere to play

reviews_list.author: Connor Todd (Connoro)
reviews_list.text: Nice court

reviews_list.author: Leander
reviews_list.text: Fun court....

name: Allen R Baca Center for Senior and Community Activities
address: 301 W Bagdad Ave bldg 2, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Allen R Baca Center for Senior and Community Activities is a senior citizen center in Round Rock, TX, offering senior citizen center, recreation center services. With a 4.6-star rating from 305 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Allen R Baca Center for Senior and Community Activities provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Rosemary McKnight
reviews_list.text: Lovely wedding for Ricky & Brenda Gleason. Large enough to hold the wedding & reception. Congratulations Ricky & Brenda!

reviews_list.author: Kathy BrenchleyBulger
reviews_list.text: If you are 60+ please stop in! The offer a plethora of activities to keep you active and engaged. A hidden gem

reviews_list.author: I 2Sing
reviews_list.text: This venue is the best! I just helped host a baby shower and it was an amazing time had by all. The facility is super clean and the staff are so awesome and attentive and so helpful. It made the celebration that much more special! They have different size rooms that will fit any occasion you may have, small or large. Thank you Katy, Anita, Mike, Dana and all the staff for being so helpful, patient and accommodating! I am so thankful that Round Rock has this jewel of a place for your special occasion!

reviews_list.author: Evan Morris
reviews_list.text: Really nice community center in a safe area that is close to a lot of good restaurants/bars etc

reviews_list.author: Pam J.
reviews_list.text: We had a wonderful evening at the BACA Center Art event! The facilities are nice, beautiful art work, & a fun, enjoyable time had by all! It was very interactive and family friendly. Looking forward to the next art event at the BACA Center! 😃 💕

reviews_list.author: Penny Brant
reviews_list.text: We attended a birthday party here and the location, parking, and room with a kitchen are absolutely perfect!  I would highly recommend to anyone in the area!

reviews_list.author: Pat Dawson
reviews_list.text: Went to a 42 domino group.  Had a lot of fun.  Nice people.

reviews_list.author: Rob Monroe
reviews_list.text: Many services, good place to vote.  Place is clean, staff is friendly.

reviews_list.author: Dani M
reviews_list.text: We booked 2 rooms for a meeting at this center and had an excellent experience. The man who greeted us at the front desk was kind and helpful. He showed us where to go and provided a cart for us to move items in. Our meeting rooms had options for arranging how we could have it situated and plenty of seating and it was well priced. I had no idea this place was here and my daughter discovered it by accident but we will definitely be utilizing the Baca Center in the future!

reviews_list.author: Clydene Cooper
reviews_list.text: My husband does wood carving and meets friends there.

name: Georgetown Recreation Center
description: Georgetown Recreation Center is a recreation center in Georgetown, TX, offering recreation center services. With a 4.5-star rating from 549 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Georgetown Recreation Center provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: curtis thompson
reviews_list.text:
The Georgetown Rec Center is truly one of the best community resources we have. There’s so much to do here — it has everything you could want and more! From a giant indoor pool to racquetball courts, an indoor track, and an impressive lineup of fitness and community classes, it’s designed for every age and interest.

What really sets it apart is how well it brings people together. Whether you’re working out, taking a class, or just exploring something new, there’s always a welcoming atmosphere and plenty of friendly faces.

Excellent amenities, great value, and a place that truly reflects the heart of Georgetown. Highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Jonni Meredith
reviews_list.text: The rec center is such a great service to the Georgetown Community. The pool is always plain and the lifeguards do a good job of keeping everyone safe. The weight room sometimes feels quite crowded, but then other times it does not. There are a couple of leg machines missing such as leg extension and leg curl I believe. But other than that you can get a decent workout in. I love that they communicate about the courts being used for youth sports. Even before you enter the building they have a sign that says Court number one closed today, pool, etc.

reviews_list.author: David
reviews_list.text: Very nice place. My kids love coming here especially with indoor swimming pool and basketball courts.

reviews_list.author: Monica Atherton
reviews_list.text: Georgetown Recreation Center is a fantastic facility for anyone looking to stay active and healthy. The gym is well-equipped with both machines and free weights, perfect for all fitness levels. The indoor track offers a great space for running or walking, especially during those hot Texas summers. Plus, the lap pool is always clean and well-maintained, providing an excellent option for swimmers. Whether you're into cardio, strength training, or swimming, Georgetown Recreation Center has everything you need to keep fit and enjoy your workout. Highly recommended!

reviews_list.author: Mr. No Tengo Dinero
reviews_list.text:
Twas a first time visiting this facility! I didn’t use the inside area but open field on the outside! Great place to get your outdoor sports done! Kids were playing the baseball tournament and we played soccer! ⚽️
Best way to sweat yourself! Will be back again!

reviews_list.author: Shawn Authement
reviews_list.text: Awesome facility.  4 basketball courts, 2 racquetball courts, kids play area, workout area, two rooms with exercise equipment such as exercise bikes, an indoor pool, etc.  Staff is very nice and helpful.

reviews_list.author: Gustavo Kennedy
reviews_list.text: As a local resident of Georgetown. I love the Rec Center it’s more than a gym. It’s a community center that’s  focused on the community of Georgetown and their guests. They also have programs children and youths ie sports camps etc. they offer days passes that less than 10 dollars for one day or monthly pass that are 30 for residents and 35 outside residents etc. it’s affordable for everyone. Also it really is a judgment free zone. My favorite area are the upstairs track comes handy during the hot summer when walking in the parks is to hot. The work out area with all the machines and free waits is awesome. However it would be nice if they can add stair masters also. Overall I am really pleased with my experience there.

reviews_list.author: Monica Atherton
reviews_list.text: The Georgetown Rec is awesome! It’s super clean, the staff is really nice, and there’s so much to do. The gym has great equipment, the pool is fun, and there are lots of classes for all ages. It’s a great place to stay active and meet friendly people. I love coming here!"

reviews_list.author: Casbreanna Davis
reviews_list.text: I love the rec kind of sad that they'll be closed on August 25th to September 1st I'm going to be bored. 😂

reviews_list.author: Sneha Madhuri
reviews_list.text: The renovated bathrooms splash pads and the parking made it perfect picnic day for ur family with kids with playgrounds and picnic areas

name: Georgetown Fitness
description: Georgetown Fitness is a gym in Georgetown, TX, offering gym, fitness center, personal trainer services. With a 5-star rating from 1117 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Georgetown Fitness provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Bob McFarland
reviews_list.text:
I started training here in January 2023 after a triple heart bypass in August 2022 and follow on PT until the end of 2022.  In early January 2023 my cardiologist was reviewing my case and he said “I want you to look like one of those ‘skinny fit’ old guys waiting to see me in my waiting room.”  I told him the only thing that ever worked for me was weight training with a personal trainer.  I had tried to find a good professional trainer in Georgetown, but the trainers I found were terrible.  He said he knew a great one that was his personal trainer.  He introduced me and he indeed was a true professional and exercise physiologist who knew the science of weight training.  I worked with him about 15 months, when he had to leave for a job in another town.  But he picked another trainer for me who he thought was excellent and I would like.  His name is Michael Schwertner and he is fantastic.  I have made excellent muscle gains with Michael.  So since starting to do weight training at Georgetown Fitness with personal trainers, I have lost about 50+ pounds and gained a lot of muscle at the same time.

I highly recommend Georgetown Fitness and their team of professional trainers.

I’ve attached a before and after picture to show my results.  I’ll be 77 in about 2 weeks.  Train hard, eat right, and you can get great results too.

reviews_list.author: Kyle Spence
reviews_list.text:
Great gym with a solid atmosphere. Georgetown Fitness is local family-owned and it shows. Everyone is friendly, respectful, and actually cares about the place and the people in it. The gym is clean, well maintained, and has all the equipment you need for a good workout.

No ego, no nonsense, just a good place to train. If you’re looking for a local gym with good people and a strong community, this is the spot. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Brittany Solano
reviews_list.text: Georgetown Fitness is extremely well equipped and always clean. Tons of space, high-quality equipment, and everything is well maintained. Easily one of the best gyms in town.

reviews_list.author: David Macha
reviews_list.text:
I am visiting from out of town, and this gym immediately made me feel welcome. The facility is clean, well organized, and clearly well cared for. The equipment selection is outstanding, with a wide variety that supports every style of training. As someone who takes bodybuilding very seriously, I was impressed by how well equipped the space is and how easy it is to get a complete, structured workout in. The Matrix machines are a personal favorite, and this gym has an excellent lineup of them.

The atmosphere is both friendly and focused, making it a great fit for anyone, from beginners to serious lifters. Whether you are a dedicated bodybuilder, someone working on general fitness, visiting from out of town, or living in the area, this is a gym you will look forward to coming back to. I highly recommend it.

reviews_list.author: Gus Crimm
reviews_list.text: Great gym! I've worked out at all of the gyms in Georgetown, and this one is by far the best. Equipment is always clean, everyone re-racks their weights, music is at the right volume, and I never have to wait for equipment. I've been training with Brennan for about six months - he's a terrific trainer! Constant positive attitude, always encouraging, and he knows what he's talking about.

reviews_list.author: Angie Stark
reviews_list.text: I am so happy we found Georgetown Fitness. The whole space feels organized and well equipped with varied machines and weight sets. The machines are also well maintained. The staff/trainers are warm and welcoming. Brennan (owner) is such a genuinely nice guy. Vibes are always good. This place is exactly what you’d hope for from a neighborhood gym.

reviews_list.author: Jenn Hu
reviews_list.text: Great first experience at this gym - everyone was extremely nice and inviting. The equipment appears to be well taken care of, the gym was clean, and it wasn’t too crowded. They had a good variety of equipment and had everything you could possibly need. Will be back in the future!

reviews_list.author: Stanley Smith
reviews_list.text: Went in and got a day pass and right off the bat I noticed that it was Very organized and extremely clean. Staff was super friendly and welcoming. All the equipment is in good working condition and spray bottles and towels all around the gym to clean equipment after you are done using. Georgetown fitness definitely gained another member!

reviews_list.author: Donovan Scott
reviews_list.text: I met my awesome trainer Michael Schwertner here to continue my post-hip replacement surgery rehabilitation and getting back to competitive volleyball shape.  The process of getting the waiver signed with Brennan and getting started was easy and fast!  The gym is well organized and clean, and they not only have lots of machines, free weights, and cardio machines, but also have a full functional strength area and equipment!  I had a great session with Michael and will definitely be back!

reviews_list.author: Roee
reviews_list.text: Finding Georgetown Fitness has been such a win. The gym is laid out thoughtfully, with plenty of machines and weights to choose from, all kept in great shape. The team there is incredibly friendly, and Brennan, the owner, is truly a standout person. The energy is consistently upbeat. It’s everything you’d expect from a great community gym

name: Get Age Fit
description: Get Age Fit is a personal trainer in Georgetown, TX, offering personal trainer, fitness center services. With a 4.9-star rating from 114 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Get Age Fit provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: J. Bryant Boyd
reviews_list.text:
I’ve been working with James Peterson at Get Age Fit since February 2024, and the results have been remarkable. James pushes us to work hard but always within our abilities, ensuring every workout is both challenging and safe. I’m now stronger and in better shape than I’ve been in decades!

After undergoing total knee replacement surgery in December 2024, James tailored my training to support my recovery. Thanks to his expertise and encouragement, I’ve regained full strength and stability — I actually feel more confident on that knee than I have in years.

My wife and I train together, and our sessions have become a fun, motivating, and even a little competitive part of our week. James and the entire team at Get Age Fit have truly changed our lives for the better. We can’t recommend them highly enough!

reviews_list.author: Mike Williams
reviews_list.text:
A Truly Life-Changing Gym Experience – GetAgeFit

My partner and I joined GetAgeFit through their couples 2-for-1 promotion, and from the very first meeting we knew we had found something special. Theo Thurston, the owner and creator of GetAgeFit, has built more than just a gym — he’s created a community and a program that helps people improve every aspect of their lives, not just their fitness.

Theo personally spent over an hour with us explaining his approach, which draws inspiration from Bill Phillips’ Body for Life program and the Time Under Tension training method. The structured 12-week program includes three weight training sessions (each lasting about 45 minutes to an hour), three cardio sessions per week, and nutritional counseling that really ties everything together. Theo’s philosophy makes it clear that nutrition, flexibility, and mindset are just as important as strength and endurance.

After our initial meeting, Theo matched us with Will, our personal trainer, and we couldn’t have asked for a better fit. Will took the time to really understand our goals and abilities, and as we progressed, he continuously adapted our workouts to keep us challenged and motivated. Each session was focused and efficient — in under an hour we got a full, high-quality workout without ever feeling rushed or overwhelmed. Will also taught us the importance of stretching and shared simple daily routines we could do at home to support our training and overall well-being.

Even after completing the 12-week program, we continued training with Will three times a week because we saw such incredible results — not just physically, but mentally and emotionally as well. Unfortunately, we eventually moved out of the area for family reasons, but we left GetAgeFit with the tools, knowledge, and confidence to continue training on our own.

GetAgeFit isn’t just about lifting weights or counting calories — it’s about learning how your body works and how to keep improving as you age. Theo and his team of trainers truly care about their clients’ success and overall quality of life. We’re deeply grateful for the experience and highly recommend GetAgeFit to anyone looking to transform not just their body, but their entire approach to health and longevity.

reviews_list.author: Mickey Powell
reviews_list.text: I have been training at Get Age Fit since March of 2024.  James Peterson is my trainer and I am amazed at the work he puts in to help me continue to get in better shape.  The weight training and cardio workouts have made an enormous difference for me in strength and endurance.  My wife and I train together and James keeps us busy for the entire workout.  At 70 years old, I am truly stronger now than ever before. We look forward to training sessions 3 days each week, with cardio on alternate days.  I highly recommend Get Age Fit if you want to improve your life and have a more active lifestyle.

reviews_list.author: Charles Smith
reviews_list.text: My Get Age Fit trainers have been great. They listen to what I’ve wanted to accomplish in my goals to help with my weight, increase my muscle mass, decrease fat percentage, increase flexibility and strength. One goal was to lose weight and I’ve lost 38 pounds. Another goal was to increase my flexibility and strength for playing golf and I won my country club’s Super Senior championship. All the staff at Get Age Fit are friendly and celebrate your accomplishments with you. Thanks for helping me, Live Longer, Better!

reviews_list.author: Sherri Sydney
reviews_list.text: Get Age Fit is the place to go to get stronger and healthier. The trainers are focused on improving and maintaining your physical health through diet and weight training. Our trainer, James, is the absolute best!! In just the first two weeks of training with James, we noticed a great improvement in our daily functional movements. Now, after 6 months, we are stronger and healthier and James continues to push us forward doing exercises we didn’t think we were capable of achieving. We are so thankful to have James as our trainer, he truly is amazing.  We are also grateful to Get Age Fit owner, Theo, and all the trainers that are dedicated to helping their clients maintain a healthy lifestyle.

reviews_list.author: Craig Sydney
reviews_list.text: My wife and I  have been going to Get Age Fit now for 6 months.  I can feel the increase in strength and endurance, it has been a very positive impact.  We like to  go bike riding and can feel the improvement in strength and endurance as I ride up the hills in the neighborhood.   Our trainer James is very personable and very attentive to our needs.  Our training plan is always adjusted to our ever changing ability.  Best of all, going to Get Age Fit is FUN!  The people are very warm and carrying, always saying "hello".  Theo, the owner, is there most days when we come in and  always has a friendly fist bump.  James is always challenging us to go a little further but not too much further.  I like to always test my limits.  I  have been to many gyms in Georgetown over the years but this is the first time I have had a trainer.  I found having a trainer sets a "obligation" to go each time and continue push the envelope.   I would strongly recommend going to Get Age Fit and see for yourself!

reviews_list.author: Gary M Cadenhead
reviews_list.text: Covid followed by pneumonia caused significant atrophy to my body. An add for GetAgeFit caught my eye. Now 18 months later, I have lost body fat and gained muscle from training 3 times a week with Maria Arellano who has provided guidance, discipline and encouragement. This has been my first time for weight training and working with a trainer. It has been a really good experience.

reviews_list.author: Char Wittenberg
reviews_list.text: My experience with AgeFit has been outstanding. I have been a client for a number of years and I have improved my health, strength, fitness level and confidence 1000%. One of their strong points is the knowledge, skills and abilities of their trainers. All are excellent.  My trainer, James Peterson, is one of the best, if not the best trainer I have ever met.  I have worked out for years with different trainers and at different gyms, and without a doubt, James is the finest trainer I have ever had the pleasure to work with.  Extremely knowledgeable, great instructor and someone who gives his clients one hundred percent of his attention, I would highly recommend James as a trainer for anyone at any stage of fitness - from advanced to beginner.  Anyone serious about increasing their overall fitness would find Age Fit as the gym and James as the trainer as the perfect combination to help them achieve their goals.  Peter Wittenberg

reviews_list.author: Bridget Hill
reviews_list.text: I started Get Age Fit in March of 2025. James has been a great trainer through out this journey! I train 3 times a week and I am so happy with what I have been able to accomplish. James is the type of trainer that will give you the confidence you need to show yourself that you can do anything you put your mind to. Thank You James for the amazing session's and getting me where I want to be when it comes to being in shape and getting stronger!

reviews_list.author: Melissa Boyd
reviews_list.text: I’ve been working out with James at GetAgeFit for 2.5 years.  I’m so much stronger and confident than 3 years ago.  Not only do we work on strength training, but balance, flexibility and more.  The workouts are tailored to my needs and abilities.  When I had knee surgery, he concentrated on helping maintain and rebuild my leg strength following the recommendation of my doctor. We love James!

name: Leander Activity Center
address: 11880 Hero Way W Suite 600, Leander, TX 78641
description: Leander Activity Center is a recreation center in Leander, TX, offering recreation center services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 17 reviews, they provide quality fitness & exercise for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Leander Activity Center provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Leander, TX.

reviews_list.author: Janelle Elmore
reviews_list.text: Me and my son love the kid events that LAC provides. The director Rachael is always innovative on adding new things to the events and always friendly. Excited to see what she brings next year!

reviews_list.author: Diane Wilson
reviews_list.text:
Very enjoyable performances by the various band. It was nice and well lit, and the staff friendly
Have recent start taking the chair yoga class and fitness fun both are very good and the right speed for me as a senior.  Thumbs up to LAC for creating this program for older adults.

reviews_list.author: Eternal 99 (ETERNAL99)
reviews_list.text: 2 slices of cheese for this young lady. She knows her slices of pie and always telsl me let’s go get Saccone’s pizza. 🍕 if you know your pies this is the place !!

reviews_list.author: Camille Lentz
reviews_list.text: Great place for different activities such as zumba and yoga and others being added all the time. I do zumba there Mon and Wed !

reviews_list.author: Cathy S
reviews_list.text: Fantastic programs. Need more space for senior programs. Love the staff. Very active,  Active 55+ group.

reviews_list.author: Dr. Balakrishna Murthy Ramaraju
reviews_list.text:
Activity center without any activity.Took me awhile to see someone in flesh.
- Dr. B. Krishna M. Ramaraju.

reviews_list.author: PHILLIP PAINCHAUD
reviews_list.text: A Sr center where I met others and had coffee together. Great!

reviews_list.author: Lisa Von Behren
reviews_list.text: Loved the Native Plants seminar!

reviews_list.author: Celestine Eguzo
reviews_list.text: Nice facility for different activities 👍

reviews_list.author: Nina Wagner
reviews_list.text: Great group of seniors.

name: Brushy Creek Community Center
address: 16318 Great Oaks Dr, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Brushy Creek Community Center is a community center in Round Rock, TX, offering community center services. With a 4.5-star rating from 510 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Brushy Creek Community Center provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jeronimo Rodrigues
reviews_list.text: Vibrant hub of activity serving as an integral part of community life. The centre offers a huge range of sports, classes and social events providing  opportunities for interacting with neighbors from a  large spectrum of ages and tastes. It is run professionally and efficiently by very dedicated, and passionate staff. We are very thankful to have this center in our community.

reviews_list.author: Vishal Rajpurohit
reviews_list.text:
Extremely mismanaged office with deteriorating services.

No one takes accountability for services they offer. Messaged Alex, spoke to DJ and Schwantell but they didnt help. Customer services advised me that personal training sessions dont expire as long as membership is active and dont have an expiry date. After i renewed membership, they say the sessions are no longer valid. I paid for them, the trainer dint get the money. How does money expire? Its sitting in their account.

Do not recommend.

reviews_list.author: Angela Cleverdon
reviews_list.text: Attended a wedding here. It's a beautiful setting for events.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I would recommend this place for any function you may want out doors.  They have a covered area we used for the reception also.

reviews_list.author: Ramon Farinazo
reviews_list.text: Well organized community center.  Great for kids sports.   However their “Absolut no refund policy for any reason” is not community friendly.  They could do better in some instances.

reviews_list.author: Janis Kravet
reviews_list.text: Residents of the area should check out the benefits! Too many to list! Wonderful people and many programs to inspire you. The facility is beautiful.

reviews_list.author: Selena Nadav
reviews_list.text: A very well kept and beautiful community center. It has all the amenities you could want and the staff are friendly and helpful.

reviews_list.author: c p
reviews_list.text: Poor experience with a fitness instructor for berating and mocking students in her class. Somehow she finds this funny, but it’s not. Her rude behavior, abrasive comments, and lack of professionalism is unacceptable. No matter how much experience she brings, it means nothing without humility and respect. There are other instructors here who exhibit professional behavior, but not this brash person.

reviews_list.author: David Ervin
reviews_list.text: Stopped in to get some information about the HOA. People inside were friendly and knowledgeable and answered my questions.

reviews_list.author: Vinita Kasbekar
reviews_list.text:
Love the Brushy Creek Rec center. Best place for yoga classes, Maura and Laura are God sent.
There is a lovely community spirit here. Several classes offered free, METS program for seniors is amazing . Culture is friendly , staff is always helpfull, great coffee, makes your health goals easy to achieve.
Only thing I would say needs improvement is the gym, it is small and congested with equipment, not much room to move around before u bump into something. Also lacking is a indoor swimming pool which would be a blessing to have.

reviews_list.author: Danny Simmons
reviews_list.text: Really nice community center! Basketball, volleyball, raquetball, and much more. Plenty of space for parties and get togethers.

name: Hutto Family YMCA
description: Hutto Family YMCA is a non-profit organization in Hutto, TX, offering non-profit organization, indoor swimming pool, physical fitness program services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 419 reviews, they provide quality fitness & exercise for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Hutto Family YMCA provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Hutto, TX.

reviews_list.author: Heather J Cook
reviews_list.text: Visited the Hutto Y for a virtual class. Very easy to find, clean, new. Lots of cardio and fitness machines and ample space for group classes. The cycling room is pretty small and it is smaller than Round Rock Y, but plenty of space. I will definitely return.

reviews_list.author: MK Flores
reviews_list.text: The facility is decent. Their business practices….not so much. I cancelled my membership today. Apparently, unlike other places where  cancellation is instantaneous, it takes them 5 days to cancel. Since 5 days would end at Oct 2nd, I have to pay for the full month of October. Terrible. I will not be recommending this place to anyone. Consider this a paid advertisement….since I’m paying for it…..

reviews_list.author: Jill Santana
reviews_list.text: I take my father there for there water activities, we all love it . The wonderful people that work there are extraordinary. I suggest Hutto YMCA to anyone , I really can't thank them enough for their kindness. It's made a big difference in our life's since losing my mother. My father is not depressed because of all the happiness he is surrounded by going there. Y'all are good sent, Thank you!

reviews_list.author: Somayeh Arabpour
reviews_list.text: I called to cancel my kids membership and I was asked to come in to do that. My question for your management team is why? Everyone send you the termination form by email you sign it and send it back. Why YMCA can’t do that? You should definitely look into your processing requirements and change it for your customers convenience and your business. This is so disappointing. I work from home and have two kids and busy 24/7 why this can’t be done by email or doc-sign? I really hope this issue gets resolved quickly.

reviews_list.author: Marcia Campos
reviews_list.text: I love the fact that the ymca has competitive sports that my grandkids can participate in. What I cant believe is the bad sportsmanship  and horrible example of self control that happened this past Friday at our volleyball game. To not even participate in the hand shake is a big SMH moment. Hopefully this kind of thing doesn't happen again. CONGRATULATIONS LADY HIPPOS GREAT SEASON.

reviews_list.author: John Hack
reviews_list.text: I like this gym and the staff. Friendly all around especially the folks in the kids area. Big shout out to them and their program. My daughter will not let me go to any other YMCA because this one is her favorite! Keep it up.

reviews_list.author: Luisa Hernandez
reviews_list.text: Great swimming classes for little ones. Coach Lisa is great! The only thing I have to say is that the building needs bigger restrooms and at least two family restrooms.

reviews_list.author: Tina Schnell
reviews_list.text:
We have been members of this YMCA for years. We love the kids sports programs for our kids. They love coming each week for practice and their games. Our kids and ourselves have made many friends and built community through the sports program. The sports staff is super friendly and try their best to make sure all kids are having a great experience.

The facility is also always very clean and well taken care of. My kids like going to child watch and enjoyed taking a cooking class this year as well.

reviews_list.author: Paul Cesar
reviews_list.text:
The YMCA in Hutto is a fantastic spot for families, even if it's in Hutto (just kidding, Hutto, we love you!).

The facilities are top-notch, with classes for everyone—young, old, and the "older-but-still-young-at-heart."

Plus, the swimming pool is a hit, and the staff? Absolutely awesome!

reviews_list.author: Yesenia Alvarado
reviews_list.text: My husband and I have been going to the Y in Hutto for a year now. We have zero complaints and we love the staff. Every day we are greeted with a friendly hello. The Zumba class on Monday nights is a lot of fun!! We use all the equipment in the gym and it has always been in service. Very rarely will a cardio machine be out of service and if it is it will get fixed quickly! What we like the most is that it is less than five minutes from our house in Hutto and they close at 9 during the week. The early closing helps us have a routine of a workout right after dinner. The pool is fantastic for kids and adults alike! We sometimes use the pool to swim laps! Sauna is great and spacious! About 12 people can sit in the sauna at once. If you are thinking about joining the Y, do it! They are fantastic!

name: YMCA of Central Texas - Metro Offices
address: 1812 N Mays St, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: YMCA of Central Texas - Metro Offices is a non-profit organization in Round Rock, TX, offering non-profit organization services. With a 4.5-star rating from 161 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: YMCA of Central Texas - Metro Offices provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Cindy Dire (Cindy)
reviews_list.text:
Fantastic facility.   Loved the wonderful shampoo and conditioner in the showers.  Keep that going!!
The pool and hot tub were in great shape.   Lots of folks were using this place...lots of families.   So glad it's successful!

reviews_list.author: pr k
reviews_list.text:
Just started my membership after enjoying their 3-day pass and being impressed with their recent renovations. I was a member back around 2018(?) and the bldg felt outdated. It wasn't horrible before but, the upgrades were definitely welcome.
My only complaint (?) is that there used to be a back entrance which is now an employees-only door. It was nice being able to park from that side since I live in east RR and come to the facility from that direction. Having a secondary entrance would allow people more parking options besides main entrance and help with foot traffic but, I am merely suggesting as it was convenient parking on that side and they may not have adequate staffing for additional entrances.
I like the new layout and design; it feels much more planned out, spacious and designed for specific uses vs feeling a bit cramped before - it feels so fancy!

reviews_list.author: Luisa Hernandez
reviews_list.text: Their Christmas dance performance was awesome! You can really tell that the dance instructor loves to teach and be with the students.

reviews_list.author: Andrea Blakely
reviews_list.text: I really enjoy going here! The best time to go is in the morning! The Hot tub is so enjoyable!

reviews_list.author: marilyn johnson
reviews_list.text:
I'm visiting from SC. I got a 3 mos package.
This gym has the some of the best classes and very friendly instructors.
Grit, body pump, cycling, toning classes and more. They have a nice cardio theater.
Overall 5 stars.
Friendly people's

reviews_list.author: Latisa Husband
reviews_list.text: Very family oriented, clean & organized. They offer a variation of activities/classes for children, teens, and adults. Staff is usually helpful. However, lots of traffic & class sizes may be larger.

reviews_list.author: Mary Lemons
reviews_list.text: Clean, friendly, attentive, with all the equipment and classes available to meet and exceed your fitness goals

reviews_list.author: Ryan Wiley
reviews_list.text: My daughter is attending swimming lessons. She is having a good time. Parents beware, if you sit on the side and wait.....wear somthing cooling. The pool area is muggy as heck. I was drenched in sweat by the time it was over. Lol. Over all its a wonderful experience for the little ones.

reviews_list.author: Heather J Cook
reviews_list.text: I have been a member of the Chasco YMCA for over 20 years. My daughter was the first kid to have a swim party on the indoor water park almost 15/16 years ago. Still top-notch, offering an array of equipment,facility, programming, and community you can not get anywhere else for a reasonable price. Will be a lifelong supporter.

reviews_list.author: Steve Tong
reviews_list.text: Very friendly staffs. We tried to see if they have swimming team/group for teen, but they only have junior wave for ages below 13, and master class for 18 and up. But the facility had been remodeled and was clean and nice. Swimming area still the same.

name: Heart & Soul Senior Fitness
address: 180 Town Center Blvd Ste. 600, Jarrell, TX 76537
description: Heart & Soul Senior Fitness is a wellness program in Jarrell, TX, offering wellness program services. They are committed to providing quality fitness & exercise for seniors in the Williamson County community.
shortDescription: Heart & Soul Senior Fitness provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Jarrell, TX.

name: Crunch Fitness - Round Rock
address: 2800 S I-35 Frontage Rd, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Crunch Fitness - Round Rock is a gym in Round Rock, TX, offering gym, fitness center, personal trainer services. With a 4.5-star rating from 1165 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated fitness & exercise providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Crunch Fitness - Round Rock provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Claudia Wickard
reviews_list.text: My husband and I are new members, and we had a very positive experience at the front desk and overall with Jeremy. He gave us a very detailed explanation of everything and even did a short assessment to understand our motivations and goals. We are very excited to work toward our goals with a personalized trainer who was recommended to us. Having previous experience in CrossFit, we know how valuable it is to have a coach who can guide you and provide ongoing support. Overall, the facilities are clean, the childcare area is very well designed to keep children entertained while we parents work out, and I still need to explore the app and the facilities more. Thank you for the warm welcome.

reviews_list.author: Matt Renner
reviews_list.text: Crunch is definitely a place to go for those looking for a wide variety.  Plenty of machines, free weights and classes.  Sauna is fairly new.  The front desk crew including Aileen and Donovan are very helpful and welcoming.  The managing partner Jeremy is also helpful and will answer any questions you will have.  Patrons are also kind and do a good job wiping down machines after each use.

reviews_list.author: Mariandrea Basabe Gonzalez
reviews_list.text:
Highly recommend Crunch Fitness Round Rock!

I absolutely love this gym! The environment is clean, motivating, and full of positive energy. The staff is always friendly and helpful, and the childcare service is amazing — it makes it so much easier for parents to stay consistent with their workouts knowing their kids are safe and happy.

I also want to highlight my trainer, Jaidon — he’s been an incredible part of my fitness journey. He’s professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely cares about helping me reach my goals. After having a baby, he customized my workouts to help me rebuild strength safely, improve my body composition, and regain my confidence. I’ve seen real progress and feel stronger every week thanks to his guidance and encouragement.

If you’re looking for a supportive place to train with great childcare and an amazing trainer like Jaidon, this is definitely the gym to join!

reviews_list.author: Cassidy Justice
reviews_list.text: Updated review: Let me preface this by saying that I like this gym and the people that work here. My trainer Haley is the sweetest (also postpartum certified for the moms out there), the front desk staff, and the kids watch people have all been great. That being said, If you’re thinking about doing personal training here, be warned: make sure you read everything and have a very clear understanding of what you’re getting into. I had a situation that has since been resolved regarding a personal training contract so just take heed.

reviews_list.author: Mark Varela
reviews_list.text: I happened to be visiting for the weekend and decided to get a workout in.  I’m not a member but signed up for a complimentary 1 day pass via email. The front staff (not very friendly) wouldn’t honor the pass because i wasn’t “local”.  Charged me a daily rate ($15.99) and tried to charge me again because apparently it didn’t go thru!  Then asked me to stop by after my workout and check with them to make sure i paid (i dont think so, not today witches).  Equipment is nice, no towels, plenty of cardio, but typical of Crunch gyms, crowded as hell.  Hit up Golds gym down the road.

reviews_list.author: DV MOVERS
reviews_list.text:
Crunch Fitness in Round Rock is hands-down the best gym I’ve ever joined. The place is massive, packed with every machine and free-weight setup you could want, and the energy hits you the second you walk in—pure motivation.
What made it unforgettable, though, was the manager, Donovan Zuniga. From day one he greeted me by name, walked me through every station, and checked in to make sure I was hitting my goals. Donovan isn’t just running a gym—he’s building a community. His hustle, positivity, and genuine care turned a good gym into a great experience.

The staff follows his lead: friendly, fast, and always ready to help. The facility stays spotless even during peak hours, and the outdoor turf area gives that extra SoCal vibe right here in Texas.
If you’re serious about training, do yourself a favor—join Crunch Round Rock and ask for Donovan.

Thank you, Crunch Round Rock, and a huge thank-you to Donovan Zuniga for making every workout feel like I’m part of something bigger. See you tomorrow!

reviews_list.author: sade campbell
reviews_list.text: Miranda Hidrogo is the best at the front desk! She’s always so friendly, welcoming, and quick to help with any questions I might have. Every time I come in, she makes the check-in smooth and brings a great energy to the gym. You can tell she really cares about the members and makes everyone feel comfortable. The gym honestly wouldn’t be the same without her!

reviews_list.author: Katie Howard
reviews_list.text:
I really like crunch gym. I've been a member of several other gyms, but this one has been by far my favorite. All of the employees have been super kind and helpful, the personal trainer that I worked with was so supportive, and helped me reach my goals. Their classes are awesome, with wonderful instructors.

Their hours are great as someone who has a very busy schedule. The gym is always clean and all of the equipment is in good condition. I love that they just don't have workout machines and free weights but they also have a variety of workout equipment for everybody to use.

In short I highly recommend Crunch gym.

reviews_list.author: Taylor Sparks
reviews_list.text:
Amazing Personal Trainer – Highly Recommend!
Working with Jaidon has been an absolute game-changer for me. From day one, he listened carefully to my goals and created a customized plan that pushed me without ever feeling overwhelmed. His knowledge, motivation, and attention to detail have made all the difference in helping me stay consistent and see real progress.

I also can't say enough good things about the ladies at crunch’s daycare. From the very first day, they welcomed my daughter with open arms and made her feel safe, loved, and excited to be there. It gives me so much peace of mind knowing she’s in such kind, capable hands.

reviews_list.author: María Courchaine
reviews_list.text: I love this place,Miranda was amazing! She helped me out at the front desk with all my gym questions and made the whole experience so easy and fun. Super friendly, positive vibes the whole time — definitely the kind of person who makes you feel excited to come back!

name: Fitness Center
description: Fitness Center is a gym in Georgetown, TX, offering gym services. Rated 4 stars based on 1 reviews, they provide quality fitness & exercise for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Fitness Center provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

name: Hippo Social Performance Club
description: Hippo Social Performance Club is a gym in Hutto, TX, offering gym, community health center, fitness center services. Rated 4.9 stars based on 17 reviews, they provide quality fitness & exercise for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Hippo Social Performance Club provides quality fitness & exercise for seniors in Hutto, TX.

reviews_list.author: Shelley Larsen
reviews_list.text: I recently connected with Sara and Tracey at a networking event and immediately felt an alignment with values of health and wellness through nature, movement and nutrition! Creating community around those values makes it so much easier to live it. Hippo social club collaborates well to bring like minded people together.  As Naturo3 Ozone Clinic, we participated in the first annual Hippo Trail Fest partnered with Tejas trails. It was a wonderful event and I look forward to more collaboration and connection with Hippo Social Club.

reviews_list.author: Josue Enriquez
reviews_list.text: I really love collaborating with Hippo Social. They have such a genuine vibe and goodwill that makes the whole space feel welcoming. It’s not only a place to exercise, but also a place to be nurtured, supported, and connected with the community. Every time I’m there, I leave feeling really good!

reviews_list.author: Kyla
reviews_list.text:
This place is such a gem!! It has all the amenities that make for a great escape: sauna, cold plunge, running trails, workout classes, wellness groups, etc. Many of the planned activities take place outside. (There’s nothing better than lifting weights while watching the sun set.) MOST IMPORTANTLY: the people that run Hippo Social Club are so caring and passionate about helping others into a healthy lifestyle. They foster an environment where people are encouraged to get to know each other genuinely and personally.

Living in the suburbs, I often find myself daydreaming about how much more socially fulfilled I’d be if I lived in a close-knit village instead. I think Hippo Social Club brings me as close to that daydream as physically possible. Hippo Social Club fosters a close-knit community of people passionate about health+wellness, connecting with others, and the outdoors. The best part is they’re ALWAYS open to meeting new people and I never once felt left-out or excluded as a new member. :)

reviews_list.author: Allye Brillante
reviews_list.text: Tracey and team did a phenomenal job hosting my birthday event here. She went above and beyond to make my dream a reality and created a space safe for growth and restoration. I had so many people complimenting the experience recognizing how unique of an event it was for a birthday celebration. Outside of even a birthday celebration, at Hippo social they are so genuine, which is a rarity amongst some wellness communities. This is a place with people that truly care about you from a holistic view and just want to connect with you as your authentic self. It's not just a place that provides wellness services, but friendship and connection as well. In my 27 years being alive and 3 years being in the wellness space, Hippo Social club has quickly become the most sacred and special memory for me.

reviews_list.author: Kim Doramus
reviews_list.text: Breathtaking - Literally! Loved experiencing the cold plunge!  Hippo Social Club hosts a wellness program: sauna, cold‑plunge recovery and remote workspace access. This place is incredible and beautiful retreat.

reviews_list.author: Josh Droog
reviews_list.text: Hippo Social Club is a fantastic local point for building amazing connections and exploring opportunities outside your comfort zone. Just recently, we attended at couple's breathwork and drum beat evening which was amazing in every way. The owners themselves participated, and the facilitators as well as the participants were enthusiastic and engaged. Would strongly recommend any event here for anyone looking for community and connection!

reviews_list.author: Pete Otero
reviews_list.text: Love the plunge and sauna, great concept and killer running trails. Very unique and different and run by great people. Really like it a lot

reviews_list.author: Tonya Spitler
reviews_list.text: The Hippo Social Club and especially the women's wellness series has been so amazing. Each week has added a deeper peace and energy that I didn't know I was missing. I would recommend this to any woman, regardless of fitness level or where you are on your journey. The support, encouragement, and connection is irreplaceable.

reviews_list.author: Brittany Badgley
reviews_list.text: Hippo Social Club continues to impress! They hosted a Breathwork and Drum Experience and I was so impressed by the quality of the facilitators and the ambiance of the facility. Will definitely keep an eye out for future events hosted here!

reviews_list.author: Peter wachholz
reviews_list.text: We took our 3 small dogs on the trail and they had fun exploring. It was well organized to make sure we followed the trail correctly. Everyone seemed to do a great job of keeping the dogs separated so no one got into a scuffle. We had fun and would do this again. Need more activities with the dogs each time lol  Peter and Sharon

reviews_list.author: Veronica Beals
reviews_list.text: Pat takes such good care of the seniors here. Pat & Dahlia is so attentive and caring to the community. This place has such a caring support system & I highly recommend stopping in and participating or volunteering where possible. 💜

reviews_list.author: Nana Bradshaw
reviews_list.text: I always feel welcome when I visit to chat with Pat who runs the center. I live very close and walk over often. Like the thrift store inside and free books.

reviews_list.author: Janet McAdams
reviews_list.text: Pat and the gang are amazing!

reviews_list.author: EVELYN G. HASSELL
reviews_list.text: MRS .PAT IS THE BEST AND SWEETEST LADY EVER THAT RUNS THIS PLACE FOR OVER 20 YEARS ...SHES VERY HELPFUL AND IS ALWAYS LOOKING OUT FOR THE ELDERLY MAKING SURE THE EAT AND HAVE WHAT THEY NEED...THANK YOU MRS.PAT FOR ALL YOU DO ...MAY GOD CONTINUE TO BLESS YOU AND YOUR FAMILY IN JESUS NAME...

reviews_list.author: Leah White
reviews_list.text: Management is very rude, unprofessional, I was signed up for years, never got a apartment, the management keeps changing, the new manager said they don't know where my application went! So I would have to start over! I not gonna do that, very unprofessional!

reviews_list.author: Diana Vasquez
reviews_list.text: I have enjoyed shopping here thru different years.

reviews_list.author: Terri Mawhiney
reviews_list.text: Although very crowded,the lines moved quickly.

reviews_list.author: Samuel A. Quiñones II

reviews_list.text: Senior Access contributes to the community by providing scheduled rides to people who cannot drive themselves. Its a wonderful non profit!

reviews_list.author: Judy Leu
reviews_list.text: Senior access provides rides to doctor and other for seniors. They also have free medical equipment. Just call them and make an appointment.
