reviews_list.text:
*
" Senior Access " is a charitable Organization whose volunteers drive Senior Citizens to medical related appointments and food shopping, and special events in the Greater Austin Texas area. Exciting to meet new people ( the Volunteers )  😃 🏁
.

reviews_list.author: Carole Thorp
reviews_list.text: Excellent organization. Volunteers provide rides & they have vans or buses for group trips for shopping twice a week. Great for folks 60+!

reviews_list.author: Theresa Estherstarrose
reviews_list.text: The Senior Access is a service that Round Rock, is so blessed to have, Seniors can go to the stores once or twice a week,  if you are a Senior and need help getting from point A to point B and home again safely, these are the nicest people as well, give them a call, and they will answer all questions,I highly recommend, Senior Access. Theresa

reviews_list.author: Aquanette Thompson
reviews_list.text: There's no service for the handicap visiting Texas here

reviews_list.author: Tony Delgado
reviews_list.text: Very dedicated group of people who are doing a great service for our senior community.

name: Lone Star Medical Transportation
address: 896 Summit St Suite 106, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Lone Star Medical Transportation is a handicapped transportation service in Round Rock, TX, offering handicapped transportation service, transportation service services. Rated 4.2 stars based on 102 reviews, they provide quality transportation services for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Lone Star Medical Transportation provides quality transportation services for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Lance Girard
reviews_list.text:
Calvin and Scott were angels in disguise. My mother broke her hip and had hip replacement surgery. The hospital discharged her. They arranged for her to be transported by another medical transport company to a Rehab Center. The other companies drver threw her discharge paperwork at her. Then he left her suitcase on the hospital sidewalk and drove off. He was speeding and driving recklessly to the rehab center. When I arrived at the rehab center, my mother has in great pain. The rehab center was rundown. So, I decided that I would take my mother home. The rehab administrators were very helpful. They called Lone Star. As I was talking to Scott, he could hear my mother was in pain and not wanting to getback into another transport vehicle. He suggested that they use a Broda Chair transport. It's like a big lazy boy chair. His best driver, Calvin , was returning to end his shift. He said, he would ask him to make another run. Scott was concerned that we wouldn't have enough manpower to get her loaded into the chair. He decided that he would come with Calvin to help. Scott is the Executive Director of the company, no less. When they arrived, they explained to my mom; how they were going to put my mom in the Broda chair. She didn't want to change chairs because she was in so much pain. They allowed her to be in charge. If she was feeling any pain from the transfer. They would stop until she wanted to proceed. Once, she was in the chair and comfortable. Her personality changed, she was smiling, laughing and flirting with Calvin. On the ride home. Calvin would tell her about bumps in the road and curves. They had an excellent conversation. When they arrived at the house. They brought her into her room and got her into bed. My mom was in charge once again. They explained to her, how they were going to transfer her from the chair into the bed. It all went smoothly. They went above and beyond the service promised. It was a day from hell for me and my mother. But Calvin and Scott brought sunlight into a dark day; to the point of tears from me. I highly recommend this company. Its not about fitting in one more run. Its about taking care of their customers; but they treat you like family. God bless you, Calvin. God bless you, Scott.
Sincerely,
Lance Girard

reviews_list.author: Derrick Aguren
reviews_list.text: My driver, Jermaine , was a wonderful human being. He was attentive and caring to my needs coming out of surgery. I felt safe and relaxed. I suspect this reflects the LoneStar company philosophy as a whole. Thanks again!

reviews_list.author: Cristina
reviews_list.text: My father is disabled and I was hesitant to use a transportation service but after using this service 3 times in one day I would highly recommend them . Their reliable & Friendly

reviews_list.author: J&E’s Mom
reviews_list.text: Although we feel the attention given by the drivers is acceptable, this past experience of them not arriving on time or usually 15-20 minutes early was unexpected. I canceled when they were late and had no idea if they would even show up. I did not get a full refund they charged for the cancellation a fee.

reviews_list.author: Kent Jordan
reviews_list.text: Your man Calvin (I hope I got that right) Showed up earlier than expected at the Oakwood surgery center in round rock. He was efficient very pleasant and we had a nice talk about some things that were important to both of us  Thank you for your service

reviews_list.author: Charlene Anderson
reviews_list.text: I’m very disappointed with this company’s service. They arrived late to pick up my mother, which caused her to miss and ultimately cancel her medical appointment. This created unnecessary stress and inconvenience for both of us. When dealing with medical transportation, timeliness is critical, and unfortunately, they did not meet that basic expectation.

reviews_list.author: Vassilios Gerousis
reviews_list.text: Lone Star is a specialized medical transport for disabled people like my wife. Special drivers that lends a hand to help transport for medical appointments and put them in special vehicle to transport people on wheel chair. They are very careful put it them and out of the vehicle. They are trained well and have very friendly face and caring hearts. Most of the time they are usually on time except for traffic problems. The company is well organized and helpful. I appreciate the people , the company for helping my wife.

reviews_list.author: CY Pennick
reviews_list.text:
Lonestar Transport has your back--
I found myself in the middle of a logistical and timing nightmare, and they stepped in without hesitation. The team went above and beyond to sort everything out, showing patience, professionalism, and genuine empathy along the way. I couldn’t be more grateful. When things get tough, trust me—Lonestar got you covered.

reviews_list.author: Susan Long
reviews_list.text: O...Kory ...The Driver Was So Pleasant, AS Was The, Woman, Who Patiently Arranged The Important Trip IN Such A, TIMELY Manner...... Since, I, Gave, Such, Short Notice !!!...Everything Was Seamlessly Arranged And Such Kindness At "Every Turn" !!! THANX /THANX /THANX !!!

reviews_list.author: KM
reviews_list.text: I would like to compliment the efforts of Lone Star Medical in getting my mom to and from her appointment. We arrived on time and were treated with kindness and professionalism by both drivers.  The dispatcher even rescheduled our pick-up time for my mom because her appointment ended early.

reviews_list.author: Lynne Smith
reviews_list.text: If you're looking for someone to take the best possible care of you and your love ones, you can count on C & R Senior Care, Concierge and Transport Services LLC. We feel lucky to have this company in our lives. Reggie the owner, is a kind, trustworthy, and insightful man, and we're very grateful to him for all that he's done for our family during a difficult year. We couldn't recommend him more highly-for his competence and also for his compassion. With C & R, you are in very good hands.

reviews_list.author: Ada Duruh-Nubuor
reviews_list.text: I recommend C & R Concierge and Transport services for their professionalism, quality and attention to details as they deliver efficient and prompt services to our elderly. My family is grateful for the role you play in our lives. Thank you.

reviews_list.author: Chidi Duruh
reviews_list.text: Wonderful place and highly trained staff to take care of all your needs. Will definitely recommend C&R Senior Care as they endeavor to provide quality services with very high level of professionalism.

name: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Williams Drive
description: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Williams Drive is a physical therapy clinic in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, medical clinic, orthopedic surgeon services. With a 4.9-star rating from 61 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Williams Drive provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Mary Olivera
reviews_list.text: I have been experiencing back, hip and knee pain for several years now and have used several different therapists in Georgetown with marginal results. I have now been seeing Kaylan Thompson for about two months.. Kaylan is an absolutely fabulous therapist. She is working on improving my posture and overall muscle strength throughout my back, legs, and core. Kaylan is by far the best therapist with whom I have ever worked. She has exercises and stretches that no other therapist has ever suggested. And, she's fun to work with. I highly recommend Kaylan.

reviews_list.author: Cheri Thanos
reviews_list.text: As a BSW patient for many years now, I am more than satisfied with services provided. Since I have been going to the outpatient clinic for physical therapy, I can already feel positive results. Kaylen is an excellent PT,  pleasant and professional. The location is convenient, as well. My expectations have been more effective than I expected in just a few visits thus far.

reviews_list.author: Douglas Paul Washington II
reviews_list.text:
Met my Physical Therapist Natalie Just a few days ago as a patient and said "my knees don't help me much" ...

She said "Well did you ask your nephew?"

I had a great rehab visit as they effectively addressed my specific needs and contributed to my confidence in my overall recovery. Here is why you should come here too:

Personalized Treatment Plan:

Natalie seemed ready to tailor the exercises to my particular needs: The treatment plan seems customized to address my unique physical, emotional, and psychological needs as I start to recover.

She has her calendar at the ready to allow me regular assessments. I expect my progress will be regularly evaluated and her plan for me seems that it will be adjusted accordingly.

My appointment felt like I was in a supportive environment:

As I walked in I joked about the pre-visit paperwork and the day of paperwork and still they offered a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere. The rehab facility succeeds in being a safe and comfortable environment that fosters healing.

reviews_list.author: Russ Curtis
reviews_list.text: I'm currently seeing PT Jesse Richardson at the BS&W Outpatient Rehab Center.  This is my second knee replacement, and I could tell right away that Jesse was more than knowledgeable and fully competent and that he would push me to exceed my own expectations.  I've already recommended him to a couple of friends and do so to anyone else that's looking for a first-class Physical Therapist.

reviews_list.author: Diane Mcintyre
reviews_list.text:
My initial experience at rehabilitation in the spring was very positive and helpful. Jesse worked with me on my goals to reduce knee pain and strengthen my knee. Therapy ended after a few weeks.

In the September again I was in therapy and barely could walk. Jessie was totally amazing in seeing me immediately, being kind. Empathetic, positive, resourceful and totally present to provide the ongoing instruction and hands on care I needed. After another 8weeks of therapy , I am back doing everything but running and hopping.
I can not say enough positive comments or give a stronger review for Jesse.
Rarely do you see such an invaluable combination of tremendous skill, kindness, the ability to relate in a positive way, resourcefulness and dedication to providing excellent care!

Thank you Jesse for all your help. Each day I left therapy I felt better and uplifted. Thank you too Linda for your kindness and professionalism!

10 Stars ⭐️ could not adequately rate this Jesse’s skill and this excellently run facility.

reviews_list.author: Gay Williams
reviews_list.text: From the initial phone conversation with April the receptionist to the in - person introduction and first treatment with Jesse the PT I couldn't have been more pleased. Their professionalism, kindness and knowledge gave me the confidence and encouragement to achieve my goals for a return to activities of daily living. I am so pleased that I chose this facility. They are exceptional representatives of your organization.

reviews_list.author: Judy Finnell
reviews_list.text: BSW rehabilitation on Williams Dr near The Wesleyan, is a very good place for one on one attention with your rehabilitation. The therapists and receptionist are very nice and care about the patients. I recommend them for your care.

reviews_list.author: Ellie H.
reviews_list.text:
I injured my arm early January 2021 and finally let my stubbornness die and went to the doctor. I was given a referral for PT at BSW OP. From the first moment I spoke with a receptionist (April), I was impressed with the kindness and professionalism. I was also impressed with how quickly they found room for me on their books.

I was assigned Jesse for PT. He was friendly, full of great energy, but most importantly he was knowledgeable. He quickly assessed where I was in my healing process as well as ascertained additional information about my condition the doctor had not provided (no fault of his own, he smartly left the PT work to the PT!).

While the dr had referred me for 4-6 weeks of PT, Jesse quickly unlocked a pain point that immediately changed my pain level as well as use of arm. He then gave me a few exercises to continue at home. He scheduled me for follow up two weeks out but instructed me to cancel if I found the exercises to be sufficient before the next appointment.

It’s been a week, I’ve been doing my exercises, and it’s clear that my months of stubbornness were unbelievably unnecessary. I will most likely call and cancel follow up tomorrow because of the shocking progress I’ve experienced.

I’m so grateful for BSW OP and Jesse. I appreciate their drive to get patients from point A to point B in the most effective and efficient manner. I appreciate their friendliness, professionalism, and how quickly they put my concerns at ease.

I would 100% recommend to a friend or family member for any physical therapy concerns!

reviews_list.author: LaShell Bartholow
reviews_list.text: If you have to go to physical therapy, you are probably experiencing an already stressful situation. Jesse really does a great job at reducing any anxiety you might have. He is always positive, knowledgeable, and doesn't ever make me feel I'm just next in line. Linda is also very welcoming and great, too. I definitely recommend!

reviews_list.author: Dinorah Martinez-Anderson
reviews_list.text: Tucked away from the busiest street in Georgetown- (Williams Drive West- next to Healthy Nutrition) is a sanctuary for people who need help with their injuries. I wasn't sure about anything only that I was hurting so much. Jesse Richardson said he'd see me. He and their receptionist were welcoming and helpful. Jesse started working on my knee, did a few stretches, taped me up, and had me walking without pain in no time!!!The BEST experience EVER!!

name: PT Solutions of Lake Georgetown
description: PT Solutions of Lake Georgetown is a physical therapist in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, physical therapist, sports medicine clinic services. With a 4.8-star rating from 116 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: PT Solutions of Lake Georgetown provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Thomas Clark
reviews_list.text:
What an incredible staff and environment! I can’t give PT Solutions enough praise. I started going to PT on Phase two of my Physical Therapy training at the beginning of the year after having undergone spinal cord surgery in mid November. When I started with them, I was walking at careful pace, I wasn’t bending or twisting at all. I was on a five pound lifting limit.
By the end of two weeks, I was not only bending, but using a 20lb ball to the floor and back repetitively. My walking pace was back to normal and my pain had gone from a 4-6 down to a 1-2. I primarily worked with Matt, who was Awesome. He pushed me and encouraged me, but never forced me, he always made sure to ask and really listen to me about how my body was feeling and responding. I worked with a couple of the other trainers, but I’m so sorry guys I can’t remember your names, but all of them were excellent. The Tech Assistant’s name is Christopher, and he was always helpful and attentive as well.
Trust me, If you’re looking for a Physical Therapist, do yourself a favor, start your search hear and let it end here, you will be in the best of hands. You won’t regret it!

reviews_list.author: Jenna Nagy
reviews_list.text:
I love Georgetown PT Solutions!!! Karissa is an incredible physical therapist! From the very first session, she made me feel comfortable, listened to every concern, and explained everything in a way that actually made sense. She’s patient, knowledgeable, and truly cares about her patients’ progress.

What really stood out is how personal and encouraging she is, she celebrates the small wins with you and pushes you just enough to keep improving without ever feeling overwhelmed. My pain has decreased so much since seeing her, and I actually look forward to my appointments now.

If you’re looking for someone who is skilled, compassionate, and genuinely invested in your healing, Karissa is the best. I’m so grateful I found her!

reviews_list.author: Kevin Kelton
reviews_list.text: Great place, great staff. Edward ("Matt") and team are excellent. When you arrive, you'll always by greeted by your first name and a friendly "hi!" from the entire team. They make it a point to know all their clients by name. They tailor your exercises to your abilities and constantly check in with you during the process to make sure the weight and physical challenge is right for you. I wholeheartedly recommend this business for your physical therapy needs.

reviews_list.author: Patty Tisdell
reviews_list.text: This has been an amazing experience. This Physical Therapy program has the best therapist I have ever worked with. Everyone is Positive, brimming with joy and laughter, and an hour goes so quickly that you don’t even know it. I always felt so much better after my session and always looked forward to the next one. Matthew, Brittany, & Karissa, all knew my Treatment Plan, and if more time was needed with another patient then another therapist would pick up the new patient without blinking. They work so well together, always positive and happy, and have taken a frightened old lady with a knee replacement who was sure she wouldn’t walk again and transformed her into someone who can walk just about anywhere! My deepest Thanks!              Party Tisdell

reviews_list.author: Nicole
reviews_list.text: Karissa and the team at PT Solutions of Lake Georgetown have been amazing! They’re so welcoming and truly invested in your progress. Every visit feels personal… everyone greets you by name and cheers you on. In just four weeks, I’ve seen real improvement and can’t wait to see how much more progress I’ll make. Couldn’t recommend them enough

reviews_list.author: Nancy Broen
reviews_list.text:
When I first went in to PT Solutions, my neck had severe degeneration. I could barely turn my head more than 45 deg to the right and I had constant pain. I did not have high hopes for PT since my diagnosis seemed so negative. The first day I met with Matt, one of the 3 therapists there. He did some standard strength and capability tests and we talked about my situation and previous actions I had taken, also about my lifestyle and activities. Over the next 2 1/2 months, I worked with Matt to improve strength and flexibility.  And now I have pretty much full range of motion in my neck and occasional slight pain. I have exercises to do at home to maintain this level and will likely have to do them for the rest of my life. That’s okay. They work.

Now for the particulars. The facility is a fairly large open room, with equipment along the walls. They use this equipment in ways I have not seen before. For example, they have a head gear that attaches to a weight machine and I walked backwards, wearing it. We did this every visit. At first I did not like it. It hurt. But as the weeks went by and my neck got stronger and the weights were increased, I learned to appreciate it for the great improvement I felt.

Each visit, when I arrived, all the employees would say hello, by my name. I liked that.  Matt would ask me about the previous few days, since my last visit. If I reported some pain from some activity, he gave me an exercise to address that specific area or movement.

As I observed the other therapists, they were all this good. As time went on, this felt more like a family, and I would look forward to my visit. I have been through much PT in my 74 years. I have to say that I found this to be the best, on all levels.

reviews_list.author: Sara Cullin
reviews_list.text: I had a horrible experience at PT Solution Clinic in Georgetown. This felt like insurance fraud. I was charged $600 out of pocket for a service that should have cost $150, and they billed my insurance $1,400 for the same visit.After that, they still sent me a letter saying I owe an extra $35.They also ask patients to sign paperwork without clearly explaining what it authorizes, then later use your signature to justify these charges. If you’re reading this review run, and never look back contact your insurance company immediately to report this billing abuse. Never go to this clinic.

reviews_list.author: Alison Shoepe
reviews_list.text: Highly recommend the team at PT Solutions of Lake Georgetown! Everyone is encouraging and gently pushes when needed. The entire staff greets you by name, every visit, whether you’re working with them that day or not. I’ve seen measurable progress in my four weeks working with them and look forward to seeing even more!

reviews_list.author: madeline cobb
reviews_list.text: I am so thankful for this clinic. They got in me in quickly and worked so well with my schedule. They seem to always remember me and make me feel like they truly care about my experience and making progress in my healing.

reviews_list.author: Vicki Nunez
reviews_list.text: Clean and professional atmosphere. Staff made me feel welcome. The Physical Therapist took my input into consideration and asked good questions pertinent to my needs. Thank you for the kindness and respect.

name: Endeavor Physical Therapy (Sun City)
description: Endeavor Physical Therapy (Sun City) is a physical therapy clinic in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, orthopedic clinic, physical rehabilitation center services. With a 5-star rating from 97 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Endeavor Physical Therapy (Sun City) provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Lydia Ramon
reviews_list.text: They were very helpful in making me better with my issues. Jake front desk tech always helpful. ADAM & JACOB best PT techs that I have ever had in my life time. I highly recommend Endevor Physical Therapy. Excellent medical PT

reviews_list.author: Ruth Bryant
reviews_list.text: I really appreciated this opportunity for physical therapy. The staff at Endeavor provided exceptional care and training. They were so encouraging. My appointment scheduling was processed efficiently and thoughtfully for my availability. It was a great experience and, if or when, I need to seek care in future, they will be my contact.

reviews_list.author: Andrea Ovens
reviews_list.text:
After a car accident and many years of being a desk jockey couch potato, I started to have back pain. My doctor recommended PT and gave me a referral. Jacob put me on a treatment plan to make my back stronger and give me better posture all while entertaining me and cracking jokes.

The PT part was tough, but let's face it, I went from sedentary to 10k in matter of days. I was sore, I downed Advil everyday, but slowly I got stronger. I stood up straighter. I gained a lifetime of knowledge on how to stretch and exercise effectively so I can open a pickle jar well into my 80s.

Go for the therapy, stay for the personality, and leave a better, stronger, healthier person for it.

reviews_list.author: Tamara Boswell
reviews_list.text: I worked with Jacob and Adam and they were amazing. In addition to the therapy provided directly at the practice, I was given home exercises to help strengthen my back which has vastly improved. I can now vacuum without back pain! 10/10 would recommend.

reviews_list.author: Jeff Lloyd
reviews_list.text:
I have been using Endeavor physical therapy in Georgetown (sun city location) after my knee replacement since july 2025 and I have been very impressed with this organization.  I'm going on my 15th therapy session and I'm seeing improvement with every session.
My therapist, Jacob, is a total professional and he taylors my therapy around my goals and wants. He listens to my concerns and we develop rehab goals. Granted, this is a process and will take time for healing and Jacob keeps me grounded to real life healing.
Endeavor and Jacob have earned my vote of confidence and professionalism.
Shout out to Jake in helping scheduling to help fit my schedule.

reviews_list.author: Sue Edwards
reviews_list.text:
Jacob was beyond helpful in getting my knee replacement back into mobility. I think him so much.

Now Adam is working on getting mobility into my neck that has several frozen discs. I’m hoping with his help I’ll be able to continue driving getting more mobility into my neck.

Thank you, both Jacob and Adam for all your help

reviews_list.author: Kenneth Othold
reviews_list.text:
Jacob is one of the BEST physical therapists. He has tons of experience, is very knowledgeable about the body and recovery after injury or surgery.
His personality is very warm and personable. He also is a very focused professional making sure that your therapy is at the level you are in your recovery. He will actually make your visit a quality experience and an enjoyable at the same time. Highly recommend Endeavor Sun City and Jacob to all in need of PT.

reviews_list.author: Alvis R. Lewis
reviews_list.text:
Endeavor Physical Therapy (Sun City) ! It's a very clean environment with Physical Therapist that really care for  you and your well-being Jacob, Pre, are the most wonderful spirited Individuals working to help you get better and as you progress they will slightly very slowly push you out to continue getting better on your on. They will not baby sit they don’t get paid to baby sit. It's not an adult day care 😪 I'm miss them so much .I just drove back to give them a hug. They really helpful in every area while mentally, physically and emotionally 😪  go see them you will feel better ❤️.  Sincerely
Alvis R.Lewis ' Paris!

reviews_list.author: Norma Hurtado
reviews_list.text: This is my second time around with receiving excellent care. Jacob Martin helped me after tendon replacement in my foot in learning how to walk again and strengthen muscles. My second session was arthritis in my back and he helped relieve the pain I had everyday. I have exercises to help in staying pain free. I highly recommend Jacob as he has been the best PT instructor with positive results. He is friendly and a caring person. Meredith his assistant is very organized and on top of keeping his appointments in line.  Great all around experience!

reviews_list.author: Joyce Barrett
reviews_list.text: This is a small but well run physical therapy center. Jacob manages his clients very well and assesses them verbally and physically during each session, getting feedback and making sure clients clearly understand their treatment plan. I was very pleased with my progress.

name: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Southeast / Wolf Crossing
address: 1225 S I-35 Frontage Rd Building H, Georgetown, TX 78626
description: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Southeast / Wolf Crossing is a physical therapy clinic in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, medical clinic, orthopedic surgeon services. Rated 5 stars based on 18 reviews, they provide quality physical therapy for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Georgetown - Southeast / Wolf Crossing provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Kevin Karschnik
reviews_list.text:
I can’t say enough good things about Nahyeli Plasencia and the team at Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy / Institute for Rehabilitation (Stacy at the front desk is always friendly and so helpful). Over the past two months, Nahyeli has helped me rehab my right shoulder after an injury, and the progress has been remarkable. She designed a variety of targeted exercises that strengthened my shoulder and got me back to doing what I love—playing pickleball!

Nahyeli is knowledgeable, patient, and encouraging. She explained each exercise clearly and adjusted the plan as my strength improved. Her care and expertise made every session both productive and enjoyable. I highly recommend her and the entire Baylor Scott & White rehab team to anyone needing physical therapy or injury recovery.

reviews_list.author: Tim Edwards
reviews_list.text: Nahyeli is an incredible physical therapist. She truly cares about her patients and takes the time to listen and understand their needs. Her dedication to helping people recover is unmatched—she goes above and beyond every step of the way. Not only is she highly skilled and professional, but she’s also kind, compassionate, and genuinely invested in your progress. I’m so grateful for her support. Highly recommend this facility and Nahyeli.

reviews_list.author: dordi duncan
reviews_list.text: I am very pleased with the help I am receiving at Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy at 1225 S IH 35, Building H, Suite 120. My P/T is Nahyeli Plasencia Faulks, PT, DPT. She is both knowledgeable and professional and I respect her approach toward physical therapy.

reviews_list.author: Roger Ehrhardt
reviews_list.text:
I did 6 sessions of physical therapy over 3 weeks. The 2 therapist were so kind and knowledgeable. They knew exactly what I needed to do for my pain. I did 1 hour sessions twice a week. They were concerned
about how I felt throughout each session. I finished my last day and let them know that I appreciated how kind they had been. I would highly recommend them. This was Baylor Scott & White OP in Georgetown Texas

reviews_list.author: George
reviews_list.text: I went to Naheli for back to back PT on the same rotator cuff. She knows her stuff and knows how to get the best out of you. Thanks to her I'm about ready to go back to work. I highly recommend Baylor Scott and white and especially Naheli. Thank you so much for making me work hard and getting me to  where I am today. I really don't think anyone else could have gotten me back to 100% l I'm e she did. And she really cares about her patients and their well being. Once again I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

reviews_list.author: D A
reviews_list.text:
I had acl/meniscus repair surgery. The 1st PT place I chose wasn't a good fit so I was looking for somewhere else.
Every place I called was booked out for a month including BSW Rehab Georgetown. Kendra the pt service rep told me (on a Friday) she would let me know if there were any cancelations sooner. I thought ok yea right I'm sure they have a mile long list and they're just saying it to be nice and keep my business.
Monday morning rolls around and Kendra called me first thing to let me know they had a cancelation at 2pm!! I couldn't believe it.  Not only did Kendra make a great first impression impression, the PT Nahyeli is also AMAZING. She's patient, calm and kind. Very knowledgeable and really makes sure you get the most out of your visits.
In addition to the wonderful staff, when you call you actually get to talk to.someone at the location unlike other corporate places that have you talk to a call center. I felt like that was a nice touch.
If youre looking for a quiet calm PT environment with excellent staff come here!!

reviews_list.author: Mick Charles Beaver
reviews_list.text: Nahyeli, the physical therapist at this location, is extremely knowledgeable, patient, and professional. She is accessible outside of visits via email. The assistants at the front desk have been polite and easy to schedule with. Physical therapy isn't fun, but this location makes it easy to access and the visits and home exercises are making a difference.

reviews_list.author: Terry Scanlon
reviews_list.text: Nahyeli is very skilled at providing PT services. I have had several soccer injuries and she has been a big help to my recovery process each time.

reviews_list.author: Dr Dory Byrne
reviews_list.text: This doctor of PT really knows her stuff!! She gave me excellent advice first visit and I’m looking forward to continuing working with her!

reviews_list.author: Linda Ward
reviews_list.text:
Nahyeli Plasencial Faulks, PT is quite thorough and knowledgable.
The exercises she recommended were understandable and are working quite well.

name: Results Physiotherapy Round Rock, Texas - North
address: 201 University Oaks Blvd #500, Round Rock, TX 78665
description: Results Physiotherapy Round Rock, Texas - North is a physical therapy clinic in Round Rock, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, physical therapist services. With a 5-star rating from 153 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Results Physiotherapy Round Rock, Texas - North provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jane Jackson
reviews_list.text:
From my first intake I felt welcome and assured my neck concerns would be handled with concern, patience and true caring.
Rachel set up a program that was easy to follow at home.
Walking into the office for appointments I was met by the infectious smile of Maria and I knew it would be a great!
Working with Rachel, Daniela, Chris and Jax I was educated on how home exercises would help me progress.
When it was time to finish office visits I felt that the clear concise program would help me continue getting the relief I got during office visits.
Thank you very one at RR Results Physiotherapy!

reviews_list.author: Theresa Morris
reviews_list.text: I wasn't sure about going to PT for my acute shoulder pain, but I went. I had the pleasure of working with Rachel, Daniela and Chris and was pleased with the quick response my shoulder had after just a few sessions. Each therapist took the time to listen to my concerns and got right to work. I just finished my PT program and I'm very happy with the results. Each therapist is kind and fun to work with and Maria is an awesome receptionist. I had to move several sessions around a busy travel schedule and she was very accommodating. I would highly recommend this clinic. I'm looking into returning for a different issue and I'm confident they will be able to help.

reviews_list.author: Susan Lobsenz
reviews_list.text: I had excruciating pain as a result of a muscle spasm. Even after having a cortisone shot, I was still experiencing lower back pain. I was miserable. Walking, standing...everything was inducing pain. I was evaluated by Rachel N. She listened to me, gave me a series of performance exercises and then gave me some simple exercises to work on at home. I was hoping that I would have immediate relief, but it took some time. After 3 sessions and working on my exercises at home, I feel great! I'm so glad I went in for help. Rachel was fantastic! She gave me clear instructions and educated me on the muscles that needed work. It was a great experience.

reviews_list.author: Veloris McKay
reviews_list.text: I just “graduated” on 1/23/26 after beginning my journey on 11/20/25. I began my journey with neck and left shoulder (rotator cuff) pain . The staff, Christopher Harper & Daniela Lozada, set up exercise routines, both in office and at home, to minimize and eventually alleviate my discomfort. They explained how muscles worked and my part in the healing process. They were tough and wanted the best outcome for me. Now I have to continue doing my part. “Thank you both.”

reviews_list.author: Elijah Riley
reviews_list.text: I have nothing but good things to say about those place. Rachael is a true professional. Every session with her was an improvement. I walked in barely able to turn my neck in either direction. The bike and T-REX became close friends. Daniel (or the canary) is another story. Sweet and helpful but very deceptive. She doesn't give the appearance of being a strong as she is. 😂 I learned quickly. Would recommend 10 out of 10 again and again.

reviews_list.author: Patti Wrenn
reviews_list.text: What a great experience! Rachel, Chris and Daniela are all great therapists.  I gained such valuable insight and instruction on overall body strength and conditioning. I feel fully restored to a healthy place and able to prevent another occurrence of debilitating pain. Hopefully I won't be needing therapy again anytime soon, but I certainly will return to Results Physiotherapy in Round Rock if I do.

reviews_list.author: Jayne Nazak
reviews_list.text: A big thank you to my Physical Therapist Rachel Nolting at Results PT. I am grateful for her expertise during my PT training. After a few sessions I had significant pain reduction due to her individual care. She listened to me and adapted my treatment as necessary. Rachel is very knowledgeable about the body and her guidance helped me to be pain free. When I went back to my doctor he was very surprised at how quickly I had improved!

reviews_list.author: Renee Lyle
reviews_list.text:
I’ve gone to Results Physiotherapy twice now post-op (bone spur removal on my heel and full knee replacement), and both times have been an amazing experience. Chris and Daniela are very knowledgeable and caring PTs. They knew exactly what I needed to get back on my feet, literally, and I could not be happier with the recovery progress I’ve made because of their expertise.
Annette and Shari are the nicest, most accommodating front desk staff I’ve met in a long time. Their friendly attitude and willingness to work with my schedule was like a breath of fresh air. They have even sent happy birthday and “checking in” texts which mean a great deal.
It may sound silly, but I enjoyed being there so much, I was disappointed when my hour was up and I had to leave.
I will absolutely go back when I have the other knee replaced, or any other pain for that matter, and I tell all my friends they couldn’t find a better PT clinic in all of Round Rock!

reviews_list.author: Dee Benn
reviews_list.text: Truly enjoyed working w PT Rachel Nolting.  With her guidance and expertise my lower back pain and leg neuropathy improved greatly. She listened and customized a therapy regimen that addressed my pain points effectively and precisely every visit.  She nailed it for me!

reviews_list.author: Kaveriamma Sundaram
reviews_list.text: Christopher was outstanding. Great deep massage and other exercises he worked with me helped a lot for a fast recovery. Thus facility is so easy to get around plenty of parking . People there are amazing friendly helpful and very accommodating. I would and tell others to go there in future . Thanks Chris for all you did for a fast recovery

name: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Round Rock
address: 116 Sundance Pkwy Suite 400, Round Rock, TX 78681
description: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Round Rock is a physical therapy clinic in Round Rock, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, medical clinic, orthopedic surgeon services. With a 4.8-star rating from 121 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Baylor Scott & White Outpatient Therapy - Round Rock provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Nicole Faris
reviews_list.text: 12/10 recommend this outpatient PT location. Ask for Madison! She is incredibly personable, truly listened to my goals, and set realistic expectations. I am really looking forward to continuing my rehab here. The facility is very clean and everyone is super friendly!

reviews_list.author: cindy johnson
reviews_list.text: Baylor Scott And White PT has made all the difference in my physical life. Lisa, my physical therapist listens, uses the most current techniques and then figures out what’s best for me. She gives me the perfect homework and I feel better after working with her. Unfortunately, I’ve had to go numerous times throughout the last year and a half, two years, but she never ceases to figure things out. Everyone there is very warm and personable and always knows how to handle drs. orders or insurance, whatever comes up.

reviews_list.author: Rajesh Moparthi
reviews_list.text:
Ideally, I would have given a zero or negative.

We went for PT for my wife.

Their charges are astronomical. For 30 minutes of light massage, they billed $274.

Even though we were close to our out of pocket maximum for our insurance for the year, they wanted us to pay. They promised that we will get refund, if there is credit.

Once the claims are all processed, they say that we should call central billing and request for refund. It is virtually impossible to get hold of central billing (Wait of 1 hour and still on)

reviews_list.author: Kimberly Matthews
reviews_list.text: I’ve been going to the BSW-OP in Round  Rock for a month and I’ve received the best care . The people in the clinic are amazing . I highly recommend this facility to all!!

reviews_list.author: Randall Coahran
reviews_list.text: Great Physical Therapy center. Staff and support are professional and personal when dealing with issues.

reviews_list.author: Priscilla Pipho
reviews_list.text: Staff is professional, friendly and competent. Learned a lot about how to maintain my health.

reviews_list.author: Emilie Taylor Morales
reviews_list.text: I had an amazing experience with Lisa. She was so nice and very knowledgeable. She explained everything before she did it and always made sure I was comfortable. I went in for a pulled abdomen muscle that was preventing me from playing volleyball and within a few weeks I was back on the volleyball court! The front desk staff were also very sweet and professional. Most days I had to bring my daughter with me and on the one day I didn’t bring her everyone was asking where she was and said they missed her, they are all very genuine. I highly recommend Select Physical Therapy!

reviews_list.author: Kathy Pierce
reviews_list.text: Raymond is excellent!!  I started a few years ago with Sciatic nerve issues. I end up walk better than the last 27 years. I have used him for my shoulder and a knee replacement in April 2022 and currently for my other knee replacement in November. Through the years I have had PT and wasn’t to sold on it. I have realized it’s the PT worker. I highly recommend Raymond. I will always come back to Raymond if I need future PT once I get through the current PT.

reviews_list.author: marilyn Guidry
reviews_list.text:
Over the years I have tried various physical therapy departments in Austin. I had surgery two years ago on my L4/5 back area 2 years ago. It failed and again I am suffering with chronic pain. Pt was ordered once again so I sought out another location. It was close to my home and was affiliated with a hospital. It was perfect. Everyone there is a physical therapist and in fact my therapist has her masters in the field. I came to the table with a nursing background so I knew what I wanted and needed for my chronic condition. I was pleased Larissa was one of two therapist who could administer dry needling which has really helped me in my progress.
The front staff is pleasant. The place is not too large, clean. lots of parking and feels homely. Besides all these positive remarks they have a large bowl of my favorite candies at the front to grab as I go out the door.

reviews_list.author: Dayle Malen, LCSW
reviews_list.text: I feel very fortunate that Dr. Tran referred me to Baylor, Scott and White Physical Therapy. Everyone there makes me feel welcomed and cared for. My therapist, Larissa, truly listens to my feedback and adjusts treatment accordingly. She is thorough and professional, yet very warm and attentive.  This is the place you’ll want to go to for your recovery.  Thanks and my heartfelt appreciation to all of you!

name: All Care Therapies of Georgetown
description: All Care Therapies of Georgetown is a physical therapist in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapist, occupational therapist, speech pathologist services. With a 4.8-star rating from 132 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: All Care Therapies of Georgetown provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Breanna Hawkins
reviews_list.text:
My daughter has a neuromuscular disease and her doctors recommended therapy to help  manage it. She has OT, PT, feeding, and speech therapy, so we spend a lot of time at All Care. One thing that's readily apparent is that all the therapists there are passionate about their work and go above and beyond for all their clients.

My daughter's therapists, Jess, Gia, Patty and Kat, do an incredible job recognizing my daughter's needs and limitations and tailoring each of their sessions to her specifically. They make their sessions fun but also ensure she's working, too. One session my daughter was having a meltdown about bananas and Jess incorporated bananas into the entire hour-long session- they made banana art and played banana games and she came out happy and ready for her next session. As a parent of a child who struggles with transitions, I appreciate Jess' flexibility!

My daughter absolutely adores all her therapists and really enjoys coming to therapy. We have noticed a huge improvement in her emotional regulation, her behavior, her physical abilities, her stamina, and her speech! We saw my sister for Thanksgiving and she was shocked that she could understand what my daughter was saying. The therapy is incredibly effective and we're so grateful for All Care. We highly recommend them to anyone in the Georgetown area!

reviews_list.author: Shannon Selden
reviews_list.text: I cannot recommend All Care Therapies enough! From the first phone call with Logan who answered all my questions and explained everything clearly to our weekly check-in process to our OT therapist - all TOP NOTCH! Our OT Jess has been so great with our son. She has improved his daily living quality tremendously. She is so patient and kind, she really meets him at his level. She varies the treatment plan to accommodate his needs. She listens to him and the parent carefully and adjusts accordingly. We will be starting PT soon as Jess noticed there was a potential need. I have no doubts PT will be just as awesome as OT!

reviews_list.author: Michael Gray
reviews_list.text:
I was diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease in 2018 and earlier this year my neurologist recommended All Care Therapies as a way to keep the flexibility and movement that PD takes away over time.

I was assigned a dedicated Therapist (Callie) who specializes in PD treatment (specifically the PWR system) and she developed a program specifically for me and my PD related issues. Since working with Callie, my posture is much improved and my balance and flexibility have been noticeably stronger.

In addition to medication; diet and exercise are vital in the management of PD.  I cannot imagine a better partner than All Care therapies on my PD journey.

Mike Gray

reviews_list.author: Roger Heckroth
reviews_list.text:
Dr. Allie was my OC therapist that worked with me during my rehab for my broken wrist. She took time to insure that I understood what each exercise would be used to for to get my strength back each week.  Dr Allie made sure that I wasn't over working the wrist based on how long it had been since my surgery,  Each visit the level of therapy would increase to assist in strengthening my wrist.
All of the staff that I engaged with from the staff in the office to Dr Allie and 2 other OC therapists that I worked with were professional, friendly and truly helpful in making my recovery successful.
I highly recommend All Care Therapies to anyone that will need Occupational Therapy.

reviews_list.author: Courtney Alcott
reviews_list.text: All Care Therapies of Georgetown has exceeded my family’s expectation of care for not only myself, but for my son as well. I was referred to them for some OT with Jenna and PT with Katherine - and with their help and care plan, my symptoms were resolved and diminished. I was also able to get my son in for speech therapy and as a teenager, I was not exactly sure how he’d respond but he has greatly enjoyed working with Bailee. The strategies she’s provided have given him confidence and he’s met several of his goals in a short time. I am so grateful to have such an amazing resource to support the families of Georgetown and surrounding areas within a few miles of our home. The front desk staff is also amazing and so helpful with billing questions - and always greeting you with smiles. If you’re looking for therapy locally, definitely reach out to All Care Therapies of Georgetown.

reviews_list.author: Sally Gelbaugh
reviews_list.text: I am quite pleased with the positive changes to my hands. Allie has given me lots of advice on how to improve my hand strength and flexibility. She is very knowledgeable, and I credit her ability to fashion exercises and therapy so suitable for my hand problems.

reviews_list.author: Susannah Sladek
reviews_list.text: My son has been a patient at All Care on and off for about nine years (a testament in and of itself!). In all our years, we have had nothing but great experiences. Each therapist we have worked with has been positive, uplifting, loving, and passionate about what they do. They have such great rapport with all of their patients and do a great job of making therapy fun. All Care and all of its employees have done so much to help our family over the years. I don’t know where we’d be without them! Not enough stars in the world for the All Care Team!

reviews_list.author: Fran Crea
reviews_list.text:
The service provided by All Care was exceptional. I was fortunate to have been treated by one the owners but everyone else that I dealt with was equally knowledgeable    and professional.  During my treatments. I was updated about my progress and given home exercises to complete during the week.  All treatments were explained well which helped me understand better what I was dealing with.

One observation I made was that at 8:00AM when all the therapists came out to get their first patients, which  were mostly children, the faces of the patients lit up as they were excited to see the therapists.  That spoke volumes about the care and the trust between the patients/therapists.  You can’t teach that, it comes from passion for what you do.

Overall, a great experience.

reviews_list.author: Lisa Webb
reviews_list.text: We’ve had a wonderful experience at All Care Therapies! Jen has been amazing—so patient, knowledgeable, and engaging with our toddler. Since starting therapy, we’ve seen so much improvement, and we’re so grateful for the care and support from the entire team. Highly recommend All Care Therapies to anyone looking for exceptional physical therapy!

reviews_list.author: Kirsten Proctor
reviews_list.text: All Care Therapies is such a fantastic place with the most friendly staff! My daughter works with Ms. Patty and she is phenomenal. So patient, helpful, and great with the younger kiddos! She has helped my daughter with her speech immensely. So thankful for her and All Care Therapies!

name: Texas Physical Therapy Specialists
address: 204 S IH 35 Service Rd Ste 203, Georgetown, TX 78628
description: Texas Physical Therapy Specialists is a physical therapy clinic in Georgetown, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, physical therapist, sports medicine clinic services. With a 4.9-star rating from 234 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Texas Physical Therapy Specialists provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jack Lau
reviews_list.text:
I've recently finished my course of treatment at the facility in Georgetown. The facility was well maintained and the staff there are excellent - friendly and helpful-  from the front office folks to the PT techs and the PTs themselves.
I especially enjoyed working with Dr. Trevis Green there. From the initial assessment to each of the treatment sessions, Trevis was great about listening to my feedback on whether a particular treatment was working or not. Based on that, he'll adjust the intensity or recommend other treatments.  I credit his ability to work with his patient as a team to pinpoint the issue and prescribe the right set of treatments to address the root issues. Highly recommend working with Dr. Trevis.

reviews_list.author: Misty Berry
reviews_list.text: My first ever PT experience and it was great. Everyone at TexPTS is caring, knowledgeable and so down to earth. I felt well cared for. Special thanks to Andrew Pepin who went above and beyond to help me and educate me on how to take care of my quad, and Stephanie Dittrich for keeping the place flowing and positive!

reviews_list.author: Jim Lemar
reviews_list.text: Dr. Sarah Woods and her team at Texas Physical Therapy are outstanding. The most caring, concerned, and professional group you will ever find for your PT needs. Thank you.

reviews_list.author: Amy Barclay
reviews_list.text: Dr Trevis Green took excellent of my teenage son, who absolutely loved working with him. The staff was so kind and helpful with taking care of our appointments. We are thankful!

reviews_list.author: Cindy Bednar
reviews_list.text: My therapist, Dr. Neil Sheth, and all of the staff at the Georgetown clinic, were just great!  This was my THIRD time to go through knee replacement, and I must say that my therapy this go around was much better than my previous experiences.  Dr. Neil designed a program for me that got me back up to my old self and ready to tackle my favorite activities.  Yes, it was hard work, but Dr. Neil and the rest of the staff were awesome at keeping me motivated, and they made it a little fun as well!  I “graduate” this week, but if I ever need therapy again, I will be back!

reviews_list.author: Joyce Estes
reviews_list.text: For several months earlier this year, I was treated at the Georgetown location of TPTS.  At every appointment,  I was met by the friendly and very efficient staff at the front desk.  Each of my appointments began right on time with one of the experienced technicians.  Form the very first session my therapist, Heather, made me feel important. She is very knowledgeable and super sweet.  I always knew that she was genuinely concerned about my treatment. She was quick to make adjustments in my treatment based on my response to the exercises.  I can highly recommend the Georgetown location of Texas Physical Therapy Specialists.

reviews_list.author: Sarah Barrientos
reviews_list.text: I started PT here in June after a sprained ankle. This was my first bad injury and I was really nervous about the healing process. Everyone I interacted with was amazing and made me feel so comfortable! In particular, I'd like to give a shout out to my physical therapist Trevis, Andrew (PT), Stephanie (tech), and Jess (front-desk). They were all so kind and supportive. PT was hard work but they made it really fun. I can't thank this team enough and I highly recommend going here!

reviews_list.author: bruce devore
reviews_list.text: Everyone I was in contact with was great to be with. Their professional and pleasantness were always displayed.  Questions were always answered, the treatment plan, and any later changes to the plan were explained. Doing at home exercises as assigned is a big help in meeting your goals of getting better. I was constantly improving so much, my workout plan had some changes about every 2 weeks. In the end I did not need to extend my physical therapy, having improved way past my goals.

reviews_list.author: Sharon Davis
reviews_list.text: I couldn't have chosen a better place to go for physical therapy after my knee replacement!  Dr. Sarah Woods' expertise and wonderful care got me on track for a super fast recovery; and Jess and the other techs were also extra helpful and caring.  Appointments were easy to make and the front staff was always accommodating and super friendly.  I'll always choose Texas Physical Therapy Specialists for any physical therapy needs in my future.

reviews_list.author: Guillermo Basualdo
reviews_list.text:
STEPHANIE , DIPIKA AND SARAH are literally the best. Awesome atmosphere, real serious recovery process and fun to come. ❤️ this place and staff.
I strongly suggest you pick this place for your best recovery.

name: FYZICAL Therapy & Balance Centers - Round Rock
address: 1700 E Palm Valley Blvd Ste 395, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: FYZICAL Therapy & Balance Centers - Round Rock is a physical therapy clinic in Round Rock, TX, offering physical therapy clinic, women's health clinic, physical therapist services. With a 5-star rating from 159 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated physical therapy providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: FYZICAL Therapy & Balance Centers - Round Rock provides quality physical therapy for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Vincent Carilli
reviews_list.text: I have been working with team for 7 months and they have helped me to be able to function more normally! Each of the therapist have been ahoy to work with and are very knowledgeable! I will miss them now that I am feeling better.

reviews_list.author: Brian Bagley
reviews_list.text: Joe, Melinda, and Natalie were amazing. I highly recommend them to anyone recovering from a full knee replacement. They took time to answer my many questions, stayed later, and did a great job of getting me recovered. They held me accountable for my at home exercises and made sure I stayed on top of my daily routines. Highly recommend them!

reviews_list.author: Julia Buhisan
reviews_list.text:
I highly recommend FYZICAL to anyone looking for PT, especially athletes. Kylie guided me through rehab for both a shoulder sprain and an ankle sprain during my competitive roller derby season, ensuring I was able to compete in two tournaments despite a tight turnaround from injury. She put so much thought into curating a program that addressed the specific physical demands of my sport, and she adapted each session based on where I was that day and what my goals and timeline were moving forward.

Even when I sustained a secondary ankle sprain mid-recovery, I was still able to go into tournaments feeling strong, stable, and confident thanks to her preparation. She educated me on taping techniques, warm ups, and recovery strategies. She genuinely takes the time to understand athletes and programs in a way that supports your specific performance needs, not just general recovery.

In addition, their office staff was incredibly helpful from my first phone call, walking me through insurance, explaining my coverage, and outlining costs before I even scheduled an appointment. Throughout my treatment, they made the administrative side of things a breeze.

I am so grateful for the care I received and would absolutely return for any future PT needs.

reviews_list.author: Patrick Guerra
reviews_list.text: I came in with tennis elbow that i had been suffering with for a couple of months. Staff educated me and taught me how to fix the problem. They listened to me and they are ALL so friendly and helpful. There is never a dull moment. They all treat their patients equally and all I have seen is happy patients. Front desk provided exceptional service also 💜

reviews_list.author: Elaine Plettman
reviews_list.text: Summary of my experience: Dr. Kylie Dugan and the Round Rock Fyzical staff are knowledgeable, kind, competent, thorough and punctual. I’ve, unfortunately, been to a lot of physical therapists over the years. Kylie Dugan is one of the very best. I would highly recommend her if you need therapy.

reviews_list.author: Joseph Bruni
reviews_list.text:
These guys are fantastic!! Natalie has been my PT & she is wonderful! I had a lot of severe sciatica pain, & after 6 weeks my pain level went from a 10 to about a 2. I am amazed. I had seen a spinal Dr. for possible surgery, but now I don't think I will need any surgery!
Also a shout out to Joe, the other PT. He really knows what he is doing! I would recommend either of them.
I would highly recommend "FYZICAL" of Round Rock if you need help with your aches and pains!

reviews_list.author: Patty Martin
reviews_list.text: After discovering I had a chronic condition that affected my balance and coordination, I went to FYSICAL. Joe and Natalie helped me regain my abilities and confidence. I'm now able to walk around and feel stronger without worrying about falling. I would highly recommend them and will go back without hesitation should I need further assistance.

reviews_list.author: Sheila Mehta
reviews_list.text: The best physical therapy team ever. Truly! I had a massive car accident and only started to feel relief when Natalie & Joe started working with me. They strengthened my muscles, helped me with functional movements, and TAUGHT me how to make the changes in my life to keep me strong and moving. I cannot say enough good things about their caring hearts, genuine concern, and outstanding professionalism. If you need a physical therapist, there's no one better.

reviews_list.author: Aseel Machi
reviews_list.text:
After an initial consult, I did physical therapy postpartum for roughly 4 months with Khylie. I learned so much, like how to engage the appropriate muscles to correctly lift my baby without causing excess strain on already weak points postpartum. I was worried about lifting heavy weights but Khylie gave me the education and courage to do so safely. Khylie is passionate about women’s access to health and has a breadth of knowledge that aided in understanding where I was on my journey.

I highly recommend women of all walks of life - but especially prenatal and postpartum women - to experience firsthand how to better strengthen and support their bodies with the expertise of Khylie at Fyzical Therapy.

reviews_list.author: Victoria Price
reviews_list.text: I was very happy with the care I received and am confident going forward that I can greatly decrease my chances of reinjury. Both physical therapists that I worked with were great assets for what I needed. Joe assisted me in recovering from my injury while Natalie helped me recognize what I was doing that kept me in a continuous reinjury loop. I really appreciated the stretches and exercises that I was assigned to both help relieve and decrease my current pain and strengthen the muscles I wasn't aware were weak. As someone with a busy schedule, I appreciated that the home stretches and workouts they gave me during my time were manageable and doable for my lifestyle. I want to also call out how wonderful the front desk staff was. Lillie and Sara were very personable and easy to talk to. I appreciated how much help they were during my health insurance confusion. Overall, a wonderful experience and I highly recommend the Round Rock location.

name: Texas Medicare Shop
description: Texas Medicare Shop is a insurance agency in Georgetown, TX, offering insurance agency services. With a 5-star rating from 288 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated medicare & insurance providers in Williamson County.

reviews_list.author: Brad Ferguson
reviews_list.text: Texas Medicare shop and I have had a relationship since 2018.  My wife signed with these great folks recently as well.  They are very knowledgeable about Medicare and the changes that occur on a yearly basis.  I was with one supplement provider and we have recently changed that with almost $200/month in savings.  Gotta like that.  Utilizing these folks, Gentry Ferguson and Bobby Coates gives you a secure feeling in knowing that your best interest is all they care about.  I encourage anyone with Medicare questions to call them and work their magic.  You will NOT be disappointed.  Thank you Gentry and Bobby.

reviews_list.author: Lisa P
reviews_list.text: We are so fortunate to have the Medicare Shop in our area.  Wayne Coates is very thorough and thoughtful in assisting in all things Medicare.  He is updated on all the products and knows the right questions to ask to get you the best insurance. Presley is also very nice and efficient when you call, whether setting up an appointment or asking any other questions. I would recommend their services if you have any questions about Medicare.

reviews_list.author: Linda Crawley
reviews_list.text: I have been dealing with these folks since I initially became eligible for Medicare. I had no idea it was so involved and complicated. I knew nothing about how to handle this. I saw Bobby who literally saved me. I walked out of there with a little more understanding and knowledge. I felt at ease entering this chapter. I have continued to see him every year to be sure my needs were being met and my plan was what I needed. Every one at the office is super friendly and knowledgeable. I highly recommend them and urge you to visit them and remove the stress you endure trying to handle this alone.

reviews_list.author: Adriana Joseph
reviews_list.text:
Update:

I found out yesterday that my current United Healthcare Plan is not disappearing as of 12/31/25, as I was told at this location.  The plan is in force and will continue with a few increases which are still 50% less expensive than the plan that I was signed up for and approved.  I was misinformed and, had I not consulted directly with my insurance provider, would have made a costly mistake for 2026, solely based on the recommendation made at this location.  As an example, my current plan has a 2026 hospital deductible of $150 per day for the first 6 days.  The plan I was offered is $325 per day for first 6 days!!

I thought this was an amazing experience; walked in without an appointment and just as soon as I was almost done providing my information I was able to meet with Mr. Bobby Coates, however , I was misinformed.

Mr Coates is professional and knowledgeable.  With a few key questions he was able to identify my medical coverage requirements and find a plan that provides coverage with my current physicians and medications., however, I was misinformed and was told my plan would end 12/31/2025.  United healthcare confirmed that it is not ending!!   Because I was already changed I had to reapply to my current plan, which I’ve had for over 5 years, and am pending acceptance.

If you have a current plan, speak directly to them for options to avoid misinformation.

Thank You!!

reviews_list.author: RB R
reviews_list.text: They were great to work with!  She pulled up the available plans and narrowed them down to fit my needs.  Then showed us online a comparison between plans and costs.  Made finding a new plan so easy.  Did the application and submitted it for us.  Would use them every time!!!  Friendly staff and a very comfortable place.

reviews_list.author: Roy Daigle
reviews_list.text: I met with Wayne Coats and I can't recommend him enough. Very knowledgable and extremely helpful and kind. I'm so grateful that The Medicare Store was recommended to me. Thanks All!

reviews_list.author: Marian Fisher
reviews_list.text: I worked with Diane and could not be more pleased with her knowledge and expertise. She placed both my husband and I with coverage we feel comfortable with.  Highly recommend Texas Medicare.  Thank you Diane

reviews_list.text: Wayne is very knowledgeable about all aspects of Medicare.  He was able to recommend a plan that will save me a considerable amount of money without sacrificing the level of coverage I am accustomed to having.  Very professional yet friendly.  I highly recommend Texas Medicare Shop if you have any questions at all about changing your coverage. No charge for advice.

reviews_list.author: Pleasants Bramlett
reviews_list.text: I didn't expect such a relaxed atmosphere during my last minute sign up. No rush, just friendly & upbeat! Gentry was great with his patience & expertise. Feeling grateful for the referral to TMS!

reviews_list.text: Great local company for Sun City residents. We highly recommend them. They have helped us for years.

reviews_list.text: We recently moved to Texas and began looking for a new Medicare Supplement/Advantage plan. They are  knowledgeable, professional, understanding and an overall pleasure to work with.  They were able to save my spouse and I just over $172 a month, which was almost half the previous premium.  We still have a plan that allows us to travel across the USA with coverage that has lower deductibles and the ability to  choose any service provider.  We highly recommend TMA and especially Jason & Shannan.

reviews_list.author: Randall Wofford
reviews_list.text:
Jeff Whitt, our Texas Medicare Advisor, was friendly, professional and extremely knowledgeable. He was patient and informative throughout the entire process, making it less stressful to switch our policies. Jeff took the time to explain our options clearly and answered all out questions. Randy and Carol Wofford

reviews_list.text: My wife and I were in a quandry as we tried to decipher the pros/cons of each Medicare plan, do we go with Advantage or a Supplement and then inside each which was best for us? The next step was to get all of our information together and get our applications in, Shannan was awesome in taking charge and getting the forms submitted. We started on a Wednesday and found out we were approved Friday morning! Effective and efficient, knowledgeable, friendly, and obviously interested in OUR best outcome. Absolutely recommend Texas Medicare Advisors.

reviews_list.author: Kristen

reviews_list.author: Cynthia Trux

He also made sure I knew when to sign up for Medicare and what the upcoming months would look like. When I left the meeting, I was confident I had chosen the right company to go with.

Thanks so much, Jeff! I'm really excited to work with you on this.

reviews_list.author: Joanne W
reviews_list.text: Rachelle Abbott is amazing - responsive, informative, and patient! I am retiring and moving to TX at the same time and selecting a Medicare supplemental plan was overwhelming. Rachelle helped me pick the best plan for me. I wholeheartedly recommend her and Texas Medicare Advisors.

reviews_list.author: Darla Watson
reviews_list.text: After weeks of frustration trying to get our Medicare questions answered by luck I stumbled upon Rachelle and it has been smooth sailing since. She solved our issue, and she signed us up in 3 days! I am still in amazement because I had spent countless hours on hold and talking to "experts". I highly recommend Rachelle and her company...she is knowledgeable, kind, responsive and quick!

shortDescription: Hanson Insurance provides quality medicare & insurance for seniors in Liberty Hill, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jeanine Eby
reviews_list.text:
Hello fellow insurance seekers.  I so rarely do this but I read reviews when I'm not sure about something just to get a feel for it. Read'um rarely write'um. That being said, Emily's card was given to us by a trusted friend who said "you should call Emily, she's really good" To say that was the an understatement, would truly be an understatement!! If Mozart played health insurance instead of piano, that's Emily. Her knowledge and understanding of the almost unimaginable health insurance nightmare is truly superhuman, and, she's so nice and understanding in finding out all the things that are your individual insurance requirements and needs, well, you just want to have her over for dinner. What i know now is, I Didn't know anything about health insurance! Emily, Jeanine and I just want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all you do for all the people like us! You truly are a health insurance Goddess! You make the world a better place! So, if you’re wondering if you should call, you should, you'll be happy (and healthier) you did!!!!!
Big hugs to you and yours Emily, we'll never use anyone else
Thank You
David and Jeanine Eby

reviews_list.author: Brad Churchill
reviews_list.text: Emily is fantastic. She is willing to go the extra mile for her clients. I cannot thank her enough for her help in dealing with the different government login sites which were not accepting my valid drivers license. She is extremely competent and will ensure that you are fully informed when making your decisions. Look no further for an agent to help you when getting ready to sign up for Medicare.

reviews_list.author: Karen Janos
reviews_list.text: As in the past E.H. was excellent in her presentation. But she always makes each person feel important and special. Her information knowledge is exceptional. More important, if she isn't aware of answer, she always takes the time to find the correct one.

reviews_list.author: Tyler Mueller
reviews_list.text: Emily Hanson and team are amazing at what they do.  They truly care about the people that they cover and it shows.  If you know of anyone that is in need of medicare, call Hanson Insurance and you will be happy you did.

reviews_list.author: Sarah Swanson
reviews_list.text: My husband and I (both attorneys and used to filling out forms correctly) began the process of applying for Medicare ourselves. We used the official government website.It was a mess! My husband received a message saying that he wasn't eligible for Medicare (he is 67, born in the U.S., has worked since he was. teenager, and is very eligible) I received a different message and was told that I needed to wait for a code to be snail-mailed to me in order to continue to apply. We each called Social Security and each waited over 3 hours on hold before talking with someone, neither of whom could solve our problems. My husband was then given the an appointment for April, which is outside of the open enrollment period. Then, a friend recommended Emily Hanson. Let me begin by saying that I wish that every professional who I deal with was as good at their job as Emily is at hers. By the end of our first meeting, she had managed to get us both enrolled for basic Medicare, helped us choose the supplements we would add as soon as we received our Medicare numbers, and  helped us choose an ACA plan for our 23 year old daughter, who had been on our group plan. We couldn't believe that we had gone, in one meeting, from thinking that it would take months to untangle the problems that the Medicare website had created to having successfully completed the application process. I will recommend Emily to everyone I know who is approaching Medicare eligibility or needs other health insurance, and I am planning to ask her to evaluate and help us update our life insurance plans. I had talked with 2 other highly-recommended agents before I began the process of applying for Medicare on the government website. Neither of them help their clients through the initial application process and neither of them was nearly as knowledgeable about Medicare products and rules as Emily was. In fact, one of them gave me some incorrect advice, which could have had serious consequences. Emily, by contrast, walked us successfully through the application process, gave us very clear explanations of the different options, and gave us very clear instructions for what to expect next and told us that she would be happy to help us through the next steps. I will always use Emily for our insurance needs going forward. I only wish that I had known about her earlier!

reviews_list.author: Diana Hurley
reviews_list.text:
Melissa Goodin was absolutely wonderful to work with as we navigated the confusing world of Medicare plans. She is incredibly knowledgeable, extremely thorough, and highly detail-oriented. From start to finish, she guided us through every step with patience and expertise.

Melissa took the time to educate us, answering every single one of our (many!) questions with kindness. Without her, I have no doubt we would have ended up with a less suitable plan that cost us more. Before meeting with Melissa, we had no idea what we were doing—but by the end, we not only fully understood our plan, but we also felt confident it was the right one for us.

I can say with 100% certainty that I highly recommend Melissa Goodin for anyone needing help with Medicare, Medicare supplements, or Advantage plans in Texas. She is truly the best!

reviews_list.author: Casey Palazzuoli-Bevilacqua
reviews_list.text: Expert advise professional service, Emily took her time, helping us to navigate all the complex terms and details of all available plans. Couldn't have done it without her!! She's the BEST!

reviews_list.author: Eloise Neely
reviews_list.text: Emily Hanson helped us decide on a Medicare Advantage plan for next year, hearing all our projected medical needs, etc.  She advised us to stay with our present plan, although it did not bring any financial advantage to her.  She was easy to talk to and listened and responded to all our questions.  We found her very helpful and accommodating. She is a star!

reviews_list.author: Joanie Mandel
reviews_list.text:
We are pleased to let everyone know that we are clients of Emily Hanson Ins.Agency. Emily’s communication skills and her knowledge of the health insurance industry are off the charts. Thanks to her,we are comfortable with the choices she helped us make. thank you Emily,
Joan & Sandy Mandel

reviews_list.author: Katy Wells
reviews_list.text: You won't find a more thorough, engaging and helpful agent than Emily! She leaves no stone unturned, and is dauntless in navigating the complexities of this ever changing world of information.

reviews_list.author: Sasha Blankenship
reviews_list.text: This is our first year with Mirkes Insurance, and we have been very happy with the service we have received so far. Most recently, she helped me with updated info for a vehicle change, and the process was smooth and stress-free. I really appreciate her support and responsiveness—she makes insurance feel easy!

reviews_list.author: Valery Rojas
