reviews_list.text: I got both my vehicles insured here at a competitive rate! A big thank you to Cristina Gallegos for making the process smooth and straightforward. She answered  all my questions and created my policy to fit my needs.

reviews_list.author: Colleen Christensen
reviews_list.text: Cristina Gallegos was super helpful and communicative when I needed to update my car insurance policy. Even better, the increase in premium was very minimal for a much upgraded car :) Thanks so much for your excellent customer service!

reviews_list.author: Halie Matuszak
reviews_list.text: I recently moved to Georgetown, and had a pleasant experience with Jessica Z! She was professional, responsive and helped find the right coverage for me. I highly recommend to anyone looking for an agent in the Georgetown area!

reviews_list.author: Tommi-Lynn Sawyer
reviews_list.text: Gareth exemplifies true professionalism. His customer service, attention to detail, and genuine care for his clients are simply unmatched. From finding the best coverage and rates for our family to guiding us through a car accident with compassion and clarity, Gareth has been incredibly attentive and supportive every step of the way. They simply don’t make people like him anymore. Without hesitation, I highly recommend choosing Gareth Trimarco as your State Farm agent!

reviews_list.author: Jaco Visser
reviews_list.text: Cristina G. at State Farm consistently delivers exceptional service. Her prompt email responses and comprehensive assistance, even with numerous inquiries, are truly appreciated. She maintains a friendly demeanor and provides clear, helpful guidance.

reviews_list.author: Kristie Staley
reviews_list.text: Allison has been absolutely AMAZING!! Anytime I've needed to make changes or adjustments she is quick to get it done, and takes the time to explain and/or answer any questions I have. Her customer service is above and beyond. She is such a delightful person to work with. Definately recommend her to everyone!!

reviews_list.author: karthik kusa
reviews_list.text:
I recently switched my auto insurance to State Farm, and I couldn’t be happier with the experience.
Cristina Gallegos made the process incredibly smooth and stress-free. She provided me with a quick and competitive quote, and her outstanding customer service made all the difference. She was attentive to my needs, answered all my questions, and ensured that I understood the coverage options. I highly recommend State Farm and especially
Cristina Gallegos for anyone looking for a seamless insurance transition!

reviews_list.author: Pam Carroll
reviews_list.text: I had an amazing experience working with both Cristina and Allison! Cristina went above and beyond to help me with a ton of details, answering all my questions with clarity and patience. Allison saved me thousands on my yearly car insurance payments—I couldn’t believe how much she helped me cut down my costs. They also helped my 16-year-old son, who’s a new driver, making the process smooth and stress-free for both of us. I felt truly supported by both of them throughout the entire process. I would absolutely recommend them to anyone looking for great service and real savings!

reviews_list.author: Teresa Bascon
reviews_list.text:
My husband and I decided to move to Texas after 22 years of military life, and buy our forever home. After many years of using the same insurance carrier we started to have some issues with the insurance company. We knew we had to look into a new Insurance carrier, but it was so scary to even think of leaving someone that we had been with for so many years. We just kept on making the large payments and dealing with what we thought was our only options. The company that we had been covered under for so many years changed their coverage structure and their customer service was on a major decline.

By chance my husband and I took our son to an outdoor event where I saw a State Farm agent table. I was like, nope. I was so agitated to even walk by there, because the only thing I knew about State Farm was the commercial and other people’s bad experiences. I just thought it was going to be daunting to even have the conversation with anyone, much less with a large known Insurance carrier. My son saw a booth that he wanted to go to and I had to walk by. Allison was so amazing! It felt like it was going to be too easy, which made me very nervous. Her spirit and personality just drew me in. She made me feel at ease about transitioning to a new company from all my insurance needs. She made all the necessary transactions. We did very little on what we thought was going to be an overwhelming task. Since then we have had to file a claim with State Farm due to a house issue. We were nervous wrecks, all the things that I have ever heard about filing a claim came to mind. We were so overwhelmed to even make the phone call. The first few steps that we took we knew that we were in great hands. The whole entire State Farm team was by our side the whole way. Phone calls, emails you name it. They were there. Their customer service is one of the best I’ve ever experienced. I know that their motto is “Like a good neighbor State Farm is there”, but it should be “like family State Farm will always be there”. Because they have always made us feel so amazing. They have given us nothing but empathy, kindness, patience, and understanding. Even when we had questions or concerns about our insurance coverage, they have been phenomenal. They have always made us feel at ease offering us  guidance when we are questioning what we need to do next. They are definitely like the calm of the storm. I know if I call for anything I am going to be smiling and feeling like I am in great hands by the time I hang

I recently told one of the office team members that I wish I could call them when I’m having other problems, because they make me feel so great by the time I’m off the phone. They truly are like family. Thanks State Farm family. Allison, Kelci, Lauren, Cristina, Jessica, Sam, and Gareth we appreciate you.

name: Solace Hospice
description: Solace Hospice is a hospice in Pflugerville, TX, offering hospice services. Rated 5 stars based on 9 reviews, they provide quality hospice & palliative care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Solace Hospice provides quality hospice & palliative care for seniors in Pflugerville, TX.

reviews_list.author: Kyle Parish
reviews_list.text: I volunteered here, and I was honestly impressed. The staff is patient, kind, and respectful. The building felt calm and welcoming. You can tell they truly care about the residents.

reviews_list.author: Avant Orwick Business
reviews_list.text: I’ve been working alongside this hospice company for some time now, and they are by far one of the most compassionate and well-organized teams I’ve encountered. Their staff is warm, professional, and truly attentive to the needs of both residents and families. They also provide a great environment for someone like me who is beginning a career in health care to learn and grow.

reviews_list.author: Isabella B
reviews_list.text: The team here provides a level of care that is rare to find. They care deeply about their patients' comfort and well-being, and they treat families like their own. My loved ones are in good hands!

reviews_list.author: Macy Wise
reviews_list.text: I can give 5 stars to the Solace Hospice team without hesitation. The management team is truly top notch and leads with the utmost compassion for each patient’s physical, emotional, and spiritual comfort and care. I would highly recommend this hospice to anyone looking to place their loved ones in the hands of a team that is consistently deeply caring and dedicated.

reviews_list.author: nancy stephens
reviews_list.text: Omg! I couldn’t ask for more from Latoya she is the Best! she do everything with no complaints! She always a phone call away when in need her. Amber and Latoya are a great team, they are aware of what’s going on always& if they’re needed they step up and help. I have no complaints at all.

reviews_list.author: Tina Sartor
reviews_list.text: It’s clear the Solace Hospice team in Austin genuinely cares about their patients and their families. They stand by their commitment to dignity, compassion, and thoughtful communication. The team works hard to support people socially, spiritually, and medically through some of life’s hardest moments. You can truly feel the passion and professionalism they bring to hospice care in Austin.

reviews_list.author: Ashley Ritter
reviews_list.text: The Solace Hospice team in Austin is amazing. They communicate clearly and keep you informed every step of the way. Their compassion and professionalism truly make a difficult time easier.

reviews_list.author: Becca Galli
reviews_list.text: The Austin area is fortunate to have this hospice care team providing such great care to patients. They go above and beyond to nurture the patient and the family!

reviews_list.author: Gail Gibson
reviews_list.text: Solace Hospice personnel really means it when they say they focus on their individual  patients well-being and quality of life.  The Community Liason was friendly and made each patient smile.

name: Aspen Hospice and Palliative Care
address: 1717 N Interstate Hwy 35 STE 305, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Aspen Hospice and Palliative Care is a hospice in Round Rock, TX, offering hospice, home health care service services. With a 5-star rating from 498 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hospice & palliative care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Aspen Hospice and Palliative Care provides quality hospice & palliative care for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sergio Sanchez
reviews_list.text: Not only is Aspen Hospice a great care service, but their team does a phenomenal job! From doing creative activities to ice cream social events for our loved ones! I want to shout out Amy! From day 1 when we met her we knew she wasn’t like any other hospice services. Amy is passionate about what she does, I don’t say this much, but Amy is one of the best hospice person that we have met that does above and beyond. Thank you for all that you and your team does! We are blessed to have your service at our community.

reviews_list.author: Prashanthie Velmurugan
reviews_list.text:
I am a volunteer with Aspen Hospice, and during my weekly calls to check-in with the patients, several of them are very appreciative of the thorough, kind and warm support Aspen offers.

I'm very grateful to Darline whose generous spirit is as inspiring as it is encouraging. In one of my patient visits with a sweet elderly woman, I helped her make a bacon, egg, sausage sandwich and upon tasting it, she closed her eyes and did a little sweet dance swaying her hips and putting her hands in the air and said, "this is so good, precious, I'm never letting you go!" It was extremely fulfilling to witness that level of joy and play some part in making that happen. I want to thank everyone in Aspen for helping me find this wonderful human connection.

reviews_list.author: J
reviews_list.text: I am a Executive Director of a memory care and was very blessed to meet Jenny Sprague a marketing rep for this company. I feel safe referring my families to this company. Jenny is very professional, caring and passionate. I trust Aspen will take care of my residents.

reviews_list.author: Aaron Velez
reviews_list.text: Jenny Sprague with Aspen Hospice is amazing! She has been a colleague of mine for years and I can trust her to provide excellent service and support to our mutual clients and referral sources. I appreciate her strong work ethic and the services provided by Aspen Hospice.

reviews_list.author: Conslar Sanders
reviews_list.text: AMAZING service! Jenny was so friendly and professional. She exceeded my expectations in every way. I really enjoy working with her and recommending Aspen to everyone!”

reviews_list.author: Nicole Anderson
reviews_list.text: If you’re looking for a great hospice to place your love one I highly recommend Aspen. The staff is professional and the CNA Joyce is wonderful she take great care of our residents here at Autumn Leaves.

reviews_list.author: John Brown
reviews_list.text: Jenny is a great resource for persons wanting to explore hospice companies. She is passionate about helping people and being an advocate for Aspen Hospice. She is quick to respond to any situation to see how she can help.

reviews_list.author: Elda Derseh
reviews_list.text:
Definitely one of our favorite hospices !💜
Jenny is incredible—kind, compassionate, and always easy to communicate with. We highly recommend Aspen Hospice for your loved ones!

reviews_list.author: Susan Parrott
reviews_list.text: Aspen Hospice and Palliative care is a wonderful company to deal with.  Honest, upfront and very professional.   They truly care about their patients.  They go above and beyond the call of service.  Would highly recommend to anyone in need.

reviews_list.author: Elvira Deleon
reviews_list.text: I really love how respectful and responsible. Sabrina is she comes and she takes care of what she has to do. She works hard andmy grandma get all the help she need from her and they have a good team 😀

name: Divinity Hospice
address: 3000 Joe Dimaggio Blvd STE 40, Round Rock, TX 78665
description: Divinity Hospice is a hospice in Round Rock, TX, offering hospice services. With a 5-star rating from 30 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hospice & palliative care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Divinity Hospice provides quality hospice & palliative care for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sara Byrd
reviews_list.text: This hospice company is amazing! They provide compassionate care and attention to their patients. From leadership, to the nurses and CNAs to the chaplains- they go above and beyond. I would recommend this company to anyone looking for services for a loved one!

reviews_list.author: scf22atx1
reviews_list.text: When choosing a Hospice company to support the end of life care of your loved one  it can be very stressful and scary. To think who shall assist in this heavy decision is what's on the mind. So to have a Hospice company in mind to be the bridge that your loved one crosses with dignity and respect is why I affirm Divinity Hospice Services. Having work side by side and supported by Ashley Perez-RN with Divinity Hospice Services, servicing the greater Bastrop areas is my number #1 go to Hospice Nurse. Ashley represents the compassion, integrity, and knowledge that bests describes her skills for anyone needing Hospice Services for their loved one or self. She IS above and beyond daily, she is experienced and truly cares. Ashley is integral to the services she provides and informative beyond imagination. Ashley represents "Nursing" at its' very finest and once you meet her smile, you will know Ashley Perez-RN, Divinity Hospice Services and her crew.

reviews_list.author: Naomi Rowley
reviews_list.text: Ashley Perez is by far the sweetest, kindest and most caring RN you will ever find! She goes out of her way for the care of any resident!!! I love seeing the residents light up when they see her coming! She is more like family to them! ♥️ divinity was lucky to find her!

reviews_list.author: Jamie Thompson
reviews_list.text: Ashley Perez RN is absolutely amazing! She is attentive to her patients, trustworthy and reliable. She is caring, compassionate and an absolute jewel! ❤️

reviews_list.author: Derick Trenevsky
reviews_list.text: The staff at Divinity Hospice showed a level of empathy and understanding that was truly remarkable.  Their team met all of our needs, from medical to emotional.  I highly recommend them for your loved one as well.

reviews_list.author: Beth Hamilton
reviews_list.text: Amazing group of caring, loving people. Generous and knowledgeable with the greatest understanding and empathy for their clients and families, I have ever worked with.  I am very grateful to have them in my life.

reviews_list.author: Laura Polasek
reviews_list.text: Divinity Hospice are the best. They were great with my dad and wonderful with residents. Shoutout to Ashley, she is the best.

reviews_list.author: Tammy Mize
reviews_list.text: Thank you Divinity for your time of care of my mother in-law! Though her time was short on hospice, we are so grateful to have such a dependable, caring, and professional company.

reviews_list.author: Gaven Hobbs
reviews_list.text: The Round Rock office was absolutely amazing. Staff was professional and communicated everything to us. Highly recommend for anyone wanting the best for their family.

reviews_list.author: Jason Roman
reviews_list.text: A great hospice company! They are amazing! They are caring and compassionate and right there when you need them the must.

name: Traditions Health Hospice
address: 2681 Gattis School Rd Ste 180, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Traditions Health Hospice is a hospice in Round Rock, TX, offering hospice services. Rated 4.4 stars based on 14 reviews, they provide quality hospice & palliative care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Traditions Health Hospice provides quality hospice & palliative care for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Christy Anderson
reviews_list.text: I need to be able to give leas than 1 star.  No one’s loved ones should have to suffer due to the callous incompetence that we have experienced.  My mom was transported from the hospital back to her normal facility with Traditions Hospice.  When we arrived, no equipment had been delivered.  We had to wait 4 1/2 hours for her hospital bed and oxygen to arrive.  Later at 1:30am she began to struggle to breathe and we found out that no comfort medicines had been delivered.  I was on the phone arguing with a triage nurse and finally got them to send 1 prescription to a 24 hour pharmacy.  I picked it up at 3 am.  They refused to send out a nurse immediately and told us one would be there with other medication at 8am.  By 9am I was back on the phone with them.  At that point no one had even picked up the medication.  After claims of the pharmacy being out and having to transfer the prescription to a closer pharmacy, an employee with a car broken down on the side of the road, and bad traffic, a nurse finally arrived with meds at 11:54am - 23 hours after discharge.  We have switched Hospice companies, but now are still struggling to bring her pain and struggles under control because once it is out of control, it takes a lot to bring it back under control.  I would not wish this hell on anyone.

reviews_list.author: Karen
reviews_list.text:
My dad was in compassionate hands when we changed his hospice care to Guiding Hospice.  The transfer occurred  24 hours before he passed away, but Guiding never left his or our side.  From first meeting Andrea the community liaison, I knew we had the right group.  Rachael was our nurse and she became a member of our family, stepping in and out of dad's room as needed.  AJ, the social worker, Courtney and Kathy, more nurses, were all there for us, too.

We only had them for 24 hours, but their support will last forever.  They truly have the heart and time for their families.  I can only say, "Thanks for everything".

reviews_list.author: Tricia Fryer
reviews_list.text: We recently had a wonderful experience with Guiding Hospice.  All of the staff that cared for Mom were loving, kind and respectful, not only to Mom, but to our family.  We appreciated their support and encouragement throughout the journey.

reviews_list.author: Karen Murray
reviews_list.text: My family's experience with Guiding Hospice, now Traditions, was the most unprofessional, disorganized, stress invoking experience I've ever had. At a time when a family needs guidance and compassion, they provided mistake after mistake after mistake, took my dad's dignity away, could not agree on the procedures from representative to representative, misled us on numerous occasions and the very last indignation was calling me to tell me my dad had passed.......when in fact their RN on duty had reported the wrong individual. Yes! They told me dad had passed when he had not! Had we not decided to employ caregivers from a private pay firm, I can not imagine what other indignities would have been seen. Stay as far away from them as possible and if you happen to hear the names Aimee Crump, Andrea Wilkerson, Mike Benson or Tim Kruger, RUN DON'T WALK AWAY FROM THIS HORRIBLE, WORTHLESS, PATHETIC excuse for a hospice organization.

reviews_list.author: Christi Cornell
reviews_list.text: As a healthcare professional, it's impressive to witness how Guiding Hospice has grown over the last few years.  I think it's due to the passion and experience of their team who care deeply about end of life.  They work very hard for their patients to enable great care and solve problems as they arise.

reviews_list.author: Carly Shelton
reviews_list.text: Guiding Hospice sets the bar extremely for all other hospice companies.

reviews_list.author: Ryan T. Schmidt
reviews_list.text: "THE JOURNEY IS EASIER TOGETHER"

name: Compassus
address: 1717 N Interstate Hwy 35 Suite 130, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Compassus is a hospice in Round Rock, TX, offering hospice, home health care service services. Rated 4.2 stars based on 31 reviews, they provide quality hospice & palliative care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Compassus provides quality hospice & palliative care for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Mary Lueders
reviews_list.text: I had a near death experience when I became a patient with Compassus. That was the best day of my life because a year and two months later I was discharged in good health.  I had the best care in the world, best aides, and, the very best nurse. Tami Moore Waugh.  From the  very beginning of this journey she was compassionate, kind, caring, explained everything so that I could understand it, whether good, or not so good.  She kept on top of all the medications I needed and  communicated with the doctor if she saw a need for a change. She made me feel comfortable with the condition I was in and would go out of her way to make it more comfortable.  Now, praise God, I'm on my own but I miss her terribly. I'm 88 years old so I know it won't be too far off when I may be with Compassus and Tami again.  They are fantastic.

reviews_list.author: Mark Lehmann
reviews_list.text: In a time of distress, the Compassus staff stepped in to provide much needed relief to ,y weary and exhausted siblings taking care of my ailing mother.  They not only took care of my mother in her final days, but took care of me and my family ensuring that we could focus on meaningful moments with loved ones.  After care has been fantastic.

reviews_list.author: Catherine Sewell
reviews_list.text: My late husband was a Compassus patient for a week before he passed from cancer and kidney disease. I’m a retired RN and I was totally pleased with everything they did for us. Administration  was efficient and the nurses and other staff were very competent and caring.

reviews_list.author: Daniel & Teresa Jimenez
reviews_list.text:
Despite the fact that I was one of my dying son's primary caregivers, the director won't even talk with me about an ongoing family dispute. She had told me that hospice would not get involved because it was a "family matter". I was physically assaulted in front of my son and 10-year-old son (and a police report was filed), so the following DOES apply. I am not a fringe family member; I was directly involved in my son's day-to-day care. I reached out to their corporate compliance division several weeks ago, spoke with someone who promised to get back with me at least by the following week; I never did heard back! I have filed several regulatory complaints but those take time and since my son is already in hospice, we don't know how much time is left My heart is broken and no one seems willing to help.

Under 42 CFR § 418.64(d) - Counseling Services and § 418.56(c) - Plan of Care, hospice is required to:

Assess the family and caregivers for psychosocial needs related to the patient's terminal illness.

Offer counseling and social work interventions to support them in their caregiving role.

Help resolve stressors as they affect the patient's care and safety.

reviews_list.author: Dennis Perz
reviews_list.text:
Compassus personnel arrived when my wife returned home from a hospital stay.  First to arrive was Maryanne Holiday, a Compassus nurse.  Maryanne was kind and empathetic providing both support and encouragement
to my wife and me.  On the first visit I asked Maryanne directly how the hospice process went.  She was specific in the details of how things would proceed until death.  I always felt that I understood my job as caregiver and where Compassus personnel stepped in.  Maryanne always responded promptly to all requests.

Wanda Smith did an outstanding job as an aide providing my wife with comforting baths and friendly companionship.  She and Marilyn formed a close bond during the hospice period.  At Marilyn’s request Wanda came three times a week for bathing and personal care.

Sierra Burton has visited with me several times since Marilyn passed to help and advise me through the grieving period.  Like Maryanne and Wanda she does her job very well and has been effective in helping me.

I believe the Compassus organization as a whole provides much needed services to patients and family as death approaches.  The quality of their personnel and the services provided are outstanding.  My family and I are all very grateful for their help.

reviews_list.author: Cathy Gutierrez
reviews_list.text:
My beloved husband was placed in hospice care with Compassus in August of 2023 due to multiple strokes and other medical issues
A registered nurse came at least weekly and the assistant named Lorie came twice a week. The compassion of the whole team was outstanding. My husband was given tremendous care and love. They were always giving me suggestions on how to deal with his different issues. And at the very end in the last five days of his life they were spot on with what would happen in those coming days. Lorie was the most remarkable caring person I have ever met. Not only did she know how to get my husband to actually shower but she always got him to smile and laugh and talk. Lorie was the truest blessing of all. She also made sure I was all right. We made a remarkable friendship out of all this sorrow. I would highly recommend Compassus.

reviews_list.author: Paula Harper
reviews_list.text: Tara, Kelsey, and Terri offer care to my grandfather  in Leander with much compassion. Our family feels blessed to have their assists. Thank you 🙏🏼

reviews_list.author: Richard Wagner
reviews_list.text: I Selected Compassus Hospice to help me me with the end of life care for my sister in Austin, Texas. They were responsive to her and my needs and the hospice care needed. They took care of business.  During the end of life process they were attentive an kept me informed  as I was out of state . After her passing, the support offered was good. Personally I did not need the support  but it was there. I have no issues with their services. All is good.

reviews_list.author: Norm Uhl
reviews_list.text: When my wife and I reached the end of her cancer battle and there was no hope left, we decided she would die at home under hospice care. Her oncologist recommended Compassus, but being a retired journalist I looked at several and asked a lot of questions. In the end, we chose the hospice with the most staff and the most resources and Compassus surpassed our expectations. There was one glitch with equipment but they had someone at my house within a hour to fix it. My wife died during Austin area rush hour but the hospice nurse kept us informed about her progress in getting to our house and was here in just over an hour. Through our experience we met some of the nicest, most caring people you'd ever want to meet. They met all our needs and in most cases were several steps ahead of what we needed. The pharmacy they used, Liberty on Williams, was on top of our needs as well, with daily deliveries to keep us supplied with the needed prescriptions. I am grateful to all of the people involved for providing a peaceful passing for my wife surrounded by loved ones. Plus, afterwards they got the equipment out of my house the next day and have checked in on me several times and offered grief counseling for all family members for 13 months. It's part of the service and it's all paid for by Medicare. I highly recommended Compassus and remind you that the biggest players in any industry are the most likely to draw negative reviews. Plus, many people with positive experiences do not post reviews, so I am doing it for them.

reviews_list.author: Sheila Shung
reviews_list.text: Compassus staff are caring, responsive and supportive.  Can’t thank them enough for getting us through the end of life of my father.   Words cannot express the gratitude our family feels towards the staff and physician at Compassus.

name: Lone Star Circle of Care at Georgetown Dental
description: Lone Star Circle of Care at Georgetown Dental is a dental clinic in Georgetown, TX, offering dental clinic, community health center services. Rated 4.3 stars based on 122 reviews, they provide quality dental care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Lone Star Circle of Care at Georgetown Dental provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sayednoor Samim
reviews_list.text: It was an exceptional experience and truly the first of its kind for me. I have never before received care with such a high level of attention and comfort. I am extremely impressed by the professionalism of Dr. Diwan, Dr. Shoubaki, and their assistant, Victoria. They are truly outstanding.

reviews_list.author: Tanya Ramos
reviews_list.text:
I didn't know Lonestar offered dental! A friend told me about this place. I had a highly pleasant experience. When I walked in I was immediately greeted and taken care of. Unlike family medicine in the other building, where at 8am they had a very bad attitude.

Fatima greeted and took me back to the exam room. I explained what I needed and she was very kind and respectful she is a great example of a great employee. Dr. Shoubaki was very sweet and attentive to my concerns, also great for Lonestar. They made my visit very smooth and caring

Thank you.

reviews_list.author: Gustavo Del Aguila
reviews_list.text: Lonestar Dental are the best. Dora, Yulianna and Karina are always so helpful and make me smile. No one like them, the best!!  Dr. Shoubaki and Fatima were so nice and made me feel happy with my cleaning.

reviews_list.author: Sandra Rodriguez
reviews_list.text: This place is AMAZING! I was able to get an Appt and the staff was very friendly and organized with payments and scheduling. The dentist assistant Ydnar was very polite, gentle and patient when explaining my concerns and procedures. Dr Shoubaki is the sweetest dentist she was very precise on what needed to be done and made my experience all that better coming from a patient that has gone through a lot of dental trauma. For the 1st time in my life I actually look forward to my dentist Appts. What a blessing LSSC Dental Georgetown has been for me.

reviews_list.author: Yogi Terence
reviews_list.text: I would recommend Lone Star circle of Care Dental to everyone. I absolutely love my Dentist, Dr. Rao and her assistant Randy. From the moment you walk into the office, ladies at the front desk are professional and always ready  to assist you. Dr. Rao is not only my Dentist but also one I considered as a friend in whom I look forward to seeing at every appointment. As ironic as it may sound, she and her staff are amazing. Thank you Ladies

reviews_list.author: Heather Farrar
reviews_list.text: Dr.Rao and nurse Randy were both amazing and were very patient with my daughter. Nurse Randy and Dr.Rao both answered questions that they could and if they couldn't they directed me to the right person that could. Definitely doing to keep going back.

reviews_list.author: Olga Reyes Gavilan
reviews_list.text: I had an awesome experience. From Dora and Yuliana at the front desk to Ericka B. And Dr Shoubaki, all were extremely helpful  and kind. I can’t wait to start my dental plan and get that beautiful smile. I also want to say that the prices are extremely reasonable.  Thank you all for the great experience.

reviews_list.author: Vanessa Yepez
reviews_list.text: called ahead to let them know i was going to be late, she said “after 15 mins, your appointment will be cancelled”, I come in 8 mins late and i speak with an old white lady & she tells us we’re “too” late. Don’t tell patients their appointment will be cancelled once 15 mins have passed if you’re not going to go by that and cancel it even earlier. My mom really needed this appointment and we live an hour away.

reviews_list.author: pat croake
reviews_list.text: Dr. Rao & Randy helped me tremendously yesterday with my anxiety of getting dental work done. I have seen Dr. Rao several times for dental work and I always feel anxiety at first but she has a very calming professional touch! I would recommend her and Randy for dental work needed. You won’t feel a thing!! Thank you again Dr. Rao and Randy!

reviews_list.author: Irina Feigina
reviews_list.text: Amazing experience!  First time in my entire life! I was never treated so carefully and comfortably before.  Very impressed by professionalism of Dr. Diwan and assistant Tori.  They are fantastic!

name: Lone Star Circle of Care at Round Rock Health Clinic - Dental
address: 2120 N Mays St # 430, Round Rock, TX 78664
description: Lone Star Circle of Care at Round Rock Health Clinic - Dental is a dental clinic in Round Rock, TX, offering dental clinic, dentist services. Rated 3.8 stars based on 60 reviews, they provide quality dental care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Lone Star Circle of Care at Round Rock Health Clinic - Dental provides quality dental care for seniors in Round Rock, TX.

reviews_list.author: Jessica Ruiz
reviews_list.text: Horrible place they scheduled the wrong date for me to bring my kid and  Dr Rogers send us away. They dont care to waste your time. I work and have to take time of from work. The people at the front desk are never paying attention to people who arrive and when they schedule appointments they arent scheduling accordingly. I dont recommend them. There is better places out there!

reviews_list.author: Megan Sanchez
reviews_list.text: Dr. Roopa and her assistants Melanie and Ana are always sooooooo supportive and making my nervous kids comfortable and talk over the procedure to ensure a smooth visit.

reviews_list.author: Briana Hunnicutt
reviews_list.text: Abigail and Ana are very sweet and make my kids feel welcome and comfortable. Dr. roopa is very knowledgeable and professional. I trust her with making my kids feel safe. she always gives me options and tries to get my kids care done the most efficient way possible! highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Jennifer Ewing
reviews_list.text: We had a wonderful experience with Abigail as our Dental Assistant for Dr. Roopa.  Abi made my 4yo, who is usually very scared of the dentist, feel safe and calm. She showed her all the instruments she was using and let her hold things and helped her to understand very clearly what was about to take place with each procedure. They were both very nice and friendly, and my daughter actually said she had fun!

reviews_list.author: Helen Landeros
reviews_list.text: We have a great and comfortable experience with Abigail as a Dental Assistant for Dr. Roopa. They are very professional and knowledge. They explained me very well  at every moment, and they gave me options for prevent cavities and keep the good bucal health for my kid. Very good attention!

reviews_list.author: katpat23
reviews_list.text: I’ve used the dental clinic on Mays with my four kids for over 7 years, and we are fiercely loyal to “Dr Roopah” and her staff. Today, we saw Ana, Abigail, and Dr Roopah, and have got a-1 service as always. I especially appreciated how attentive Dr Roopah was to my children’s need for referrals for removing wisdom teeth in a timely way, and always talking over any concerns while giving praise when they take care of their teeth well.

reviews_list.author: Mary Chavez
reviews_list.text: I have been taking g my grandkids to LSCC for the last 13yrs  .I have nothing but good things to say about them.Staff they are all courteous @RR ,Hutto,&Pville I have never had problems so I don't get negative reviews come from.I would not go anywhere else.

reviews_list.author: Madeline Jacoby
reviews_list.text: We love our sons Doctor, Dr. Satish. She is very sweet and VERY informative. The place seems very clean and the front desk staff are always very nice and personable. They always provide us with printouts explaining vaccines for us to take home. Very good and gentle with our 6 month old son. We haven't seen any other doctors at this location so far, but we highly recommend Dr. Satish!

reviews_list.author: Brian Coffman
reviews_list.text: This place really gets under my skin. They did have great doctors once upon a time but, now all of the doctors there seem like they are in a hurry. They continuously over book and you end up waiting over an hour in the waiting room. So, I suggest if you have an appt there, plan on being there for a while. I have had rude doctors and my kids never saw that same one more than once. I will never take my kids here again…….

reviews_list.author: colombiawithanita “colombiawithanita”
reviews_list.text: I highly recommend Dr Roppa and her assistant Abigail, they are super kind and they made my son love coming to the dentist for his check ups! They can assist you in English and Spanish, I wouldn’t change them for anyone else!

name: Austin Dental Cares
address: 1900 E Howard Ln a4, Pflugerville, TX 78660
description: Austin Dental Cares is a dentist in Pflugerville, TX, offering dental clinic, dentist services. Rated 5 stars based on 10 reviews, they provide quality dental care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Austin Dental Cares provides quality dental care for seniors in Pflugerville, TX.

reviews_list.author: Carey Massey
reviews_list.text: Dr Tran and all of her staff have been absolutely fantastic in taking care of my dad (and previously my mom too) at their nursing home.  They are very detail oriented and have great communication from scheduling, procedures, to any after care.  My dad is a bit cognitively impaired and prefers to speak in his native language and yet Dr Tran and her hygenists have bent over backwards to make sure he is always comfortable and at ease.  You will not find more caring or patient caregivers, they are the best!

reviews_list.author: Tracy Williams
reviews_list.text: To start off, I  have irrational but solid dentist terror as well as a challenging dental situation. I came here with an extremely painful issue and was understood, listened to, well cared for, was immediately made comfortable by the professionalism and knowledge of the entire staff. DrTran was spectacular and we worked at my pace. My problem was fixed, a plan for the next step organized. I have not felt so comfortable and involved in my own dental life health care plan before. I did not feel like  a burden, rushed, belittled or dismissed and I HIGHLY recommend Austin Dental Cares

reviews_list.author: Cara Wheeler
reviews_list.text: I am submitting this review on behalf of my Mother, Linda Wheeler. My mom was terrified of the dentist due to past childhood trauma so she was making excuses not to go to her appointments but she FINALLY went and fell in love with her dentist! My mom said she was kind, patient and listened to her regarding her pain. Mom has wanted to get her teeth fixed for soo long, thanks to her new dentist she will be a new lady in no time! Thank you for giving my mom a new confidence in herself!

reviews_list.author: Sandy Riojas
reviews_list.text:
Austin Dental Cares - really cares about their patients. When my brother was seen by Dr Tran she was so patient! She took her time and made sure is mouth and teeth were the best that it could be.  My brother is in a nursing home and this was the first time he had his teeth looked at in years. He can't take care of himself. Thos doesn't bother Dr Tran she gets the job done!
Dr Tran got busy and continued cleaning for 2 hours! Today he is back for his 2nd mouth care with Dr Tran. She found an ulcer and recommended a specialist to evaluate it.
Dr Tran not only cleans, but at the same time inspects for possible issues. She is simply Amazing! If you are looking for a wonderful dentist- look no further!

reviews_list.author: Amanda Sandlin
reviews_list.text: I can’t say enough wonderful things about this great group of people! They took a broken front tooth emergency next day during COVID-19 pandemic and saved the day!! Dr. Tran thoroughly explained the treatment plan and made us feel completely comfortable; she was gentle, professional and wouldn’t allow us to leave until we were 100 percent satisfied with the work. The staff was friendly and kind. This office definitely earned a return patient! We thank you from the bottom of our hearts. Do yourselves a favor and visit Austin Dental Cares...you won’t regret it!

reviews_list.author: Julie Mokry
reviews_list.text: They came in to see my mom in the nursing home, and they are so easy to work with. She had a wonderful experience. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Kim-Yen Vu
reviews_list.text:
Wonderful care!
Wonderful service!
Dr. Tran is just a kind person! So kind!
And the staff are nice and attentive and patient!
Always willing to help!

reviews_list.author: Lynn Haag
reviews_list.text: Amazing dentist!

name: Horizon Dental Care
description: Horizon Dental Care is a dentist in Georgetown, TX, offering dentist services. With a 4.8-star rating from 98 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Horizon Dental Care provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Colleen Nadolski
reviews_list.text:
I had been going to this practice for years with great care. Since Dr Zeyad Mughrabi (Dr Z) left, the practice has gone downhill. I needed a crown and the tech doing the prep took over an hour. When I came in for the follow up (twice) it didn’t fit…the dentist did not want to start over….
Will not go back or recommend this practice to others.

reviews_list.author: John Bear
reviews_list.text: Been coming here for 6 years, they're consistently awesome. Great staff, highly knowledgeable. Very clean, professional, and friendly.  Great communication. They are honest and don't try to upsell unnecessary services. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: EJC Cason
reviews_list.text:
This place changed hands and all I can say is don’t go here. They double Charged us they had us get a loan through their so-called loan company for no reason they double charged us and now they’re saying that they’re gonna refund us to pay the loan off but yet we don’t have a refund yet. Bad bad bad service do not go here.
It took a phone call to the corporate office to get this resolved.  We were quoted double the cost of the procedure.  Their response is simply to cover their incompetence.  We will not never go back here.   I see there are many other complaints on the reviews so we have no doubt they will be out of business soon !!!   Good luck !!!

reviews_list.author: Karen Wilson
reviews_list.text:
These people must have sold out.  I ask when i made an appointment to have a tooth pulled if I had a look and see appointment or to pull the tooth out.  I was told they would take care of it when I came in.
Instead, they charged me a look and see fee of $138, and gave me an estimate for $2,000 to put a new cap on it.
People were not friendly, especially the young dentist.
They didn’t even give me a cost for an extension until I ask for it.

reviews_list.author: Charlene Dixon
reviews_list.text:
Used to love this place before the recent changes and new management. I had a great experience in the past, but things have gone downhill. My husband recently went in for the same services I had done the previous year, and we were shocked to find extra charges that shouldn’t have been there. Turns out, the new billing person made some questionable decisions. Beware of the new billing practices — double check everything! Won't be coming back.

In reply to your response I called to inquire why my husband was charged $160 for a procedure that I underwent the previous year for only $50. Describing the charges as “identical” seems inaccurate, given the $110 difference in copays.

When I requested an itemized statement, I was sent a list of procedures without any CPT (procedure) codes, which made it impossible for me to verify the charges with our insurance provider. I followed up via email to request the appropriate codes and unfortunately never received a response.

At this point, we’ve decided not to return. Thank you for your past care, but this experience has been disappointing

reviews_list.author: Kimmy B.
reviews_list.text: I have had a lifelong fear of the dentist as I had a bad experience as a child.  Every person in the office made me feel relaxed and like I was in good hands.  The office itself is easy to locate and very clean ad bright inside.  The whole staff is professional and very caring.  Doc is personable and knowledgeable and it doesn't get better than that. The fees are reasonable and  I am kinda looking forward to my next visit--what????  THANK YOU!!

reviews_list.author: lullia Jones
reviews_list.text: Just left Horizon dental care in Georgetown Tx and I’m so serious, the entire staff are so professional and so kind and available for all of my dental needs. My new upper and lower partials are beautiful and they fit wonderful. My beautiful and awesome dentist Dr. Nafi is professional and lovable. My daughter referred me to Horizon dental and I feel like they’re my new dental family. I’m so serious!!!!

reviews_list.author: Sean E. Bradley
reviews_list.text: Horizon Dental offers a very positive and a clean, welcoming environment along with a very friendly staff who genuinely care for your treatment and well being. Though only my second visit, the staff treated me as a long time friend. Scheduling appointments for routine care is very flexible by offering weekend hours to work around a busy work schedule. I highly recommend the dental staff at Horizon Dental for all your future dental needs.

reviews_list.author: Ahmad Alzhoury
reviews_list.text: I swear he is the best doctor in the world. I went to him about ten years ago. He fixed my tooth and he didn’t charge me any fees. I went to Jordan to see another doctor and he said he is a skilled surgeon. Thanks

reviews_list.author: Jess
reviews_list.text: I was a late bloomer when it came to proper dental hygiene. So, when I needed a second root canal, I stumbled on to Dr. Z at Horizon Dental.  Starting with the staff at the front desk, Dr. Z and Dr. Nafi, and the rest of the staff are all excellent people.  They all seem to be very sincere about the work I need to have done, and don't try to sell me procedures I don't need.  A special thanks to Kinsey, the hygienist. She's always a real professional, and caring at her job.

name: Cedar Park Dental Wellness
address: 251 N Bell Blvd Ste 106, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Cedar Park Dental Wellness is a dental clinic in Cedar Park, TX, offering dental clinic, dental hygienist, dental implants provider services. With a 5-star rating from 471 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Cedar Park Dental Wellness provides quality dental care for seniors in Cedar Park, TX.

reviews_list.author: A K
reviews_list.text:
I really enjoyed my experience at Cedar Park Dental Wellness. I had several procedures done here, including a professional cleaning, fillings, tooth extractions, and dental treatment. Everything was handled very professionally, carefully, and with great attention to my comfort.

The doctors and staff are true professionals who genuinely care about their patients. Scheduling appointments is quick and easy, and they are always flexible and willing to accommodate your schedule. The clinic is clean, modern, and welcoming.

I am very satisfied with both the results and the overall service. I highly recommend this dental clinic to anyone looking for high-quality dental care and a professional, attentive team.

reviews_list.author: Tatiana Cojuhari
reviews_list.text:
We had a wonderful experience at this dental clinic with our child. The staff was incredibly kind, patient, and professional, which made the visit very comfortable and stress-free. The dentist explained everything clearly and treated our child with great care and attention.

We are very grateful for such a warm approach and excellent service. Highly recommend this clinic to families and children!

reviews_list.author: Megan Puglise
reviews_list.text: I came here because the reviews were so good and from the moment I called to schedule an appointment, I have been blown away with my experience from start to finish. They are so kind, communicate well and have a gentle approach to dental care. Tatiana has done my deep cleaning and has been unbelievable with how gentle she is and I love how she talks me through the whole process (including some of my anxieties). Dr. Regina is amazing too and I’m so excited she’s my dentist. If I ever move to another city, I’m flying back to continue my dental care because they are unmatched by others in the dental field.

reviews_list.author: Volodymyr Antonov
reviews_list.text:
Extremely high quality and absolutely no rush during the appointment.
Worth every penny!

Happy that we found a dentist who cares not only about the money but a true perfectionist who strives to get her job done in the best possible way!

reviews_list.author: A S
reviews_list.text: I recently visited this dental office and was greeted by the friendliest Dr. Regina Yunusov and her husband imaginable. Their advanced equipment, like Gentle wave for root cleaning and robot hand for implant placement, ensures top-quality care with maximum comfort. Every patient is treated with warmth and professionalism from start to finish. As a dentist myself, I can say this place truly stands out. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking exceptional dental care!

reviews_list.author: Yevheniia Omelnytska
reviews_list.text:
I’ve been a patient of Dr. Regina at Cedar Park Dental Wellness for three years, and I couldn’t be happier with the care I’ve received. She is truly dedicated to her work — very detail-oriented, professional, and always striving to achieve the best possible results. I’ve had several procedures done, including crowns and general treatments, and everything was done with great precision and care.

Dr. Regina has an amazing team of professionals as well. Tatiana, who takes care of my cleanings, is always gentle, attentive, and thorough. The whole staff is friendly and makes every visit comfortable and stress-free.

I highly recommend Cedar Park Dental Wellness to anyone looking for a trustworthy, skilled, and caring dental team!

reviews_list.author: Steven Wheeler
reviews_list.text: I would give 10 stars if I could. Everybody was amazing. Good vibes in the office and Dr . Regina was amazing. She has a way of making you feel comfortable. I broke a tooth and have a couple other issues and it can be a little embarrassing. Didn’t feel uncomfortable at all, every thing was positive and no pressure. I am definitely going back to see them again. Steven W.

reviews_list.author: Leslie Woodruff
reviews_list.text: I went in to this dental ofc as a new patient, needing a cleaning.  The dental hygienist was the most gentle, knowledgable and professional one I have ever been to.  I have large mandibular tori behind and in front of my bottom teeth, which make putting in a tray or x-ray apparatus  very painful but they did such a compassionate job.  The dentist was very professional also.

reviews_list.author: Tolgonai Seker
reviews_list.text:
From the moment you walk in, you’re greeted by the kind and professional front desk team. Sasha and her colleague are truly amazing, caring, and precise in everything they do.

Dr. Yunusov is a highly skilled specialist who uses the latest technology and works under a microscope to ensure every treatment is performed with absolute precision. Her professionalism and genuine care for patients are unmatched. I have truly never experienced a dental office that excels in every single aspect.

I also want to highlight the incredible dental assistants. I mostly worked with Yan, who is one of the most compassionate, caring, and knowledgeable professionals I’ve ever met. And Tatiana, the hygienist, is simply the sweetest. She makes the cleaning appointment comfortable and thorough, and you can tell she truly loves what she does.

I’m so grateful to have found such an exceptional dental provider. Highly recommend Cedar Park Dental Care to anyone seeking top-quality dental care and a team that genuinely cares about their patients!

reviews_list.author: Brenda Roemer
reviews_list.text: Dr. Regina and her professional and friendly staff were amazing again! Dr. Regina takes meticulous care while providing excellent dental services. I had a tooth chip that had a 50 year old filling in it. She removed the old filling and placed a crown. Again, she is the only dentist I've ever had to place a perfect crown. I also had a tooth extracted and received excellent care from every member of her team. She checked the next day on me and how I was doing. I've never had a dentist do that. I highly recommend Dr. Regina for all dental care. She is the Best dentist I've ever had.

name: Healthy Smiles Dentistry
description: Healthy Smiles Dentistry is a dentist in Georgetown, TX, offering dentist, cosmetic dentist, teeth whitening service services. With a 4.9-star rating from 378 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Healthy Smiles Dentistry provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Valerie Porter
reviews_list.text: I think I found my dentist! I had a bad experience when I was a kid and had never been to a dentist that didn’t cause me pain, in some way, since. Until now. Dr. Mathias is amazing! I have been a few times now and not once has it been unpleasant. She’s wonderful and her staff is awesome! Look no further for your healthy smile! 😊

reviews_list.author: Kathryn S
reviews_list.text: We've been going here for a few years now. I can't tell you how nervous I was for my first visit, as it had been roughly 20 years since I'd seen a dentist. (Lack of insurance.) I was certain they were going to find multiple cavities and suggest tons of work. To my utter shock, I still didn't have a single cavity! Gingivitis and mild gum disease, sure, but there was never anything recommended that I felt was unnecessary. A few months ago, I had a random tooth bleed after sucking on a sucker. Dr. Mattias had Dr. Heinz come to do a consult with me. After looking at it from a number of different angles and consulting previous dental records, he made the decision that I didn't need that tooth removed. Another score for them! If that wasn't all, I feel like the front desk staff are truly the best. They take time to explain things. I'm so happy to have most of my family going here! (They only take 15 & up, understandable. They aren't outfitted for pediatric dentistry, which is totally fine).

reviews_list.author: R Singh
reviews_list.text: The front office staff are very courteous and friendly. They take time to explain everything to you. The hygienist and doctor are very skilled and did an excellent job with my deep cleaning, filling and crown. They explained all the procedures in detail. I did not have any issues after any of the procedures. I could trust the recommendations made by the dentist. I am glad to have found an excellent, reliable dentist with a friendly, professional team.

reviews_list.author: Robby T
reviews_list.text: Went in for pain emergency tooth pain. They scheduled us right away went in. The Dr let’s do root canal not extract, but let’s give you antibiotics, but unfortunately she’s leaving the country the next day and referred us to another dentist…same thing more xrays then make a schedule on Jan 5 4 days before my regular schedule. Just a way to get us in and pay for something they would not finish. I guess with out of country doctors they just leave anytime, however they should have told us heads up I can’t do any work until January. I do not recommend this dentist

reviews_list.author: Patricia Taylor
reviews_list.text:
Dokey is thorough and careful, explaining what she is doing.  She also educated me on how to determine if a manicurist 's package of tools were sterilized.
And Simi was helpful in explaining the charges and deductibles on my bill, and working with me on subsequent examination/treatment schedules.
Thanks so much.

reviews_list.author: Taylor Fulco
reviews_list.text: How high can I sing the praises of a dentist office? Because it’s honestly not high enough. I pray that whatever insurance I have throughout my life will always cover Healthy Smiles because I will NEVER go to another dentist otherwise. Every single member of the staff from the time you walk in till the time you leave is kind, welcoming, understanding, professional, and knowledgeable. I am not the biggest fan of dentist myself but I don’t worry at all with Dr. Matthias and her team. I actually enjoy coming to the dentist. My husband normally HATES the dentist but since he’s been coming here he doesn’t mind coming to the dentist (the best you can ask for someone with white coat syndrome haha). Worth the drive, worth the wait. 1000/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews_list.author: Vernon K
reviews_list.text:
I had a procedure done this past Tuesday with Dr. Sharon M, and I cannot say enough great things about the experience. From start to finish, everything was handled with the utmost care and professionalism. Dr. Sharon M is not only highly skilled and knowledgeable, but also incredibly kind and reassuring throughout the entire process. She took the time to explain everything thoroughly, answered all my questions, and made me feel completely comfortable and confident in her care.

The front office staff was just as impressive. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted warmly and efficiently checked in. They are exceptionally well-organized and punctual—I really appreciated not having to wait long, which is rare and refreshing in a medical setting.

The entire team clearly takes pride in what they do, and it shows. The environment is clean, calm, and welcoming. It’s evident that patient care and satisfaction are top priorities here. I left feeling well taken care of and truly valued as a patient.

I would absolutely recommend this practice to anyone looking for high-quality, compassionate care. Thank you again to Dr. Sharon M and the entire staff for such a smooth and positive experience!

reviews_list.author: Cydney White
reviews_list.text: Healthy Smiles has the best dental hygienists and dentist! They taught me as an adult the proper way to actually care for my teeth without judgement (I didn’t know electric tooth brushes did all the work for you!) and are always so nice when I come in.

reviews_list.author: Sushma Shetty
reviews_list.text:
Wonderful office and staff .
Our family has been going to Healthy Smiles for many years now. We’ve always been treated kindly and with compassion. Dr. Mathias is an excellent clinician, she explains everything very patiently and makes us feel comfortable. The front office is courteous and easy to communicate with.
Very pleased to have found this office and Dr Mathias.

reviews_list.author: Tina Cassin
reviews_list.text: Dr. Mathias is wonderful.  A great team from front desk to hygienists and Doctors. Dr Mathias takes time to listen to my fears. Is very gentle and explains procedures.

name: Parmer Oaks Dental Care
address: 12171 W Parmer Ln STE 101, Cedar Park, TX 78613
description: Parmer Oaks Dental Care is a dentist in Cedar Park, TX, offering dental clinic, cosmetic dentist, dentist services. With a 5-star rating from 207 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Parmer Oaks Dental Care provides quality dental care for seniors in Cedar Park, TX.

reviews_list.author: Neda O
reviews_list.text:
Words truly can’t express how grateful I am to Dr. Oster and his entire team. I needed immediate oral surgery for a complicated broken tooth, and from start to finish the experience exceeded every expectation.

Dr. Oster performed my surgery with exceptional skill, professionalism, and care. What really sets him apart, though, is how personally invested he is in his patients—he checked on me multiple times both before and after the procedure, which made a stressful situation feel completely manageable.

He delivers top-quality care while also showing genuine support for first responders, offering fair and affordable pricing and payment options. That level of integrity and compassion is rare.

Dr. Oster truly goes above and beyond for his patients. He is, without question, the best dentist I have ever had. Thank you, Dr. Oster. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Deepak Tripathi
reviews_list.text: Great shout out to Dr. Oster and his team! I’ve had nothing but great experiences with them. They’ve taken excellent care of me and my family, whether it was routine care or urgent situations. When my 11-year-old daughter needed an emergency procedure, they helped us immensely and handled everything with care and urgency, which meant a lot to us as parents. The entire team is professional, compassionate, and truly cares about their patients. Their communication and follow-through gave us complete confidence.

reviews_list.author: brandy haney
reviews_list.text: Just let me say how amazing, kind, helpful and loving this dental family is! I am a person who was traumatized with a lot of childhood dental issues and there were no pediatric dentists in our area. It takes a lot of mental/emotional prep to go to the dentist…but, Parmer Oaks Dental Care is a game changer! I have been coming here for years and am beyond thankful for the entire staff! Dr. Oster is a very compassionate and professional dentist who genuinely cares for his patients beyond just their teeth. I appreciate such quality care and the fact that I’m truly seen and heard and my needs are validated with kindness. If you are looking for a dentist, look no further and come to Parmer Oaks Dental Care! The entire staff will welcome you with smiles, sincerity and NO JUDGEMENT! No one is more frightened of going to the dentist than me and they ALWAYS help me through every visit/procedure. Thank you Dr. Oster and the entire team!!! 🫶🏼🙌

reviews_list.author: Ashley C
reviews_list.text: I truly cannot say enough good things about Parmer Oaks Dental Care! My husband and I followed Dr. Oster and Christine from their previous practice as the service they provide exceeds every other dentist and hygienist we have seen. We both have anxiety from prior bad dental experiences, and Dr. Oster and Christine both treat us with so much care. The office also offers conscious sedation options to help keep us calm. The front desk staff and dental assistants have all been wonderful as well!

reviews_list.author: Sheila Paz
reviews_list.text: I love Parmer Oaks! My husband and I have been coming here for 5 years at least. The doctor is the best, explains you everything, he is really careful, great attitude. And for sure we love Christy, she does our dental cleaning appointments, she is the sweetest, very attentive and with lots of experience. I truly recommend Parmer Oaks for the whole family. Thank you!!

reviews_list.author: Wendy Conklin
reviews_list.text: I genuinely love going to this dentist’s office. They’re professional, caring, and have taken great care of me over the years. I always feel confident I’m in good hands. Highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Susie
reviews_list.text: I have been a patient here since this office opened.  Everyone is kind & professional.  I continue to trust them to keep my mouth healthy.  Dr. Oster is very thorough.  I’m happy he is my dentist!

reviews_list.author: anil urs
reviews_list.text:
Dr.Oster and the team are very professional and courteous. I have never had a delay and most of my appointments end well within the time quoted. Their follow up's are very good. They never push you to get things done and provide good options and information so that I can make decision.
Thank you team!!

reviews_list.author: Derend Hamor
reviews_list.text: Ok, so I'm the biggest baby ever in a dentist's chair so it matters to me A LOT how I'm treated at the dentist's office. I can't recommend Dr. Oster and his team highly enough! They really do care about your dental health and comfort and will spend whatever amount of time and attention required to address your needs. Let's face it...no one likes going to the dentist but you need to know there is a dentist out there who will coddle you through it. Thank you, Dr. Oster! You are the BEST! :)

reviews_list.author: Linda Duffy
reviews_list.text: Parmer Oaks Dental - from staff to procedures - has been nothing short of wonderful since 2016. In fact, when my health insurance provider notified me that Parmer Oaks was no longer an in-network provider I knew that I had to remain a patient. I’m sure there are many good providers out there, but when you have “The One,” why take a chance and change. So, if you’re looking for a dental office that feels more like family and provides services you know you can trust, look no further. You’ve just found it!

name: Market Place Smiles
description: Market Place Smiles is a dentist in Georgetown, TX, offering dentist services. With a 4.9-star rating from 29 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Market Place Smiles provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Ann Hindman
reviews_list.text:
I have lived in SC since 2012. I have received good dental care regularly since 2012.   Twice recently I have seen Dr. Jennifer Fu, At Marketplace Smiles in SC.  Her care was excellent. She is professional, knowledgeable and gentle. I will continue to go to her for my dental care. I recommend her.

James Hindman

reviews_list.author: C Hizer
reviews_list.text:
My experience at Marketplace Smiles was awesome and most importantly, painless.

I met Dr. Fu, and she was thorough, responsible, and gentle.  Angie did my cleaning, and she was professional and patient. Mia and Jessica in the front were polite and efficient.

I am glad to have found an honest dental office in Georgetown.

reviews_list.author: Nancy Guevara
reviews_list.text: I love Marketplace Smiles! All of the staff are friendly and helpful and will go the extra mile for you. Everyone treats you with courtesy and respect and makes you feel at home. I am impressed with their professionalism and experience in the dental field. I would highly recommend Marketplace Smiles to new clients!

reviews_list.author: ken steed
reviews_list.text: Enjoyed meeting Molly and Dr. Fu.  Molly accommodated my request of nullifying a feeling of 'drowning" while having my teeth cleaned.  Dr. Fu was very professional with a great touch.

reviews_list.author: PATRICK MCGRORY
reviews_list.text: Excellent dental service.  Courteous, friendly and efficient.  Great place to take care of your dental issues for us older folks.

reviews_list.author: David Hiner
reviews_list.text: I got my teeth cleaned yesterday and, as always, it was a very good. The people are professional and friendly.

reviews_list.author: A Humble Housekeeper
reviews_list.text: Dr. Bell is the ABSOLUTE BEST. I have always been terrified of the dentist until I had dental work done at marketplace smiles. He made me feel extremely comfortable. He is a genuinely nice guy, down to earth and good at what he does. I can’t recommend them enough.

reviews_list.author: Donna Walker
reviews_list.text: I have been a patient for over 15 years. I will travel many miles to continue to be a patient when I move.  Everyone is so friendly and knowledgeable.  Dr. Bell has always gone above and beyond to take care of me, even when the office is closed and I have an emergency.  Angie always cleans my teeth gently without putting me in pain.  I love this place!

reviews_list.author: Beth Ecker
reviews_list.text: Best dentist ever! I’ve been seeing Dr. Bell for years. I got a crazy high estimate from another dentist and originally went to Marketplace Smiles for a second opinion. They took their time and helped me break down what was necessary and what could be done at a later date. They found a few duplicate items on the other estimate that were completely unnecessary. They saved me a lot of money. Honest dentist and the friendliest staff.

reviews_list.author: Mary Humphrey
reviews_list.text: My husband and I have received excellent care from Dr. Bell for 9 years. We have never believed that he recommended unnecessary procedures. We also really like Jennifer, the hygienist.

name: Westinghouse Dental Georgetown
description: Westinghouse Dental Georgetown is a dentist in Georgetown, TX, offering dental clinic, cosmetic dentist, dentist services. With a 4.9-star rating from 894 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Westinghouse Dental Georgetown provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sam Aguilar
reviews_list.text: I came in for an emergency visit and needed an extraction and I’m honestly so thankful I chose this office. The staff was incredibly kind and understanding, especially knowing how much pain I was in. They explained everything clearly and handled the extraction smoothly! Dr. Shreya and RDA Annabel were both amazing and made me feel comfortable the whole time! I felt genuinely cared for and not rushed at all. I absolutely plan on coming back for future dental care! Highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Gustavo Santoyo
reviews_list.text: I had a great experience at Westinghouse. From Abby's sincere welcoming and intake to Marissa getting me thru X-rays and into actual procedure room. Dr. Palyekar and again Marissa walked me thru the X-ray results and plans available to me. I was made comfortable and relaxed. The procedure went as planned; enjoyed their customer service, professionalism and level of care. Thank you Dr Palyekar and team.

reviews_list.author: Roy Galvan
reviews_list.text: From check in to checkout and the most important thing in between (my visit) this was a wonderful experience. The clinic is warm and inviting. They are doing everything right to help the patients feel welcomed. My visit with Dr. Wicheta was great, he truly made me feel like I mattered to him. The visit didn’t feel cold, it wasn’t rushed and I appreciate the real concern he had for my dental needs. I 100% trust this place and if anyone is reading this I definitely suggest making Westinghouse Dental your new dental home

reviews_list.author: Winter White
reviews_list.text: I visited Dr.Wichita to fix and broken tooth and for a check up. This was the best dental experience I have ever had! Dr.Wichita is kind, thorough, efficient and an excellent dentist. Anna, one of the dental assistants, was attentive and a pleasure to work with. And Abby at the front desk was pleasant, helpful, and made the check-in and check-out process super easy and quick! If you are new to the area or looking for a new dentist, I highly recommend visiting this office!

reviews_list.author: Alondra Danielle
reviews_list.text:
I had an amazing experience at Westinghouse Dental! From the moment I walked in, I felt truly welcomed. Marissa and  Dr. Wicheta were incredibly kind, professional, and attentive. Their customer service is by far the best I’ve experienced, and they made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. I actually left feeling happy about a dental visit, highly recommend! If you visit this office, be sure to request Marissa and Dr. Wicheta
— they were absolutely wonderful!

reviews_list.author: James Guhlin
reviews_list.text: I had an amazing experience at Westinghouse Dental, and Jessica and Jess truly made the visit exceptional. Jessica, my hygienist, was incredibly thorough, gentle, and attentive throughout the entire cleaning. She explained everything clearly and made the whole process feel comfortable and stress-free. Jess checked me out at the end of the visit and showed the same great attention to detail and care, making sure everything was accurate, organized, and easy to understand. Both of them were genuinely friendly and professional, and it’s clear they take pride in providing excellent patient care. The office is modern, clean, and efficient, which made the experience even better. Highly recommend Westinghouse Dental—Jessica and Jess are fantastic!

reviews_list.author: Brandi Price
reviews_list.text: This was my first visit to a dentist in 20 years. I had so much anxiety and hesitation before my appointment. But the entire staff made me feel at ease and relaxed. They were very upfront about costs of all the procedures. Victoria was very thorough in explaining the whole process to me. Dr. Wicheta was very calm and I felt no judgement. Jess explained all the billing information so I was able to understand it. Highly recommend Westinghouse Dental!

reviews_list.author: Lucky Uzonwa
reviews_list.text: Thank you to shreya P. And annabell H. They performed a great treatment to th extraction of a bad root canal toothache I’ve heard for a while now. What an easy treatment with ease. And also thy have Netflix for your entertainment. This is our new dental spot now!!! Highly recommended. Thanks guys!!

reviews_list.author: Ray Sanchez
reviews_list.text: Had a great experience at Westinghouse Dental. Dr. Wicheta and his staff were very welcoming from the moment I walked in to check out. They were all very knowledgeable, honest, and efficient. The good vibes and ambience are definitely a plus. I am confident I made the right decision when switching denntal offices and I am looking forward to my next service.

reviews_list.author: Marci Medina
reviews_list.text:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
We had an absolutely amazing experience with Marissa and Dr. Wichtea! My boyfriend needed a tooth extraction and they were able to get us in the **same day**, which was such a relief. From the moment we arrived, Marissa was incredibly kind, welcoming, and made the whole process feel so much less stressful. Dr. Wichtea was not only highly skilled but also super informative—he explained everything clearly and made sure we were comfortable every step of the way.

The entire procedure went smoothly, and they both showed such professionalism and care. It’s not often you leave a dental visit feeling this impressed, but they truly went above and beyond. Highly recommend them to anyone in need of fast, expert, and compassionate. Definitely 5 Stars!

name: Advanced Dental Care of Hutto
description: Advanced Dental Care of Hutto is a dentist in Hutto, TX, offering dentist, cosmetic dentist, dental implants provider services. With a 4.9-star rating from 977 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Advanced Dental Care of Hutto provides quality dental care for seniors in Hutto, TX.

reviews_list.author: Lenora Valdez
reviews_list.text: I ended up here on the recommendation of a friend a few years ago. So glad I did! This place is excellent! Not only do they provide excellent dental work, cleaning, and care, but their customer service and client care are top notch. I live 30 to 40 minutes away, but absolutely find Advance Dental Care of Hutto to be worth the drive. It’s a huge bonus that this clinic is still a local, small business. Besides my regular dental care, they’ve taken care of my Invisalign and my front teeth veneers. Highly recommend just as they were highly recommended to me. I’ve got the whole family coming here.

reviews_list.author: Jeannette Rentas
reviews_list.text: We have had a wonderful experience with Dr. Lomboy. This is our son’s first time in braces. Dr. Lomboy took his time in explaining the treatment plan and reason why our son needed braces. We came back today for a wire replacement and Susi was quick and efficient. Everyone in the office is really kind and goes out of their way to help and make you feel comfortable. Highly recommend Advanced Dental Care.

reviews_list.author: Amber Montez
reviews_list.text: Everyone is so kind, personable, and attentive. They explain everything they’re doing and even things that can be fairly uncomfortable (like x-rays) are done quickly and efficiently and wind up being no issue whatsoever. They’ve even been able to get me in fairly quickly for issues outside of the routine cleanings and were incredibly compassionate and patient about it. I highly recommend to anyone, kids and adults alike. ❤️

reviews_list.author: Mark Rickus
reviews_list.text: Staff was very professional and courteous.  All of my issues were addressed and I am very pleased with all of the staff and Doctors.  Megan was an outstanding hygeinist, and understood my dislike of the water blaster during cleaning, and took steps to ensure there was no discomfort.

reviews_list.author: Lori Nesslage
reviews_list.text: Had my first appointment here today, and I was very pleased. Dr. Tran and Amy, my hygienist, were both very caring and thorough. So glad I've found my new dental office!

reviews_list.author: Robert Yowell
reviews_list.text: I chipped a tooth over the weekend and called them Monday morning.  They were able to work me in the same day and the dentist recommended a crown.  He was able to do it right away and did a remarkable job!  Hardly felt a thing.  I can't say enough about how friendly and organized they were.  Looking forward to being a patient of theirs for many years to come!

reviews_list.author: anup kumar
reviews_list.text:
Horrible experience.(ShivaKumar)
I clearly stated while booking that I needed a Periodontist (gum specialist). Despite this, they scheduled the appointment and only informed me after I arrived that there is no periodontist at this location.

They took a few X-rays, provided no relevant consultation or treatment for my concern, and still charged me $85.

This felt misleading and unethical. A complete waste of time and money. I would not recommend this place.

reviews_list.author: Latasha Warren
reviews_list.text:
I am writing to share my experience with Advance Dental of Hutto, which has unfortunately been the worst dental experience I have ever had.

In April 2025, after relocating to the area, I visited your office to establish care. During my exam, I was told I had a crack in a tooth that had been filled years ago. Although I had no pain at the time, I was advised that I needed a crown. I paid approximately $900 for the crown procedure.
