Soon after the crown was placed, I began experiencing significant pain that lasted for weeks. When I called the office for help, I was told I needed a root canal. I paid for that treatment as well, but my condition has only gotten progressively worse.

Since that time, I’ve experienced constant pain, nerve sensitivity when brushing, and an abscess along my gumline that now causes visible swelling and discomfort. I can no longer chew on that side and have been dealing with this pain for nearly six months.

When I reached back out to the office, hoping for an evaluation and accountability, I was told I would need to pay in cash for another exam and X-ray—even though the issue began with the procedures performed there. I did receive refunds for both the crown and root canal, but I am still left in serious pain and with lasting dental damage.

reviews_list.author: chiara tomassini
reviews_list.text: What can I say, they’re amazing. After so much dental trauma finally finding a knowledgeable, patient and most importantly honest dentist is complete relief. They were extremely kind and patient with my daughter too and gave her a thorough exam and cleaning.

reviews_list.author: Tracie Brown
reviews_list.text: Great experience at Advanced Dental Care of Hutto. Dr. Jonathan Lomboy and Susi have made my daughter’s orthodontia journey easy and virtually pain free. Would not hesitate to recommend them to others.

name: Renken Dentistry of Georgetown
description: Renken Dentistry of Georgetown is a dentist in Georgetown, TX, offering dentist services. With a 4.8-star rating from 1429 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated dental care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Renken Dentistry of Georgetown provides quality dental care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Katie H
reviews_list.text: I was a new patient today. When I arrived I easily checked in on a screen at the counter and didn’t have to wait much time and got seen right away for my apt. I found the staff to be very knowledgeable, welcoming and have a lot of experience. The place has a great atmosphere, is very clean and great technology was used. The staff I had today were professional, had excellent communication skills and explained everything to me with great detail. I asked a lot of questions and got every single bit of information I needed to feel confident in the plans going forward. I’m so thankful I found a good dentist.

reviews_list.author: Kimberly Brown
reviews_list.text:
This dental office is great! I was able to get a quick appointment. To be honest, I only choose this place because it had the quickest available appointment for new patients. I had a problem with a tooth and was in pain.
I did all the initial new patient paperwork online and when I got there, it was very quick. I had my tooth pulled out and everything fixed within an hour.
The dentist and assistant were lovely and made sure to take good care. They listened well and did not try to make me do anything I didn't want to do.  I would very much recommend !

reviews_list.author: cheryl harper
reviews_list.text: I went in for a crown and I was terrified. I didn’t sleep well I was so scared and Dr. N was fantastic and her assistant I want to say Rose was totally awesome no pain no discomfort they told me step-by-step what they were doing. They prepped me for my crown. I go back in two weeks to get the permanent crown. I am so happy and I would recommend them to anybody. I went and got my permanent crown today and again Dr. N made me feel comfortable. Rose was right there. They truly seemed concerned that I don’t suffer any discomfort.

reviews_list.author: Becky M
reviews_list.text: My first visit to Redken Dentistry and it was a great experience! The front staff was very welcoming and the dental assistant was very thorough and put me at ease.  My Dentist was professional, yet put me at ease immediately .She explained my treatment plan in detail.

reviews_list.author: Karen Kostroun
reviews_list.text: will continue to harass you for money. The next day after the appointment I was already getting messages about paying my bill.  I paid that amount....Then I owed another amount I get more text messages and phone calls about bills. Even though I just had the appointment not even a week or so. Getting harassed over and over!

reviews_list.author: Karen Meredith
reviews_list.text: Dr Lira and Rosie are the best. I used to have great fear of the dentist but never with Dr Lira. She is pleasant, friendly and above all knowledgeable. Rosie is the same.  I love them both    Rosie took a lot of time to explain the dental work still needed.   THANK YOU !

reviews_list.author: Maureen Stroup
reviews_list.text: Best visit I have had in 3 years. The Hygienist was careful and a delightful personality. She made if "fun". New dentist for me and she was also a delight, knowledgable and helpful.

reviews_list.author: Lemone Johnson
reviews_list.text: Renken was a major expirince! That staff was attentive, funny and professional. Best dental clinic I been too in 20 years of adulting! Clean and comfy atmosphere as well.

reviews_list.author: Marcia Mershon Scott
reviews_list.text:
I went in as a first time patient for a 6 month cleaning and the dentist wanted X-rays.  2 dentist in my town were having $99 specials but unfortunately I had Medicare with a HMO which they didn’t take so I went to Renken which took my plan.  They sent me a bill for $1,100.00 !!! I also left the office with a $8,000 estimate for all the work the new dentist said I needed.  I had left my old dentist 6 months ago with “perfect” teeth.
WOW these people are insane! I never went back and I never will.      Marcia Scott

reviews_list.author: Peter Bistransin
reviews_list.text: Friendly, thorough and professional dental group. They even have a dental discount plan which is way better than soon to be former dental insurance.

name: Advanced Hearing
description: Advanced Hearing is a hearing aid store in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store, audiologist, battery store services. With a 5-star rating from 57 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hearing & vision care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Advanced Hearing provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Manuel Soto
reviews_list.text: First time to visit this business.I was happily pleased with the repairs done on my hearing.Aids. I found Doctor Block to be a good listener and obviously in the business to help people.I was very impressed by her professionalism and willingness to help. When contacting other places they wanted me to be assessed before they would  help me with repairing my hearing aids. I think highly of people who care about others and are willing to help in times of need.  I will to be a client here when I have to replace my hearing aids. I believe she isgood people and highly recommend her.her!

reviews_list.author: Henry Valenzuela
reviews_list.text: Service is outstanding! Absolutely a 5 ⭐️ operation; from initial evaluation through 1 year of hearing aid usage. Karen is always responsive to questions, adjustments and resolving issues. Best Audiologist in town…

reviews_list.author: Bob and Dianne Johnson
reviews_list.text: We have been clients of Karen Block at Advanced Hearing for over 6 years.  Her audiologist skills are excellent but she is outstanding because she is such a caring, competent and committed person. We highly recommend her expertise and character.

reviews_list.author: Robert Vogt
reviews_list.text: Karen is so friendly & kind. She has worked with me to get the best use of my hearing aids. She has earned my complete confidence in her word & performance.

reviews_list.author: clara
reviews_list.text: Sitting down with an appointment with Karen is very much like visiting with a friend.  In addition to being knowledgeable and professional, Karen is a warm friendly person.  I am so glad I have her taking care of my hearing needs!  Clara McNamara

reviews_list.author: Jim West
reviews_list.text: A great experience from my first appointment a year and a half ago when I purchased my hearing aids to my follow-up maintenance checks. Karen combines both professional competence and positive personality. Five stars!

reviews_list.author: Frank S
reviews_list.text:
Experienced hearing aid user (20+ yrs).  First time with this provider.  Every aspect of my interactions so far have been excellent - from the initial phone inquiries, the scheduling, the office visits, case analyses, credibility of alternatives and recommendations, and “go forward” plan.  Karen is well skilled in a wide range of professional and technical skills.  Shop around, ….., do your due diligence; definitely include Advanced Hearing (AH) and Karen in your planning.  Chances are that AH will make it at least to your short list.

Update 8/19/25
I did purchase my Phonak aids from Karen (Advanced Hearing).  After several months, I met with Karen to go through some refresher on the Phonak app, and “how to” re: routine  user maintenance on the hearing aids.  Thus far, the Phonak aids are working as advertised.  I have no regrets.  Karen continues to demonstrate a very high “service after the sale”  approach — welcoming, responsive and genuinely helpful.  Karen, thank you for your kindness, caring, and professionalism.  You are indeed special.

reviews_list.author: Charles Puckhaber
reviews_list.text: As usual Karen was very professional and fixed my problems very quickly.  She is also very friendly and this business is a pleasure to deal with.

reviews_list.author: Judy Kerl
reviews_list.text: Advanced Hearing with Karen is an outstanding business.  Every detail is addressed to make sure the hearing aides work and are fitted properly.  The hearing aides are high quality which makes a difference.

reviews_list.author: James Walsh
reviews_list.text: Karen is always supportive and there for you if you have a question or a cleaning adjustment or an issue with your hearing aids. Always responds to you asap

name: Waterloo Audiology - Georgetown
description: Waterloo Audiology - Georgetown is a audiologist in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store, audiologist services. With a 4.9-star rating from 61 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hearing & vision care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Waterloo Audiology - Georgetown provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Marilyn Lewis
reviews_list.text: Arianna was wonderful. The best audiologist I've ever had. I also took my 96 year old mother to her. She was so sweet and patient with her. She is very thorough in explaining things and does not pressure at all to purchase aides, etc.

reviews_list.author: Jimmie Dean
reviews_list.text: I have had the good fortune to work with the staff at Waterloo Audiology in Georgetown. They are just amazing. Everyone there is top notch. They always go above and beyond with customers that I sent their way. I could not be happier. Please give them a visit.

reviews_list.author: Cathie Brien
reviews_list.text:
They are the best. If you're looking for hearing aids or even adjustments. From the front desk Anabel to Marla, my audiologist. They go above and beyond customer service.
They genuinely care about their clients.
My dog ate my hearing aids and they couldn't be fixed. They had an extra pair that they used for samples and gave those. I was actually struggling due to loosing my job and had no insurance. Now, I was able to afford new ones that my insurance covered and hear much better.

Go see them . You won't be disappointed.

Cathie B

reviews_list.author: Greg Kulesa
reviews_list.text: Professional, helpful, answered questions well and possessed the level of knowledge I expected from an audiologist. Explained results and had recommendations to improve quality of life. Overall very good experience.

reviews_list.author: Thomas Rowell
reviews_list.text: This was my first hearing test in several years and first time for me at Waterloo Audiology.  Ariana was awesome.  She is professional and friendly and explains the steps clearly and goes over the results immediately.  Overall, it was a great experience.  Two Thumbs Up

reviews_list.author: Tony
reviews_list.text: Waterloo Audiology service was excellent. I was brought back at my scheduled appointment and walked through the process   In having my hearing evaluated. 5 stars easy!

reviews_list.author: Tom Granberry
reviews_list.text: I recently moved my hearing care to Waterloo Audiology/Georgetown and had my first appointment with Arianna Garcia. She was extremely professional and resolved my hearing issues with a pair of Lyric hearing aids, which have made a huge difference. I highly recommend Waterloo Audiology not only for their professionalism but also for their exceptional staff. A special shout-out to Anabel Mendoza at the front desk—she is friendly, efficient, and truly the best at what she does. Great experience all around!

reviews_list.author: Roger Weiss
reviews_list.text: Ms. Garcia is a very professional, knowledgeable, courteous and forbearant person. She took her time explaining every procedure performed that led to her final recommendations. Such characteristics and values built complete trust in me to follow through with her suggestions.

reviews_list.author: Scott McDowell
reviews_list.text: Dr. Arianna Garcia is exceptional.  I went here with not a lot of hope for my hearing situation.  I have a lot of hearing loss and have been lost.  After thorough testing, guidance, care, instruction and professionalism, she has given me new hope, and I can hear so much now!  She has patiently worked with me to fine tune my new hearing aids and I would recommend her to anyone needing a better life hearing.  Thank you!!

reviews_list.author: Gloria Seidlin-Bernstein
reviews_list.text: Arianna is fabulous. She is very clear in her explanations, very patient with questions, thoughtful in responses, and is patient/client focused. She has provided me with the information I need to decide if hearing aids are right for me and how to assess the merits of comparable brands for my situation.

name: Cook Hearing & Balance
description: Cook Hearing & Balance is a hearing aid store in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store, audiologist, hearing aid repair service services. With a 5-star rating from 118 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hearing & vision care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Cook Hearing & Balance provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: JJ McCulley (JJ)
reviews_list.text: I recently had a hearing test at Cook Hearing & Balance and was thoroughly impressed by the entire experience.  The hearing exam itself was quick, painless, and incredibly thorough – the audiologist explained every step and answered all my questions in a clear, friendly manner. I left feeling confident that my hearing health is in good hands. If you’re looking for a professional, welcoming, and attentive team, Cook Hearing & Balance is the place to go!

reviews_list.author: Mark Sassman
reviews_list.text: As usual, exceptional service was provided at this facility.  Patient Service Rep Tonya Stump provided prompt and professional service.  She escorted me in prior to my scheduled appointment and administered a Cognitive Thrive Screening.  Dr. Kathleen Long was extremely attentive to every concern we discussed.  She administered a hearing test, cleaned my hearing aids and took time to discuss every detail of the appointment.  The kind, courteous, and professional manner in which this office is conducted is most appreciated.   Mark S.

reviews_list.author: Julianne Billington
reviews_list.text: Cook Hearing and Balance was recommended to me by my primary care physician. I looked at the reviews and was really impressed. As a first time hearing aids wearer I'm here to add my five-star review for customer service, pricing, and Dr. Kat!

reviews_list.author: Jan McNeill
reviews_list.text: Yes, I knew I was getting more and more hard of hearing, but was reluctant to find a hearing specialist until the same name came up from my ENT doctor and several close friends. So yesterday I had my extensive testing done with Dr. Long at Cook Hearing and Balance and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. She was so pleasant and knowledgeable and had a knack of explaining everything…so in two weeks or so I’ll be fitted with new hearing aids. She explained that she’ll adjust them gradually so I won’t have the huge difference I remember my mom going through. I’m actually looking forward to working with her so I can finally hear the dialog in some of my favorite British movies and shows!

reviews_list.author: Pat McCain
reviews_list.text: What a great visit!  Dr. Long was outstanding— Professional, courteous, and took her time explaining everything to me. She just explained the facts, and didn’t pressure me with any treatment options. Just what I needed. I will absolutely come back and would recommend her in this office 100%!

reviews_list.author: Donna Taylor
reviews_list.text: Dr. Kathleen Long went above and beyond to repair my Mom’s hearing aids and make sure she would be able to hear in time for Thanksgiving. She is by far the best audiologist we have ever worked with. Extremely knowledgeable, professional, and more importantly, patient and kind. We give her our highest recommendation.

reviews_list.author: Bill Wild
reviews_list.text:
It was very good, I'm glad I had this audiogram done. it opened my eyes to how my hearing is and what are the recommendations are going forward.

Dr. Long is very knowledgeable and personable. She is very through and explained the tests being performed and the benefits of each test. She explained her findings in a manner that was easy to understand.

I highly recommend Dr. Long for anyone who's concerned about their hearing to schedule a visit at Cook Hearing and Balance in Georgetown, Tx.

reviews_list.author: Michael Montgomery
reviews_list.text: Everyone was very friendly and welcoming.  All procedures and results were discussed in detail and confirmed what I expected. I'ts good information to have.  Hearing aids are not a recommendation for me but I found out high frequency hearing loss does affect a persons ability to hear clearly in a group setting. .

reviews_list.author: Debbie Hall
reviews_list.text:
Dr. Kat was great! She was so professional and explained the process each step of the way. Once all the testing was complete she explained the results so I could understand.
I highly recommend her!

reviews_list.author: Vikki Taylor
reviews_list.text: My first time to visit Cook Hearing & Balance and my first time for an audiology exam.  I didn't know what to expect and had a bit of apprehension going in.  But, Dr Kat was engaging, kind, respectful and very professional.  She thoroughly explained everything she was doing and took the time to answer my many questions.  I had a very positive experience at Cook and highly recommend them!

reviews_list.author: Robert Thornton
reviews_list.text: Dr. Rick Navarro has done a great job of supporting my hearing aid needs. He has successfully addressed several issues with my equipment. I would have given up on wearing the hearing aids if Rick hadn't worked thru my problems.

reviews_list.author: ROGER ELKHOURY
reviews_list.text: The staff at Livingston hearing aid center were very professional and welcoming. Dr. Navarro explained everything regarding the test I took with simplicity. He answered all my questions with properly. I recommend the Livingston hearing aids center to my all my friends.

reviews_list.author: Noreen Hoenig
reviews_list.text: Dr Novato excellent. Company not so much . Hearing aide 3 mo old and left not working . Would need for vacation to hear family and had to return to factory . Would prefer a new one , not a repaired one. No service providing 24 hr return available so I will not hear on vacation . Sales rep to go over syncing product, updates not available since Feb request for rep and it would help office manage technology . I’m two days past opportunity to get money back and would consider this but told too late. Very disappointed.Bcbs needs to offer more options .

reviews_list.author: Donnie Bingham
reviews_list.text: It's the best place I have been the doctor is the best he tell all about the hearing aid makes sure you understand what he talking about Miranda at front desk is great at her job

reviews_list.author: Kristi Roark
reviews_list.text: Very patient and caring hearing providers.  Full of compassion and knowledge for expanding hearing for their patients.

reviews_list.author: Russell Friend
reviews_list.text: They always do a great job helping me get my ears cleaned out.. this is fast and extremely comfortable service that I would seriously recommend for ear wax cleanup and maintenance of the ears. I've been coming to this business for over 5 years and never had a bad experience.

reviews_list.author: Gary Adams
reviews_list.text: Just following up and there’s a new Doctor in the office. Dr. Navarro is a pleasant guy and was most helpful. He made an adjustment to my hearing aids and I have noticed a difference immediately. Looking forward to seeing him again.

reviews_list.author: Vince Santillo
reviews_list.text: I have been to the Georgetown location twice and have had exceptional experiences both times. Amanda at the front desk is very personable and welcoming. I have been seen within ten minutes of arrival both times. Dr. McQueen is wonderful. She takes the time to explain the tests she is performing and the results after. She has a wonderful hands on approach and ensured I understood how to use my new hearing aides before leaving. I really appreciate their time and professionalism.

reviews_list.author: Lavonya Friday
reviews_list.text: Still absolutely FANtastic!  The people, products and the reliability have kept me hearing the sounds of love and life for at least 20 years!! Livingston provided me with my first hearing aid ... which lasted me considerably longer than anyone expected. I was given courteous and professional service at various locations throughout Texas whenever I needed it.  My husband and I recently explored several options for hearing aids and have decided to go with Livingston because of our satisfaction with the quality and availability of the service, the staff, the product and the reliability of each.

reviews_list.author: David Voelter
reviews_list.text: The visit today entailed a thorough review of my hearing issues, and I left feeling it could not have gone any better.

name: Georgetown Hearing Aid Center
address: 1915 S Austin Ave Ste 101, Georgetown, TX 78626
description: Georgetown Hearing Aid Center is a hearing aid store in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store services. Rated 4.6 stars based on 17 reviews, they provide quality hearing & vision care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Georgetown Hearing Aid Center provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Sherry Glover
reviews_list.text: James is very helpful. He has shown me how to maintain my hearing aids and when one had to be sent for repair, he got it to and back from manufacturer quickly. He also checks my hearing yearly and adjusts my hearing aids as needed.

reviews_list.author: Donna Cummings
reviews_list.text:
I was so disappointed with being miss quoted a price at another hearing aid store in Georgetown and then found this place and was very happy.  James was amazing and I ended up paying so much less than every where else had quoted me.
James got me my hearing aids immediately which was important because I was starting a new job.  He always gets me acurate answers for all my questions.  He makes sure to check on me to ensure that I am doing well with my hearing aids.   Sooooo happy with James and Georgetown Hearing Aid Center!

reviews_list.author: Peter Takemoto
reviews_list.text: I had my first hearing test by an audiologist in October 2011.  She encouraged me to consider hearing aids but I procrastinated. Almost 3 years later I had another audiology test in June of 2014.  A month later I went to Costco and they tested me again and sold me a pair of Resound hearing aids for $1800 with a 90-day free trial period.  I returned them a month later for a refund.  They were totally unsatisfactory.   Fast forward to April 2017and  I had another hearing test by an audiologist and my results showed a further diminishment in my hearing.  Six months later in September 2017 I went to New Sound Hearing Center in Georgetown and they tested me a quote me pairs hearing aids in the price range of $3,000 to $5,000.  I wasn't prepared to pay that much even with a free trial period.  Finally in late January 2018 I went to see James Cearnal at Georgetown Hearing Aid Center and after looking at my four previous audiology tests, he recommended a pair of Sieman's Cellion hearing aids for around $2,000.  I purchased them on a 30-free trail period and after several follow-up visits and adjustments decided to return them for a refund, which Jim processed without any hassle.  However he suggested I try another hearing aid by Hansaton and fitted me with just one hearing aid for a trial period.  If they work out he offered me to order a pair of these hearing aids for around $2,000.  I'm still in the trial period but so far so good.  I like the one hearing aid I'm testing better than any of the previous hearing aids I tried.  And communication with Jim is very easy, he listens and answers my questions.  If I end up purchasing a pair of these hearing aids Jim will service these hearing aids and make hearing adjustments as necessary.  A bonus is that his office is about a mile from my home and I can drive to his office through traffic in under 5 minutes.  I like the fact that he runs an independent Hearing Aid Center and is not part of a regional or national hearing aid chain of retailers.  And he puts everything in writing and signs it.  Accordingly I'm happy to write this review and give him a five star rating.  P.S.  He doesn't know I'm doing this and will only find out if he checks his reviews.

reviews_list.author: jeff brown
reviews_list.text: James is great and knowledgeable. I came to him for second opinion and he help me overcome a bad experience from a previous person. Would keep coming back here for any issues.

reviews_list.author: Tim O'Quinn
reviews_list.text: Unlike others, horrible experience.  Was like trying to buy a used car.  We knew what we wanted already  but he was trying to sell us something else.  My wife was already overwhelmed and this ended up making her cry.

reviews_list.author: Brenda and Dietrich Trenner
reviews_list.text:
The best place for knowledgeable hearing aid assistance .Jim knows what he is doing.
Friendly, caring.
Definitely will go to him for our hearing concerns.

reviews_list.author: Angela Harvick
reviews_list.text: I've been a long-standing customer here. I hope that when Mr. Carnell retires he'll train his replacement to give the awesome service that he does.

reviews_list.author: John Foliot
reviews_list.text: James is a friendly pro, who is very focused on customer service and satisfaction. Support local business, you will be pleased and satisfied.

reviews_list.author: Edgar Garner
reviews_list.text: Very accommodating service for my wife's hearing aid needs. Very nice owner very knowledgeable. We recommend his service.

reviews_list.author: Jim Cooper
reviews_list.text: Fantastic service on repairing my 7 year old hearing aid. Not a fancy place but who cares.

reviews_list.author: Kelly Mack
reviews_list.text: Dr Cuero and staff are excellent. Dr Cuero was very helpful and explained everything to me. I recommend them to anyone!

reviews_list.author: Debra Taylor
reviews_list.text: The people were very courteous and helpful.  I felt valued and heard( no pun intended).  I would recommend the Round Rock location to everyone that I know.

reviews_list.author: Judy Wayman
reviews_list.text: Dr. Cuervo, AuD, ABA, and her assistant Valerie, were amazingly patient and very informative.  There was no rush as I was introduced to the features and possibilities of the hearing aids she recommended for my need.  After deciding on the purchase, then came patient explanation of inserting, which is easy.  I left feeling  cared for and well prepared for this addition to my life.  I expect that ongoing communication when necessary will be pleasant.

reviews_list.author: Natalie Guerrero
reviews_list.text: This team is absolutely amazing! Honest, thorough, and so helpful!! I could be more pleased and grateful!

reviews_list.author: Libby Escalante
reviews_list.text: Estes Audiology was great. They took a great deal of time with us throughout the process. They were informative and patient answering all our questions. I would highly recommend them for your hearing needs.

reviews_list.author: Lizbeth Morales
reviews_list.text: I’ve never been to a practice that was as kind and professional in my life. Sonia and her team are wonderful. The office is beautiful and everyone is so nice and I never felt confused they explained everything throughly. And most importantly they speak Spanish !

reviews_list.author: Sean Westbrook
reviews_list.text: Dr. Cuero and Giovanni (hope I spelled it right) were absolutely amazing. They were extremely knowledgeable, professional, and friendly. It was the best medical appointment I've ever had in my life. If you have hearing issues or need a hearing test, this is the place to go and these are the people you need to see.

reviews_list.author: Nara Dedrick
reviews_list.text: My husband had an appointment for the first time at this facility. He was impressed with how thorough they were with their examination. Luckily, he just had major wax build up which the doctor was able to remove and his hearing has improved significantly. We would definitely recommend this place.

reviews_list.author: Jesse Baumgartner
reviews_list.text: Excellent doctor and staff. Great service.

reviews_list.author: Gary Hook
reviews_list.text: Have had my devices for over a year now, and am very happy with them. The personal attention I receive during my visits is wonderful. My audiologist is passionate about her work and it shows; she clearly cares about every one of her patients. Every office visit, including "surprise" events, is a positive experience. I happily recommend Estes Audiology to anyone need help with their hearing.

name: Miracle-Ear Hearing Aid Center
description: Miracle-Ear Hearing Aid Center is a hearing aid store in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store, hearing aid repair service services. With a 4.9-star rating from 127 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hearing & vision care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Miracle-Ear Hearing Aid Center provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Vivian Jordan
reviews_list.text: We have always had a quick, efficient and very informative experience at the Georgetown, Tx location. Rebecca is always upfront with a warm welcome and happy to see ya smile. I wanted to shout out about the exceptional service Rebecca and Adrian always provide. Thanks for caring about your community

reviews_list.author: Randy Cash
reviews_list.text: Walked in to see if they had supplies that would work with my hearing aides that were provided from elsewhere.   Although they did not, they offered to clean up my hearing aides for free and very, very pleasant.   I highly recommend!

reviews_list.author: Jairo Garcia
reviews_list.text: Adrian was able to help me find a great solution for my hearing needs. Been struggling to communicate with my wife and family members, and man am I glad we visited him. He is very knowledgeable and taught us a lot of information about hearing health. Becky was very welcoming and offered us refreshments when we walked in. Great environment inside the clinic, definitely recommend everyone with any hearing difficulties to visit them here, you won’t regret it!

reviews_list.author: John Cucorullo
reviews_list.text: Della and her team are incredible! They are all very professional and focused on doing their job while making you feel like family. My hearing loss was affecting not only me, but all those around me. Miracle Ear at Georgetown helped with that and now I can function much better. The continued care is also exceptional. I strongly recommend Della to be your hearing specialist.

reviews_list.author: Susan Foncell
reviews_list.text:
There are many reasons why I am pleased that I selected Miracle Ear to resolve my hearing issues.  The technology involved is amazing. Everything was carefully explained to me, and my initial visit was a valuable learning experience about how we hear and what can happen as we age.  Della is an expert.
After I purchased my hearing aids, all services and adjustments were provided without charge. The care I receive at this office makes me appreciate the genuine commitment this staff has to my hearing health.
I like to have a morning appointment because my visit sets such a happy tone for the rest of the day. Miracle Ear continues to monitor and adjust my hearing aids. Della and her staff are always available to me.
Also, Miracle Ear has a program which funds hearing aids for children and adults who cannot afford them. I am very pleased to be associated with such a firm.

reviews_list.author: Ronnie Heselmeyer
reviews_list.text: Making my appointment at Miracle Ear was one of the best decisions I’ve ever made.  I absolutely love my new Miracle Ear Hearing Aids and my family does too!   Dr. Della Davis and her staff at the Georgetown location in Wolf Ranch are absolutely amazing and make you feel right at home.  If you’re experiencing any hearing loss, please do yourself a favor and give them a call, you’ll be glad you did.  Thank you Miracle Ear!!!

reviews_list.author: James Edwards
reviews_list.text: Della was very caring and showed empathy for my well-being.   Marlo is welcoming and always has a smile. It’s nice to know there are companies with staff that care.  She was able to fit my wife’s hearing aids to me and treated me with the same respect.  I would highly recommend Miracle Ear Georgetown.

reviews_list.author: Naomi Vinyard
reviews_list.text:
The hearing aids work beautifully!!  After I got used to the hearing aids the app is easy to use.
Della Davis is fantastic! She’s super competent about all the ins and outs of the hearing aids and related apps.
Marlo in the front office and Kathryn, hearing specialist, provide excellent, friendly service also.  They correct all my problems which are because I’m not too Swift with the app. But it is getting better!
When I come in I feel like I’ve come to my best friend’s house. Love the people and the hearing aids!

reviews_list.author: Mary Morgan
reviews_list.text: I went to Miracle Ear in Georgetown for a hearing test. Even though I did not have a hearing loss I would come back and recommend them to my family and friends. Della explained everything in detail and it was very educational. All the staff is so friendly and welcoming. They make you feel like family.

reviews_list.author: Virginia Garcia
reviews_list.text: I was having problems with my hearing and stopped in and talked to Della and Marlo.  They were so helpful and compassionate.  Marlo was very friendly and professional.  Della educated and tested my hearing and came up with a solution.  I am so grateful to be able to understand and interact again. I would highly recommend Miracle Ear Georgetown.

name: Texas Hearing Solutions
description: Texas Hearing Solutions is a audiologist in Georgetown, TX, offering audiologist services. Rated 5 stars based on 3 reviews, they provide quality hearing & vision care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Texas Hearing Solutions provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Lalo Flores
reviews_list.text: My wife and I moved to TerraVista, Georgetown 4 years ago and we were concerned we wouldn’t find audiologists as good as the one we left in Houston. Since we are both seniors and wear hearing aids we started looking and found Texas Hearing Solutions. We have seen Debi several times for fixing our phonacks and found her customer service to be excellent. Better than the one we left in Houston. They sell good quality brands at affordable prices.

reviews_list.author: Michael Walton
reviews_list.text: My dad needed something for his hearing aids so I went on a quest to find them.  I searched and called several places, but Texas Hearing Solutions was the only place that actually answered the phone AND had what I needed.  Super nice, convenient and most importantly, made my dad happy!  Thank you!

reviews_list.author: Bradley Rogers
reviews_list.text: Great Products, Friendly Owner ( Debbie) and Very Nice and Professional and knowledgeable! Great Customer Service.

name: Cook Hearing & Balance
description: Cook Hearing & Balance is a hearing aid store in Hutto, TX, offering hearing aid store, audiologist, hearing aid repair service services. With a 5-star rating from 27 reviews, they are one of the highest-rated hearing & vision care providers in Williamson County.
shortDescription: Cook Hearing & Balance provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Hutto, TX.

reviews_list.author: George Cereceres
reviews_list.text: As soon as I showed up I was promptly greeted and attended to at the front desk. Was taken in for my Hearing test and evaluation within 1 minute. In and out within 30 min. Audiologist and front desk personnel are very Professional and courteous. I will be going back for future visits.

reviews_list.author: Maureen Quinn
reviews_list.text: Dr.Lim of Cook Hearing and balance is wonderful.  Very knowledgeable and so patient answering my many questions.  She has taken the time to listen to my needs and adjusted my hearing aids to meet those needs.  Thank you.

reviews_list.author: Joyce Camp
reviews_list.text: Cook Hearing and Balance is wonderful. They take great care of me  and always do a excellent job with my hearing aids

reviews_list.author: Carol Dorman
reviews_list.text:
Outstanding Service at Cook Hearing and Balance of Hutto, Texas

I recently had the pleasure of visiting Cook Hearing and Balance of Hutto, Texas, and I cannot recommend their services highly enough. From the moment I walked through the door, I was greeted with a warm welcome from the staff, creating an atmosphere that immediately put me at ease.

The professionals at Cook Hearing and Balance are truly exceptional. The audiologists took the time to listen to my concerns and provided a thorough assessment of my hearing and balance issues. They explained each step of the process clearly and patiently, ensuring I felt informed and comfortable. Their expertise and attention to detail were evident, making the entire experience smooth and reassuring.

What impressed me most was the personalized care I received. Unlike other places I’ve visited, the team at Cook Hearing and Balance genuinely cares about their patients. They went above and beyond to create a tailored management plan that suited my individual needs, demonstrating their commitment to not just treating symptoms but enhancing my overall quality of life.

The office itself is well-equipped with the latest technology, making assessments efficient and accurate. The environment is welcoming, and it’s clear that client comfort is a top priority.

In summary, Cook Hearing and Balance of Hutto, Texas, offers outstanding service with a personal touch. If you are looking for a reliable and compassionate team to help with hearing and balance issues, I highly recommend scheduling an appointment. You won't be disappointed!

Thank you,

Benny Dorman

reviews_list.author: Jim Seng
reviews_list.text: Professional, thorough, knowledgeable AND personable.  Responsive to an issue entirely caused by my usage error, not that of the new hearing aids. Has been and continues to be a very good experience.

reviews_list.author: Maureen Boehm
reviews_list.text: I felt well served. Dr. Lim is very knowledgeable and worked to find me the best solution to improve my hearing and fit my budget.

reviews_list.author: Marc White
reviews_list.text: I spent about an hour having to complete forms, taking a cognition/ coordination test, then Dr. Lim tested my hearing and we discussed how each ear was performing at age 72.  I liked the chart visual and her explanations concerning each ear and also what she could do for me at my moderate level of hearing loss.  I was astonished that her product companies could color the hearing aides to blend in with my hair color!  Dr. Lim erased most of the fear I have had over the past 20 yrs after seeing how my father did not cope well with his aides for 40 yrs.  I cannot wait to visit there again in a couple of weeks.

reviews_list.author: Bangsil Ko
reviews_list.text:
I visited yesterday for the test due to tinnitus, and I had an excellent experience. Dr. Lim was incredibly kind and took the time to explain my symptoms in detail, which made me feel at ease. The examination was thorough, and they patiently answered all my questions, making me feel well cared for.
After the consultation, they also provided clear guidance on how to manage my condition moving forward, which was very helpful. I highly recommend this clinic to anyone in need of a Hearing examination!

reviews_list.author: Jo Ann Lawshae
reviews_list.text: Dr. Lim provides the most professional audiology care I could ever want. Every question I might have about my new hearing aids is patiently and completely answered and further information is provided also. I’m totally happy that Cook Hearing has this new office in Hutto!

reviews_list.author: Andrew Seibel
reviews_list.text: Fantastic customer service. This is my 3rd set of hearing aids and i will always use Cook Hearing and Balance. The ladies at the Hutto branch were wonderful.

name: Amplify Hearing at Bristol Family Eye Care Georgetown
description: Amplify Hearing at Bristol Family Eye Care Georgetown is a audiologist in Georgetown, TX, offering hearing aid store, hearing aid repair service, audiologist services. Rated 5 stars based on 10 reviews, they provide quality hearing & vision care for Williamson County seniors.
shortDescription: Amplify Hearing at Bristol Family Eye Care Georgetown provides quality hearing & vision care for seniors in Georgetown, TX.

reviews_list.author: Scott Brown
reviews_list.text:
I’ve been struggling with tinnitus and muffled hearing for quite done time , so I was a bit nervous walking into my appointment, but Dr. Bea Smith completely put me at ease. From the moment she greeted me with a warm smile, she was attentive, patient, and genuinely interested in what I’d been experiencing.
She took the time to ask detailed questions, listened without rushing, and explained everything in plain English (no confusing jargon). The hearing test was thorough, and when the results came back she walked me through the audiogram step-by-step, and explaining everything so I could understand what was going on

Honestly, it was the best audiologist visit I’ve ever had. Dr. Bea Smith is knowledgeable, kind, and truly cares about her patients’ quality of life. If you’re in the area and need hearing care, I can’t recommend her highly enough; 10/10!

reviews_list.author: Mel Pendland
reviews_list.text: Dr Bea Smith was very professional, patient and personable. She explained my results and her recommendations thoroughly, and answered all of my questions. I highly recommend her to anyone needing a hearing evaluation.

reviews_list.author: Cheryl Spencer
reviews_list.text: As usual, I had a great appointment with Bea at Amplify Hearing. It is comforting to know my hearing is still good as a senior adult.

reviews_list.author: Mick Ambrose
reviews_list.text: Doc Smith is amazing! My go to for everything hearing for now on.

reviews_list.author: Catherine McAvoy
reviews_list.text: Very thorough exam and detailed explanation of the results. Very professional and friendly. Highly recommend.

reviews_list.author: Tabitha Ambrose
reviews_list.text: Dr. Bea and team are the best!

reviews_list.author: Ken Lesher
reviews_list.text: everything worked out.
